title: Urgent: Upbit Announces Temporary FCT2 Suspension ‚Äì What You Need to Know
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent: Upbit Announces Temporary FCT2 Suspension ‚Äì What You Need to Know Attention cryptocurrency traders and FirmaChain holders! South Korea‚Äôs leading exchange Upbit has just announced an important service interruption that affects FCT2 transactions. This Upbit FCT2 suspension will temporarily halt deposits and withdrawals, leaving many investors wondering about the implications for their digital assets. What Does the Upbit FCT2 Suspension Mean for Users? The Upbit FCT2 suspension begins at 3:00 a.m. UTC on the 18th and affects all FirmaChain (FCT2) deposit and withdrawal functions. However, it‚Äôs crucial to understand that this is a temporary measure. During this period, users should note these key points: Existing FCT2 balances remain secure in your Upbit wallet Trading of FCT2 may continue normally on the exchange The suspension only affects moving FCT2 in or out of Upbit All other cryptocurrencies on the platform remain unaffected Why Would Upbit Suspend FCT2 Services? Cryptocurrency exchanges frequently implement temporary suspensions for various technical reasons. This particular Upbit FCT2 suspension likely relates to one of these common scenarios: Network upgrades or maintenance on the FirmaChain blockchain Wallet security enhancements and system improvements Protocol updates requiring temporary service pauses Compliance with regulatory requirements Such maintenance periods are standard practice in the cryptocurrency industry and typically indicate the exchange‚Äôs commitment to providing secure, reliable services. How Should You Prepare for the FCT2 Suspension? With the Upbit FCT2 suspension approaching, proactive users can take several steps to minimize disruption. Consider these actionable insights: Complete any urgent FCT2 deposits or withdrawals before the deadline Monitor Upbit‚Äôs official announcements for updates on service restoration Diversify your trading strategies during the suspension period Keep your account security measures up to date What‚Äôs the Typical Duration for Such Suspensions? While Upbit hasn‚Äôt specified an end date for this Upbit FCT2 suspension , historical patterns suggest these maintenance windows usually last from a few hours to several days. The exchange will likely provide regular updates through their official communication channels. Therefore, users should watch for announcements on their website and social media platforms. Looking Beyond the Temporary Disruption Temporary suspensions like this Upbit FCT2 suspension often lead to improved platform security and enhanced user experience. Exchanges use these maintenance periods to implement crucial upgrades that benefit users in the long run. While inconvenient in the short term, such measures demonstrate the exchange‚Äôs dedication to maintaining a robust trading environment. Remember that cryptocurrency markets are dynamic, and occasional service interruptions are part of the ecosystem‚Äôs evolution. The key is staying informed and maintaining perspective during these temporary pauses. Frequently Asked Questions How long will the Upbit FCT2 suspension last? Upbit hasn‚Äôt announced a specific end time, but similar suspensions typically last from several hours to a few days. Monitor official channels for updates. Can I still trade FCT2 on Upbit during the suspension? Yes, the suspension only affects deposits and withdrawals. Trading FCT2 against other cryptocurrencies should continue normally. Is my FCT2 safe during the suspension? Absolutely. Your FCT2 balances remain secure in your Upbit wallet. The suspension only prevents moving tokens in or out of the exchange. Will this affect FCT2‚Äôs market price? While temporary suspensions can cause minor price fluctuations, they rarely have significant long-term impact on cryptocurrency prices. How will I know when the suspension ends? Upbit will make official announcements through their website, app notifications, and social media channels when services resume. Should I be worried about this suspension? No, temporary suspensions are routine maintenance procedures common across all major cryptocurrency exchanges. Found this information helpful? Share this article with fellow cryptocurrency enthusiasts who might be affected by the Upbit FCT2 suspension. Your network will appreciate the timely update! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency exchange developments, explore our article on key developments shaping digital asset security and platform reliability. This post Urgent: Upbit Announces Temporary FCT2 Suspension ‚Äì What You Need to Know first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Standard Chartered Sets Sights on Hong Kong as Core of Blockchain Ambitions
body: Standard Chartered is betting on Hong Kong to anchor its global digital finance strategy as it targets higher returns and prepares for a blockchain-powered future, according to CEO Bill Winters. In a recent interview with the South China Morning Post , Winters praised the city‚Äôs forward-thinking regulatory approach, saying its openness to experimentation has created an ideal environment for developing blockchain solutions that can transform financial services. He pointed to the Hong Kong Monetary Authority‚Äôs (HKMA) pilot programmes on tokenized deposits, wholesale central bank digital currencies and stablecoins as examples of how regulators are enabling innovation without compromising safety. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre going to remain ahead on digital technology, and what we lose in margin, we‚Äôre going to make up in volume by providing a better service to our customers,‚Äù Winters said. Hong Kong Deepens Fintech Ambitions With Fintech 2030 Hong Kong‚Äôs push to become a global hub for digital finance gained fresh momentum last week. The Hong Kong Monetary Authority launched its five-year ‚ÄúFintech 2030‚Äù strategy to accelerate innovation across the city‚Äôs financial system. The plan focuses on four pillars (data and payments, artificial intelligence, resilience and tokenization) together forming the DART framework. This roadmap will guide the next wave of Hong Kong‚Äôs fintech growth. In addition, the initiative includes more than 40 programmes aimed at integrating new technologies, strengthening cybersecurity and expanding financial inclusion. Collectively, these efforts could help the sector surpass $600b in revenue by 2032. Hong Kong will allow licensed crypto exchanges to connect with global order books, ending its current isolated trading model. #HongKong #Crypto https://t.co/f8Lj9NKxoR ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) November 3, 2025 Regulators are also easing constraints on digital asset trading. Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) Chief Executive Julia Leung said licensed crypto exchanges in Hong Kong will soon be allowed to link with global order books , enabling local platforms to tap into broader liquidity and attract more institutional players. Standard Chartered Builds Momentum In Capital-Light, High-Return Digital Segments Standard Chartered has played an active role in the HKMA‚Äôs regulatory sandboxes, where new blockchain applications are tested in controlled settings. Winters said blockchain technology could lower transaction costs and improve efficiency across financial services. ‚ÄúUltimately, people will prioritise moving money securely, efficiently and cheaply,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúFinancial markets always find a way.‚Äù He added that the bank would continue to strengthen compliance with anti-money-laundering and fraud-prevention rules as it scales digital operations. Growth In High-Return Segments Lifts Standard Chartered‚Äôs Quarterly Earnings Standard Chartered‚Äôs commitment to digital finance is already paying off. In the third quarter, the bank‚Äôs net profit rose 10% to $1.03b, beating analyst expectations. The performance was driven by growth in capital-light, high-return segments such as wealth management, cross-border payments and digital finance. ‚ÄúThose areas are less capital-intensive, higher-returning and fast-growing, so we‚Äôre happy to keep deploying resources there,‚Äù Winters said. Hong Kong remains a key investment destination for Standard Chartered‚Äôs affluent and wealth management business across Asia, the Middle East and Africa. The bank plans to invest $1.5b in wealth management over the next five years. This move reinforces its long-term commitment to the region. For Bill Winters, Hong Kong‚Äôs growing regulatory clarity and strong institutional participation strengthen its appeal. Moreover, the city‚Äôs openness to blockchain innovation makes it central to Standard Chartered‚Äôs digital finance roadmap. The post Standard Chartered Sets Sights on Hong Kong as Core of Blockchain Ambitions appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Trump Basically Said XRP Without Saying XRP
body: In a recent video shared by crypto enthusiast XRPee (@XRPee3), remarks from U.S. President Donald Trump have reignited debate over modernizing America‚Äôs financial infrastructure. The clip features Trump speaking about how the country‚Äôs payment and money transfer systems remain ‚Äú decades out of date ,‚Äù and how new legislation would make the entire framework ‚Äúeligible for a 21st century upgrade using the state-of-the-art crypto technology.‚Äù Trump‚Äôs comments struck a familiar chord within the XRP community. The statement about crypto-driven modernization came at a time when many digital asset advocates have emphasized the need for scalable blockchain systems capable of supporting global financial settlements. XRP supporters in particular view these remarks as aligning closely with the use cases long associated with Ripple‚Äôs XRP-powered payment solutions and technology. He basically said XRP without saying XRP pic.twitter.com/CytuHZdcCu ‚Äî XRPee (@XRPee3) November 8, 2025 Interpretation of Trump‚Äôs Message In his response to Trump‚Äôs comments, XRPee told his audience that the president had effectively confirmed what many in the crypto space have been saying for years. ‚ÄúYou can no longer deny the fact that the reset is happening in real time,‚Äù he said, adding that most Americans ‚Äúhave no clue‚Äù about the scale of the change taking place behind the scenes. He argued that Trump‚Äôs statement showed that cryptocurrencies will be the backbone of this transition , and he suggests that XRP and similar technologies could play a role in this shift, given their design for real-time, low-cost transactions. While Trump did not name any specific cryptocurrency, XRPee emphasized that his comments align with the direction Ripple and its ecosystem have pursued for over a decade. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 How XRP Fits into the Conversation The XRP Ledger has been positioned as a solution to inefficiencies Trump described. It enables near-instant cross-border settlements without relying on outdated intermediary networks. The idea that ‚Äúpayments and money transfers are costly and take days or even weeks to clear,‚Äù as Trump stated, mirrors the problem Ripple has long sought to solve through its use of blockchain technology. For years, Ripple executives and developers have described their system as an upgrade to the traditional infrastructure underpinning the global financial system. Although Trump‚Äôs statement was delivered in the context of a legislative proposal, it has resonated strongly among crypto enthusiasts who believe the financial reset is underway. While Trump never mentioned XRP directly, his acknowledgment of crypto technology as key to modernizing America‚Äôs financial system has been interpreted by many as a signal that the era of XRP integration and adoption may be closer than expected. body: BitcoinWorld Simple to Join, Hard to Miss ‚Äì HTX Launches ‚ÄúEarn as You Borrow‚Äù Week for Traders to Capture Market Opportunities at Lower Cost PANAMA CITY, Nov. 10, 2025 /PRNewswire/ ‚Äî HTX today announced the launch of ‚ÄúEarn as You Borrow‚Äù Week, a limited-time borrowing campaign offering triple rewards. The campaign, running from 16:00 on November 7 to 15:59 on November 14 (UTC), is designed to help users manage funds more efficiently and seize opportunities in volatile markets. The campaign is simple to participate in, with exceptional discounts and no entry requirements. Users who complete KYC verification and take margin loans or collateral swaps will enjoy real, tangible savings. Let us dive into the campaign for details. https://www.htx.com/support/35016819991657 Event 1: Enjoy Up to 30% Interest Rebate on USDT Loans To meet strong demand for stablecoin borrowing during market swings, HTX is launching tiered rebates for USDT loans. During the event, users who borrow USDT via HTX Margin or Collateral Swap (formerly Crypto Loans) will receive a rebate of up to 30% of the actual interest paid, based on cumulative borrowing volume. The specific rules are as follows: Borrow ‚â•10,000 USDT to receive a 10% rebate; Borrow ‚â•100,000 USDT to receive a 20% rebate; Borrow ‚â•1,000,000 USDT to win a 30% rebate. Event 2: Up to 50% Off Borrowing Costs on PoW Token Loans ‚Äì Exclusive for Prime Users HTX is also rolling out loan interest rate discounts for BTC and other major PoW assets. During the event, users borrowing BTC, LTC, DOGE, BCH, or ETC via HTX Margin or Collateral Swap will receive tiered interest reductions according to their Prime level: Average users: 10% off; Prime 1-3: 30% off; Prime 4 and above: 50% off. The discount applies automatically with no extra steps required. Higher Prime levels unlock deeper savings, giving traders a notable cost advantage in hedging, arbitrage, or margin trading. Event 3: Borrow & Earn ‚Äì Interest Vouchers for Every Participant All participants who borrow a cumulative total of 20,000 USDT (or equivalent) across any supported cryptocurrency via HTX Margin or Collateral Swap will receive a 10% Interest Voucher, capped at 300 USDT. The voucher is valid for 14 days and can be applied to future margin loans or swaps. It also works in combination with Prime discounts for even greater savings. In fast-moving crypto markets, time defines opportunity, and cost defines advantage. Through these three rewards, HTX significantly helps boost users‚Äô capital efficiency at lower costs and empowers them to join and earn with greater flexibility and confidence. title: Morning brief: Senate strikes shutdown deal, BBC turmoil, Bitcoin soars past $106K
body: Washington inches toward reopening as Senate Democrats cut a deal to end the record-breaking shutdown. In London, the BBC reels from a leadership shake-up after a Trump documentary scandal. Meanwhile, Beijing and Washington ease trade tensions with reciprocal port fee suspensions, and Bitcoin rockets past $106,000, signaling renewed confidence in crypto markets. A glance at the major developments this morning. Senate Democrats strike deal to end shutdown After 40 tense days of the longest government shutdown in US history, Senate Democrats finally struck a breakthrough deal on Sunday. In a 60‚Äì40 vote, the Senate agreed to move forward with a bipartisan plan to get most of the government back up and running through January 30, 2026. Eight Democrats crossed party lines to back the measure, bowing to growing frustration from the public over unpaid federal workers and airport chaos caused by the shutdown. The deal includes guaranteed back pay for federal employees and restores full SNAP benefits, but Democrats had to compromise on one key issue: immediate extensions to Affordable Care Act subsidies. Instead, they secured a promise for a future Senate vote on those health care provisions. The agreement now heads to the House, which still needs to approve it before the government officially reopens. BBC chief quits over Trump documentary scandal The BBC was thrown into chaos this weekend after both Director General Tim Davie and News CEO Deborah Turness resigned over a major controversy surrounding a Panorama documentary about former President Donald Trump. The program came under fire for allegedly editing together parts of Trump‚Äôs January 6 speech in a way that made it look like he directly urged his supporters to ‚Äúfight like hell‚Äù and storm the Capitol, something critics say was misleading and unfair. The backlash was swift, sparking accusations of bias and deepening concerns about the BBC‚Äôs editorial standards. Davie said he took ‚Äúultimate responsibility‚Äù for what happened and that stepping down was his own decision. Turness, meanwhile, admitted the situation had become too damaging for the organization, saying accountability had to come first. Trump wasted no time responding, blasting the BBC as ‚Äúcorrupt journalists.‚Äù China, US pause port fees amid thaw China announced it‚Äôs suspending port fees on US-linked vessels for a full year starting November 10, 2025, a move that marks a rare moment of calm in the ongoing trade tensions between the two countries. According to the Chinese transport ministry, the decision comes as part of a reciprocal deal after the US agreed to pause its own retaliatory port fees on Chinese ships. It‚Äôs a small but meaningful step toward cooling things down in the maritime trade arena, where costs and delays have been piling up for months. The suspension is expected to give global shipping networks some breathing room by easing financial and logistical pressures. For shipping companies, it‚Äôs a welcome bit of relief. And for both Washington and Beijing, it‚Äôs a sign they‚Äôre at least trying to steer relations, and their shipbuilding industries, back into smoother waters. Bitcoin blazes past $106K as crypto markets rally Bitcoin has smashed through the $106,000 mark, setting a new record in what‚Äôs shaping up to be one of its most powerful rallies yet. The surge comes as big financial institutions and corporations continue jumping on board, with some even parking portions of their treasuries in Bitcoin, a sign that mainstream adoption is accelerating fast. Behind the rally, improvements to the Bitcoin network itself have made transactions more efficient and secure, adding to investor confidence. This latest high blows past previous records, climbing roughly 60% above the 2021 peak of around $65,000. Yes, Bitcoin is still volatile as it always has been, but the market‚Äôs tone feels different this time. Stronger network activity, clearer regulations, and a more mature ecosystem are giving investors reason to believe this isn‚Äôt just another short-term spike, but part of a longer, steadier climb. The post Morning brief: Senate strikes shutdown deal, BBC turmoil, Bitcoin soars past $106K appeared first on Invezz

title: Hong Kong Launches ‚ÄòDigitally Native‚Äô Bonds to Intensify Crypto Hub Ambitions
body: Hong Kong is marketing multi-currency digital bonds for the third time, with an aim to become a global hub for digital assets. Bloomberg reported Monday that the new set of ‚Äúdigitally native‚Äù bonds will be denominated in US dollars, Hong Kong dollars, euros and offshore yuan. Sources familiar with the move said that the deal could be priced as early as Monday. A digital bond is a type of security issued and managed using blockchain technology. The blockchain allows the bond‚Äôs details and ownership to be recorded securely and transparently on a digital ledger. The latest offering of digitally native bonds across multiple currencies can be issued on public blockchains like Ethereum or via DLT platforms offered by HSBC Holdings or Goldman Sachs. Hong Kong is marketing a new set of ‚Äúdigitally native‚Äù bonds denominated in multiple currencies, intensifying the city‚Äôs drive to become a global hub for digital assets https://t.co/uZjZ8bDhUh ‚Äî Bloomberg (@business) November 10, 2025 Digital Bonds Gain Traction in Hong Kong Hong Kong‚Äôs latest move builds on the city‚Äôs established tokenized bond frameworks announced in 2024. The HKMA introduced its second tokenized green bond in 2023 , aiming to leverage blockchain for transparency in the redemption process. Besides, Hong Kong has solidified its position as Asia‚Äôs leading international bond issuance hub . It accounts for nearly 30% of Asian international bond issuances, topping the regional league table for nine years. The announcement to sell digital green bonds comes days after global asset manager Franklin Templeton launched Hong Kong‚Äôs first tokenized money-market fund. The fund uses blockchain to boost transparency and transaction efficiency and is initially open to institutional investors. Further, Hong Kong-based corporates issue at least six digital notes, Bloomberg noted. These notes have raised a total of $1 billion with four launching this year. Rain Yin, Director at S&P Global Ratings, said that the firm has given AA+ rating to the proposed digital notes. ‚ÄúThose are mitigated by a plan that requires, ultimately, shifting the notes to the traditional systems in case of disruption.‚Äù The post Hong Kong Launches ‚ÄòDigitally Native‚Äô Bonds to Intensify Crypto Hub Ambitions appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Robert Kiyosaki Predicts Crash and Doubles Down on Bitcoin
body: Kiyosaki set bold price targets of $27,000 for gold and $250,000 for Bitcoin by 2026. His bullish outlook was shared amid rising market uncertainty and recent analysis showing Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamentals hinting at a rebound. However, contrasting views from market analysts paint a more cautious picture, with whales and long-term holders offloading assets and driving persistent sell pressure, very similar to the post-dot-com crash era. Analysts suggest this consolidation phase could last up to another year. Kiyosaki Bets on Hard Assets Rich Dad Poor Dad author Robert Kiyosaki reinforced his bullish stance on hard assets by saying he‚Äôs buying more gold, silver, Bitcoin, and Ethereum as global markets brace for what he believes will be an inevitable financial crash. In a post that was shared on X on Sunday, Kiyosaki warned of an impending downturn but said he is preparing for it by accumulating assets he describes as ‚Äúreal money.‚Äù He also set ambitious price targets of $27,000 for gold, $100 for silver, and $250,000 for Bitcoin by 2026. Kiyosaki attributed his gold forecast to economist Jim Rickards, while his Bitcoin projection aligns with his long-standing belief that BTC serves as a hedge against what he calls the Federal Reserve‚Äôs ‚Äúfake money.‚Äù The bestselling author also revealed that he is turning increasingly optimistic about Ethereum, thanks to Fundstrat‚Äôs Tom Lee, who views the blockchain as the foundation for stablecoins and a crucial infrastructure for global finance. Kiyosaki said his investment philosophy is rooted in Gresham‚Äôs Law ‚Äî the idea that bad money drives out good ‚Äî and Metcalfe‚Äôs Law, which links a network‚Äôs value to its number of users. In addition to this, the outspoken financial educator once again criticized the US Treasury and the Federal Reserve for excessive money printing, and accused them of turning the United States into the ‚Äúbiggest debtor nation in history.‚Äù After once again sharing his well-known mantra that ‚Äúsavers are losers,‚Äù Kiyosaki urged investors to buy tangible assets even during market corrections, and argued that the coming crisis will widen the gap between real and ‚Äúfake‚Äù money. On-chain indicators may actually support Kiyosaki‚Äôs optimism. Data from analytics firm Crypto Crib shows that Bitcoin‚Äôs Market Value to Realised Value (MVRV) ratio returned to 1.8, which is a level that historically preceded big rebounds of 30% to 50%. Meanwhile, former BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes predicted that the Federal Reserve will soon resort to ‚Äústealth quantitative easing‚Äù to manage the ballooning US debt. Hayes said this form of hidden liquidity injection through the Fed‚Äôs Standing Repo Facility will quietly boost asset prices, particularly Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Crypto Faces Heavy Whale Selling On the other hand, crypto whales and long-term holders are cashing out and putting consistent selling pressure on the market, keeping prices subdued. This is according to analyst Jordi Visser . He compared the current state of the crypto market to the aftermath of the 2000s dot-com bubble, where tech stocks plunged by up to 80% and then spent more than a decade consolidating before recovering their highs. Visser explained that during that period, venture capitalists and insiders who invested in early-stage tech companies were locked into their positions due to investment restrictions, and once those lock-up periods expired, they began offloading their holdings into every market rally in search of liquidity. Visser said a similar dynamic is now playing out in crypto, as early investors and insiders in projects like Solana, Ethereum, and Bitcoin sell their holdings during every price rebound, weighing down the broader market. He clarified that it will not take 16 years for the crypto sector to recover as it did for tech stocks, but used the comparison to explain that the market is in a prolonged consolidation phase that could last up to another year before a decisive rebound occurs. The comments were made as sentiment across the digital asset market turned increasingly cautious. Many analysts and investment firms have scaled back their bullish forecasts, with some suggesting that a bear market may have started in October. Bitcoin, which recently dipped below $106,000, showed some early signs of stabilizing around the $100,000 level, though some analysts warn that continued selling pressure could push the price as low as $92,000. BTC‚Äôs price action over the past month (Source: CoinMarketCap ) According to CryptoQuant analyst Julio Moreno , the selling activity by whales and long-term holders is not inherently negative‚Äîit only becomes a drag on prices when demand fails to absorb the new supply entering the market. Moreno pointed out that since October, long-term holder selling increased as demand simultaneously weakened, leaving the market unable to sustain higher prices. This combination of diminished demand and persistent whale selling created a grinding market environment that is very similar to the consolidation seen in past post-bubble periods. This suggests that crypto may still have some way to go before a clear recovery begins.

title: Upbit MOC Suspension: Critical Network Update Temporarily Halts Transactions
body: BitcoinWorld Upbit MOC Suspension: Critical Network Update Temporarily Halts Transactions Attention cryptocurrency investors! South Korea‚Äôs leading exchange Upbit has announced a temporary suspension of Moss Coin (MOC) deposits and withdrawals starting November 12 at 9:00 AM UTC. This crucial Upbit MOC suspension comes as the platform prepares for a significant network switch that could impact your trading activities. Why Is Upbit Implementing This MOC Suspension? The primary reason behind this temporary halt is a network migration for Moss Coin. When blockchain networks undergo upgrades or switches, exchanges must pause transactions to ensure security and prevent potential losses. This Upbit MOC suspension demonstrates the exchange‚Äôs commitment to protecting user assets during technical transitions. Network switches involve complex technical processes that require: Complete synchronization with the new blockchain Security verification of all transaction pathways Testing of deposit and withdrawal mechanisms Validation of smart contract functionality What Does This Mean for MOC Holders? If you currently hold Moss Coin on Upbit, here‚Äôs what you need to know about this Upbit MOC suspension . During the maintenance period, you cannot deposit new MOC tokens to your Upbit wallet or withdraw existing holdings. However, your assets remain secure in your account, and trading of MOC against other cryptocurrencies may continue unaffected. This temporary measure actually benefits users in several ways: Prevents transaction errors during network transition Ensures smooth migration to upgraded blockchain Maintains the integrity of your digital assets Provides time for comprehensive security checks When Will Normal Services Resume? Upbit has indicated that the Upbit MOC suspension will begin precisely at 9:00 AM UTC on November 12. The exchange typically provides updates through official channels once the network switch completes successfully. Users should monitor Upbit‚Äôs announcement page for the resumption notice, as the duration depends on the complexity of the migration process. Historical data shows that similar network upgrades usually take between 2-8 hours, but preparation is key. Therefore, plan your MOC transactions accordingly and avoid last-minute transfers around the suspension timeframe. How Can You Prepare for the Suspension? Smart cryptocurrency management means anticipating such events. Before the Upbit MOC suspension takes effect, consider these proactive steps: Complete any urgent MOC deposits or withdrawals beforehand Monitor Upbit‚Äôs official communication channels regularly Keep your account security measures updated Diversify your trading strategies to account for temporary limitations Remember that such suspensions are standard industry practice during network upgrades. Major exchanges like Upbit implement these measures to protect user funds and ensure seamless transition to improved blockchain networks. What Are the Long-Term Benefits? While temporary inconveniences exist, this Upbit MOC suspension ultimately serves the Moss Coin ecosystem‚Äôs growth. Network upgrades typically bring enhanced features such as faster transaction speeds, lower fees, improved security, and better scalability. These improvements can potentially increase MOC‚Äôs utility and market value over time. The cryptocurrency space evolves rapidly, and periodic network maintenance ensures your investments remain compatible with the latest technological advancements. Upbit‚Äôs proactive approach demonstrates their commitment to providing a secure and updated trading environment. Final Thoughts: Navigating Temporary Disruptions The upcoming Upbit MOC suspension represents a necessary step toward technological progress in the blockchain space. While temporary transaction halts might cause minor disruptions, they ultimately contribute to a more robust and efficient cryptocurrency infrastructure. Stay informed, plan ahead, and recognize that these measures protect your digital assets in the long run. The cryptocurrency landscape requires adaptability from both exchanges and users. Upbit‚Äôs transparent communication about the Moss Coin network switch sets a positive industry standard for handling such technical transitions responsibly. Frequently Asked Questions Can I trade MOC during the suspension? Typically, trading continues normally during deposit and withdrawal suspensions. However, check Upbit‚Äôs specific announcement for confirmation. How long will the Upbit MOC suspension last? Upbit hasn‚Äôt specified an end time, but similar network upgrades usually take 2-8 hours. Monitor official channels for updates. Are my MOC coins safe during this period? Yes, your existing MOC holdings remain secure in your Upbit wallet throughout the suspension. Will this affect MOC‚Äôs market price? Temporary suspensions rarely cause significant price impacts unless combined with other market factors. Should I move my MOC to another exchange before the suspension? Only if you need immediate access during the suspension period. Otherwise, waiting is generally safer to avoid transfer risks. How will I know when services resume? Upbit will publish an official announcement on their website and social media channels once normal operations restore. Share This Important Update Help other cryptocurrency enthusiasts stay informed about this crucial development! Share this article on your social media platforms to ensure the Moss Coin community remains updated about the Upbit suspension and network upgrade. Knowledge sharing strengthens our collective ability to navigate the dynamic crypto landscape successfully. title: Senate leaders reached a bipartisan deal that could reopen the U.S. government
body: The agreement between Democrats and Republicans in the U.S. Senate to end the prolonged federal government shutdown could offer relief not only to the economy but also to cryptocurrency markets, which have faced regulatory stagnation during the closure. The proposal passed a key procedural vote 60‚Äì40 and is expected to proceed to a final vote later this week before heading to the House for approval. They still need to vote to make it official, but the results will likely be positive, as both parties support the plan. The U.S. Senate plans to end the shutdown It‚Äôs now 40 days since the government shutdown, and citizens across the country are feeling the effects firsthand as public offices remain closed, federal workers haven‚Äôt been paid, and government services continue to be delayed. The shutdown has primarily affected financial markets, including cryptocurrency, as investors tend to dislike uncertainty. Republican Senate Majority Leader John Thune has made numerous attempts to meet with lawmakers from both parties, marking his 15th effort to resolve the issue. However, there is a glimmer of hope because senators are working on a three-part budget plan that will keep the government open until the end of January. Lawmakers will vote in December to extend tax credits from the Affordable Care Act for one more year and prevent or reverse layoffs of federal workers that happened during the shutdown. Senators received the final version of the budget bills before the weekend vote, allowing them more time to review the plan‚Äôs mission. And because the current situation is urgent, they have to return to Washington for a rare weekend session to vote on the plan. If all goes well, the Senate will proceed with the budget plan, and the government will finally open its doors after more than a month of shutdown. The crypto market reacts as the uncertainty goes down, and policies become clearer The price of Bitcoin increased rapidly and reached around $126,080 when the shutdown began, as investors saw an opportunity to buy while traditional markets remained uncertain about the future. However, as the shutdown lasted longer than expected, Bitcoin‚Äôs value fell by over 17% to approximately $104,370. This drop in Bitcoin occurred around the same time that President Donald Trump announced 100% tariffs on China, which unsettled global markets. Analysts say investors hesitated to buy, and institutions that planned to enter the crypto market stayed away because they were unsure how long the shutdown would last. Traders and analysts are closely monitoring the current situation, as past government shutdowns have had a similar impact on the cryptocurrency market. During the shutdown between December 2018 and January 2019, the price of Bitcoin increased from roughly $3,550 to $13,000 over the next five months after the government reopened. Prediction markets also expect the shutdown to end soon, as the probability that it will reopen between Tuesday and Friday increased from 27% to 54% on Polymarket. President Trump also announced that most Americans may receive a $2,000 dividend from tariff revenue to increase consumer spending and inject more money into the economy. Analysts will closely monitor the timing of the Senate vote, as the market could remain nervous and Bitcoin prices could fluctuate if lawmakers delay or contest the vote. They will also study how other cryptocurrencies behave in the first 24 to 72 hours after the government officially reopens and monitor trading volumes, as they represent the confidence among traders. Resolving the shutdown will restore confidence among traders and allow the cryptocurrency market to recover properly. Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies might also increase in value when new institutional investors show interest. Join Bybit now and claim a $50 bonus in minutes

title: The Weeks-Long-Awaited Positive News from the US Has Finally Arrived! Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Altcoins Are on the Rise! Here's Everything You Need to Know‚Ä¶
body: The US government has been shut down for over a month. While this has negatively impacted markets, including cryptocurrencies, the long-awaited agreement may finally be coming. The first step toward reopening the government has been taken, with the US Senate passing a temporary funding bill that will fund the government until January, according to The Block. The bill passed with 60 votes in favor and 40 against. This decision followed reports that senators had reached a partial deal to end the government shutdown. Fourteen previous Senate votes failed to meet the 60 votes needed to enact the budget bill. While there are still hurdles to overcome, this vote paves the way for the shutdown to end by the end of this week. The bill must pass the House of Representatives before it goes to US President Donald Trump's desk for signature. As you may recall, Donald Trump also stated that he believed the shutdown would end soon. Bitcoin and Altcoins Started the New Week with an Uptrend! Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and altcoins are on the rise, fueled by renewed optimism in global markets following news that the government shutdown in the US may soon end. Bitcoin rose 4.5% in the last 24 hours to $106,100, while Ethereum rose 6.5% to $3,600. XRP gained 8.4%, BNB gained 3%, and Solana gained 7%. Peter Chung, Head of Research at Presto Research, said the positive political move from the Senate has helped ease recent market pressures. ‚ÄúThe prolonged closure reduced market liquidity and exacerbated market tensions over the past few weeks,‚Äù Chung said. ‚ÄúHowever, the fact that this situation is now fading paves the way for risk assets to price in a positive macro environment, namely looser monetary policy, the end of trade disputes, and ahead of next year's midterm elections.‚Äù Vincent Liu, chief investment officer at Kronos Research, also said that the rise in Bitcoin and altcoins was helped by decreasing macro uncertainty and renewed policy optimism. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: The Weeks-Long-Awaited Positive News from the US Has Finally Arrived! Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Altcoins Are on the Rise! Here's Everything You Need to Know‚Ä¶

title: Donald Trump to Distribute $2,000 to Americans Using Tariff Revenue ‚Äì Had Pumped Bitcoin During Covid Period
body: US President Donald Trump has announced a new payment program that will be financed by revenues from the country's customs duties. Trump, in a post on Truth Social, said most citizens, except high-income Americans, will receive payments of at least $2,000. Trump stated that the US has collected ‚Äútrillions of dollars‚Äù in tariffs, adding that these revenues would be used both to reduce the $37 trillion national debt and to give citizens ‚Äúthe rewards they deserve.‚Äù While praising the country's economic outlook, Trump lashed out at those criticizing the tariffs, calling them ‚Äúidiots.‚Äù Chart showing the reaction of the BTC price to the Covid incentives announced at the end of 2020. Related News: Russian Cryptocurrency Fraudster Kidnapped in Dubai and Murdered for Not Paying the Ransom Trump argued that the US has now become ‚Äúthe richest and most respected country in the world.‚Äù In his post, he claimed that inflation is near zero, stock market indices are breaking records, and 401(k) retirement accounts have reached their highest value in history. He also said that investment in the country and factory construction across the country are at a ‚Äúhistoric peak.‚Äù In the same series of statements, Trump also addressed Republicans, stating that the lengthy government shutdowns that have led to the shutdown should be abolished. He argued that Republicans should shorten the process, reopen the government, and win the upcoming midterm elections by ‚Äúpassing big things.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. title: SACHI Unlocks the Next Level of Nightlife Loyalty with Creator-First, Token-Gated Residencies
body: The Evolution of Entertainment Despite the explosion of both online and real-world entertainment channels, very few have succeeded in converting fleeting digital followings into deep, loyal communities that drive meaningful engagement and generate consistent revenue in physical spaces. The gap between online popularity and real-world connection remains wide ‚Äì and ripe for innovation. This is precisely where SACHI steps in. The platform introduces a pioneering framework that fuses the viral energy of the creator economy with the unrepeatable spontaneity that defines legendary nightlife. It‚Äôs a cultural bridge between digital influence and physical experience, built to empower creators while captivating their audiences in completely new ways. At first glance, SACHI might appear to be simply another event collective tailored to modern tastes ‚Äì and that‚Äôs partly true. But the vision goes far beyond that. SACHI is designing the infrastructure for a new era of audience conversion, loyalty, and community, embodied in what it calls ‚ÄúCreator-First Nightlife.‚Äù Redefining the Residency: Spikes for Conversion Bursts At the core of SACHI‚Äôs Creator-First Nightlife concept lies its innovative approach to the Residency . Traditionally, clubs and venues rely on resident performers to maintain steady, predictable turnouts night after night. SACHI reimagines this model by tapping into the built-in audiences of leading DJs, streamers, and influencers, creating events that pulse with high energy and full-capacity crowds. ‚ÄúThe key insight is that a creator‚Äôs audience arrives in spikes ‚Äì when a live stream starts, when a new track drops, or when a major announcement hits,‚Äù explains Jonas Marti≈°ius, CEO of SACHI. ‚ÄúOur Residencies are engineered to harness these moments, transforming them into premium, time-sensitive experiences that drive powerful conversion bursts. It‚Äôs as much about brand momentum as it is about unforgettable nights.‚Äù This precision-driven strategy ensures that while attendees may initially ‚Äúcome for the DJ,‚Äù the experience keeps them engaged long after, fostering loyalty to the broader SACHI community and nightlife culture. From Viewer to Regular: Unlocking Token-Gated Nights SACHI has created an ecosystem built to keep audiences coming back for more ‚Äì because every experience here is designed to feel one of a kind. The ongoing demand to enter these premium spaces becomes a natural incentive, pushing fans to secure project-issued or community-earned tokens that grant access to SACHI‚Äôs exclusive Token-Gated Nights. These Token-Gated Nights represent a crossover of cutting-edge Web3 technology with the timeless appeal of high-profile residencies. In this system, digital tokens function as proof of membership ‚Äì credentials that grant entry into real-world sections where unforgettable, once-in-a-lifetime experiences await. Participation can be as simple as following or subscribing to a creator online, making access both rewarding and attainable. Token-gating serves as a frictionless on-ramp, transforming a viewer‚Äôs admiration for a creator into tangible privileges that establish their place within SACHI‚Äôs exclusive communities. These tokens can unlock special privileges such as artist meet-and-greets, VIP seating, or priority access to upcoming events. Through this tiered structure, SACHI builds both anticipation and loyalty. At its core, this system turns quick social media interactions into real community connections. SACHI is redefining how audiences connect with creators, turning engagement into equity, and participation into belonging. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre giving the audience a piece of the action ‚Äì a verifiable stake in the scene they‚Äôre helping to build,‚Äù said Jonas Martisius, CEO of SACHI. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not just about controlling entry; it‚Äôs about acknowledging passion, rewarding dedication, and turning casual viewers into lifelong insiders.‚Äù The Blueprint for the Future of Creator-Led Entertainment SACHI believes that the future of entertainment involves the complete integration of performers and their audiences into wholesome, shared experiences. It is now providing a framework that converts audience loyalty and interactions with their favorite creators into a mutually beneficial environment where creators gain a reliable, high-impact venue for growth and monetization, while token-holding communities enjoy unique experiences. The key message is clear: The era of passive viewing is over. SACHI is building the active, engaged, and token-gated nightlife of tomorrow. Stay informed and learn more To stay informed about the next wave of Creator-First Nightlife and to learn more about upcoming residencies and token-gated access: Visit our website: https://sachi.game/ Follow the movement on X (formerly Twitter): @join_sachi Join the conversation on Telegram: t.me/sachigame Media Contact: Jonas Martisius CEO of SACHI jonas@sachi.game +359879164806

title: Five spot XRP ETFs have just appeared on the DTCC list
body: Five spot XRP ETFs from CoinShares, Franklin Templeton, 21Shares, Canary Capital, and Bitwise have just popped up on the DTTC list. CoinShares‚Äô XRPL, Franklin‚Äôs XRPZ, 21Shares‚Äô TOXR, Canary‚Äôs XRPC, and Bitwise‚Äôs XRP ETF (XRP) are expected to hit the U.S. market by the end of November. The DTCC list, last updated on Friday, includes both active ETFs that may be processed at the DTCC and pre-launch ETFs that cannot yet be processed at the DTCC. Pre-launch ETFs usually lack the necessary regulatory and other approvals. Cryptopolitan reported nearly a week ago that XRP ETFs are expected to be launched in the U.S. within the next two weeks. U.S. SEC filings reveal that multiple XRP ETF products are in the pipeline, and the removal delay clauses (in S-1s) suggest that their approval is almost guaranteed. Cryptopolitan also noted that REX-Osprey‚Äôs XRPR ETF is already active in the U.S. markets, and rising XRP ETF speculation has created a market opportunity for XRP Tundra. Geraci predicts XRP ETFs could start launching this week Nate Geraci, co-founder of the ETF Institute, stated earlier today that the end of the government shutdown means the floodgates for spot crypto ETFs are opening. He pointed out that the first ‚Äò33 Act spot XRP ETF could be launched as early as this week. In last week‚Äôs ETF buzz, Geraci disclosed that Canary‚Äôs spot XRP ETF is coming soon, maybe by the end of this week. Canary Capital filed with the U.S. SEC on November 8, seeking to list and trade on The Nasdaq. CoinDesk Indices calculate the Pricing Benchmark based on a 60-minute time-weighted average price of the XRP-USD CCIXber Reference Rate. The Trust also intends to have both Gemini and BitGo as its XRP custodians. Geraci also mentioned that WisdomTree has filed for the CoinDesk 20 ETF, which will hold 20 of the largest crypto assets by market cap that are eligible for inclusion in the index. XRP is expected to account for nearly 19.6% of the total holdings. ‚ÄúSometime in the next two weeks, I expect the launch of first spot xrp ETFs‚Ä¶SEC had open litigation against Ripple for the past five years, up until three months ago‚Ä¶IMO, launch of spot xrp ETFs represents final nail in coffin of previous anti-crypto regulators.‚Äù ‚Äì Nate Geraci , Co-founder of the ETF Institute Geraci‚Äôs weekly ETF buzz revealed that October saw a record month of 136 ETF launches. However, Roundhill CEO Dave Mazza noted that it is difficult for small, upstart issuers to survive in the ETF Terrordome, emphasizing that this fact is well documented. Schwab says investors are flooding into ETFs Charles Schwab‚Äôs latest ETF study suggests that nearly 62% of investors can envision putting all their money into ETFs. Half (50%) said they could be fully invested in ETFs in the next five years. Schwab believes this signals growing affinity for and reliance on ETFs to meet a range of investment needs. Meanwhile, Schwab observed that 66% of the respondents who participated in the study started investing in ETFs within the past five years. The majority of investors (~94%) also agreed that ETFs help them maintain low costs within their portfolios. Another 46% said ETFs offered access to asset classes that would otherwise be inaccessible. David Botset, Managing Director, Head of Strategy, Innovation, and Stewardship at Schwab Asset Management, asserted that the world of investing is undergoing a rapid transformation. He particularly pointed out that ETF investors are at the forefront of this evolving landscape. Botset believes many investors are using ETFs, which now outnumber individual U.S. stocks, for low-cost core portfolio investments. He also claimed that 48% of ETF investors want to be in fixed income allocations. Get seen where it counts. Advertise in Cryptopolitan Research and reach crypto‚Äôs sharpest investors and builders.

title: Why Are Bitcoin OGs Dumping Billions Of Dollars In BTC?
body: A recent report from Bitcoinist highlighted a disturbing trend among early Bitcoin investors that could explain why the cryptocurrency‚Äôs price has been in a perpetual state of decline. According to data from on-chain data analytics platforms, these early Bitcoin whales , who hold thousands of BTC, had begun selling their considerable stash. But even after a month of consistent dumping, it seems these large investors are far from done, and more pain could be ahead. Bitcoin Whales Dump Billions Of Dollars On The Market As the Bitcoinist report showed, two early Bitcoin whales began moving their holdings into centralized exchanges back in October. This selling continued into the new month, and by the first week of November, these two whales had sent more than 16,000 BTC to exchanges. In total, the value of the BTC came out to over $1.7 billion, showing the considerable sell pressure that Bitcoin had faced at the time. Following these initial sell-offs into the start of November, there seemed to be a slowdown in the selling , but this did not last very long. On-chain data platform Lookonchain reported that the whales were back at it once again, and this time, one of the whales had returned and looks to be selling the rest of their holdings. Bitcoin OG Owen Gunden is at the center of all of this selling, recently moving the last of his considerable Bitcoin holdings onto a centralized exchange. In total, Gunden sent 3,549 BTC worth $362.84 million at the time of the transaction to the Kraken exchange, after previously sending out 600 BTC worth $61.17 million. In total, Gunden has sent 11,000 BTC worth $1.12 billion to exchanges, presumably to sell . Why The Selling Is Ramping Up With these early Bitcoin whales on the move and triggering significant selling pressure on the market, the question has been why these investors are choosing to sell now after waiting for all of this time. This comes as the $100,000 level remains threatened, and these billion-dollar sell-offs could trigger a bear market. While crypto community members look for some deep meaning in the sell-offs, crypto influencer Udi Wertheimer gave a short and precise answer: the OGs are simply taking profit. These whales had bought their BTC when it was dirt cheap and have held onto their stash for around 15 years. Having grown considerably since then, with most becoming billionaires, it is only natural for these whales to sell and cash out their profits. Instead of asking why the whales are selling, Wertheimer explains that what investors should really be asking is ‚Äúwhy is btc price not down -70% when so many OGs are selling?‚Äù Given the strength that Bitcoin is demonstrating amid the selling, the crypto influencer believes ‚Äúthat‚Äôs what should keep the bears up at night.‚Äù

title: South Korea debuts AI ETF to tap surging investor demand
body: Korea Investment Management‚Äôs ACE U.S. AI Tech Core Industry Active Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF), which launched on October 28, is seeing a surge in demand. On-chain data showed that the ETF recorded individual net purchases of 28 billion Korean won on its establishment day. The ACE U.S. AI Tech Core Industry Active ETF also surpassed cumulative individual net purchases of 76 billion Korean won within five days of listing. A source from Korea Investment Management argued that the evolution of AI technology is a structural renewal across industries, which is already deeply permeating every aspect of daily life. He also told local media that investing in the AI sector is no longer a question of whether to invest but what and how to invest. Korea Investment Management‚Äôs ETF encompasses the entire AI value chain According to Korea Investment Management, the ACE U.S. AI Tech Core Industry Active ETF captures the industrial technological shift driven by artificial intelligence. The firm also acknowledged that the fund dynamically adjusts investment weights across four core industries, including computing infrastructure, AI hardware, energy infrastructure, and AI software. The investment manager noted that the AI industry has an ecosystem where leading sectors change at each stage of development. The firm confirmed that its ETF encompasses the entire AI value chain and reflects market trends as well. ‚ÄúAI, big tech, and semiconductors are not short-term trend sectors but megatrends fundamentally transforming industrial structures. Broad benefits are expected from AI infrastructure to application stages, and their influence will grow as changes accelerate.‚Äù ‚Äì Nam Yong-soo , Head of ETF Management Division at Korea Investment Management. Yong-soo also revealed that ACE ETFs categorizes market trends into core axes to design investment areas. He added that the fund will continue to present strategic alternatives tailored to investor demand. The tech executive also argued that now is the optimal timing for AI investment for those aiming to stand at the center of artificial investment innovation. Korea Investment Management acknowledged that it has strengthened its focus on U.S. technology and growth stocks since it rebranded its ACE ETF lineup. One of the company‚Äôs products in its lineup is the ACE U.S. Big Tech TOP7 Plus ETF. Korea Investment Management strengthens its focus on U.S. tech The firm revealed that the fund focuses its investments in seven major U.S. tech giants, including Google, NVIDIA, Apple, and Microsoft. According to the investment manager, the ETF also captures key growth drivers in the tech space, such as cloud, AI, data centers, and platform business. On-chain data revealed that the ETF has seen continuous capital inflows since its listing in September 2023. The fund recorded a net cumulative individual net purchase of 124 billion Korean won since the start of 2025. The fund has also had 16 consecutive days of individual net purchases and stable returns. On-chain data showed that the ETF recorded a 6-month return of 45.28%, a 1-year return of 45.55%, and a post-listing return of 129.61%. The investment manager rebranded the ACE ETF and launched its first product, the ACE Global Semiconductor TOP4 Plus ETF. According to the firm, the fund is a representative technology stock ETF that focuses on the four major pillars of the global semiconductor market: memory, non-memory, foundry, and semiconductor equipment. Korea Investment Management believes that semiconductors are a core infrastructure industry connected to AI, data centers, and automotive electronics. On-chain data showed that the firm‚Äôs ETF has 632.7 billion Korean won in assets under management. Its assets represent a 103.77% 6-month return and a post-listing return of 377.34%, surpassing 40,000 Korean won per share. At the time of publication, Korea Investment Management‚Äôs stock is exchanging hands at approximately 172,399 KRW If you're reading this, you‚Äôre already ahead. Stay there with our newsletter .

title: Analyst Spots Further XRP Bullish Signal
body: A new analysis by well-known crypto analysts ChartNerd (@ChartNerdTA) and The Great Mattsby (@matthughes13) is putting renewed focus on XRP‚Äôs longer-term technical picture. The chart shared by ChartNerd shows the three-month Ichimoku Cloud setup, an indicator widely used to gauge market momentum and trend direction. What makes this chart stand out is the structural change identified by The Great Mattsby, who noted that XRP is exhibiting behavior never before seen in its price history. According to Mattsby, ‚ÄúThe 3-month Ichimoku Cloud demonstrates how powerful $XRP‚Äôs bull trend actually is.‚Äù $XRP : Further Bullish Signals https://t.co/vyjqqFrVhe pic.twitter.com/Brl3jAyoje ‚Äî ChartNerd (@ChartNerdTA) November 8, 2025 XRP‚Äôs New Bullish Indicator He explained that XRP ‚Äúhas never built a base above the 3-month conversion or baseline in its history, and it‚Äôs doing it now for the past year.‚Äù This development, highlighted in the chart, represents a critical phase for the cryptocurrency. The Ichimoku Cloud‚Äôs conversion and baseline lines often act as dynamic support and resistance levels. Sustained price action above these levels is generally interpreted as confirmation of bullish strength. The current chart shows XRP maintaining its structure above both lines for the past four consecutive quarters. Historically, such positioning has not occurred for the token, which previously struggled to establish stability above these mid-term indicators during prior market cycles. This shift suggests that the asset has transitioned from reactive rallies to a more defined structural uptrend . What the Indicator Suggests for XRP‚Äôs Momentum The Ichimoku Cloud model is designed to show equilibrium within the market. When price action remains above the conversion and baseline for an extended period, it typically signals control by buyers and indicates that pullbacks are being absorbed. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 For XRP, maintaining this position across multiple quarterly candles highlights the possibility of a new long-term base forming. This setup means XRP may be in the early stages of a sustained expansion. The three-month timeframe adds weight to the analysis, as longer intervals filter out short-term volatility and highlight genuine directional strength. Should XRP continue to hold above the baseline, traders could see the next major test around prior resistance zones near the $3 area. Looking Ahead This configuration also offers insight into XRP‚Äôs potential resilience against broader market fluctuations. If the price remains supported above these key Ichimoku levels, it could provide a technical foundation for further growth. While shorter-term corrections are always possible, maintaining structure above these support regions tends to attract more institutional and long-term interest . With XRP trading around $2.46, analysts are closely monitoring whether the asset can preserve this structural base through the coming months. title: Ledger IPO: Bold Move to Transform Crypto Security by 2026
body: BitcoinWorld Ledger IPO: Bold Move to Transform Crypto Security by 2026 Exciting news for crypto enthusiasts: Ledger, the trusted hardware wallet leader, is eyeing a US IPO in 2026. This strategic move could reshape how we secure digital assets, especially with Ledger currently safeguarding a staggering $100 billion in Bitcoin. Let‚Äôs dive into what this means for the crypto world and why it matters to you. What Does the Ledger IPO Mean for Crypto Security? The Ledger IPO represents a major step toward mainstream financial recognition. By going public, Ledger aims to boost transparency and trust in cryptocurrency storage. This development signals growing institutional confidence in crypto infrastructure. Moreover, it highlights the importance of secure hardware solutions in a volatile digital economy. Why Is Ledger‚Äôs $100 Billion Bitcoin Management Significant? Handling $100 billion in Bitcoin isn‚Äôt just a number‚Äîit‚Äôs a testament to Ledger‚Äôs reliability. This massive asset base underscores the demand for robust security in crypto. Here are key reasons why this matters: It demonstrates widespread adoption of hardware wallets It builds investor confidence in Ledger‚Äôs technology It sets a benchmark for competitors in the market Therefore, the Ledger IPO could attract more traditional investors to crypto. How Will the Ledger IPO Impact Everyday Users? If the Ledger IPO proceeds, users might see enhanced product features and support. Public listing often drives innovation and customer-centric updates. However, it also brings regulatory scrutiny, which could lead to stricter compliance measures. Ultimately, this move may make crypto storage safer and more accessible for everyone. What Are the Challenges Ledger Faces? Pursuing a Ledger IPO isn‚Äôt without hurdles. Market volatility and regulatory changes pose risks. Additionally, competition from other wallet providers could pressure growth. Despite these challenges, Ledger‚Äôs strong track record positions it well for success. The alternative of a private investment round offers flexibility if market conditions shift. Conclusion: A New Era for Crypto Security The Ledger IPO plan marks a pivotal moment in cryptocurrency evolution. It bridges decentralized finance with traditional markets, emphasizing security and trust. As 2026 approaches, watch how this development influences global crypto adoption and innovation. Frequently Asked Questions What is a Ledger IPO? A Ledger IPO refers to Ledger‚Äôs potential initial public offering in the US, where it would list shares on a stock exchange to raise capital and increase visibility. When is the Ledger IPO expected? The Ledger IPO is targeted for 2026, though the company might opt for a private investment round instead based on market conditions. How much Bitcoin does Ledger manage? Ledger currently secures approximately $100 billion worth of Bitcoin, highlighting its role as a top hardware wallet provider. Why is the Ledger IPO important? It could boost crypto legitimacy, drive security innovations, and attract institutional investors to the digital asset space. What are the risks of a Ledger IPO? Risks include regulatory hurdles, market volatility, and increased competition in the crypto security sector. How can I stay updated on the Ledger IPO? Follow reputable crypto news sources and Ledger‚Äôs official announcements for the latest developments. Found this insight on the Ledger IPO helpful? Share it with your network on social media to spark conversations about crypto‚Äôs future! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. title: China lifts gallium, germanium ban, halts US shipping probes
body: China has officially dropped its export ban on gallium, germanium, and many other high-grade minerals, while also freezing its retaliatory probe into U.S. shipbuilding. The announcement came Friday from China‚Äôs Ministry of Commerce, and it follows the October 30 meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping in Busan, South Korea, where both sides agreed to slow down their long-running trade fight. The suspended restrictions, which were first introduced on October 9, had placed tight controls on rare earth elements, lithium battery materials, and industrial processing technologies, which are all critical to both military hardware and the semiconductor industry. China halts dual-use material controls after Busan meeting As part of the same trade de-escalation, Beijing has reversed its December 2024 decision to restrict the export of key high-strength materials, including antimony, synthetic diamonds, and boron nitrides, in addition to gallium and germanium. These materials fall under China‚Äôs category of dual-use items, meaning they can be used in both civilian products and military systems. Their previous restriction was a direct response to Washington‚Äôs broader semiconductor export bans. China also suspended strict checks that had been introduced on exports of graphite, rules that required U.S. buyers to explain exactly how and where the materials would be used. That rule, which came into effect last December, had made life harder for American companies needing the mineral for electric vehicle production and missile guidance systems. Those checks are now also on pause for a year. These export relaxations don‚Äôt just happen out of nowhere. China controls a majority of the world‚Äôs production of critical minerals and rare earths, and it has used that dominance to push back during trade fights. By pausing these restrictions, Beijing is temporarily lowering its weapon of economic leverage in exchange for U.S. concessions. U.S. drops shipbuilding probe, China shelves port fee plan While the minerals story grabbed headlines, the trade deal also included another major concession: Donald Trump‚Äôs administration has frozen its investigation into China‚Äôs shipbuilding industry. The Office of the U.S. Trade Representative (USTR) said in a statement that the probe was suspended at midnight Monday, with talks set to continue on unresolved issues. The USTR did not specify what those unresolved issues were, but said further discussions with Beijing will take place over the next twelve months. Shortly after that, China‚Äôs Ministry of Transport followed up with its own announcement, confirming it was also putting its retaliatory measures on ice. That included halting a plan to impose extra port fees on vessels coming from the U.S., which had been scheduled to kick in this quarter. These twin decisions remove immediate cost pressures for companies shipping goods between both countries. If the planned port fees had gone into effect, it would‚Äôve raised freight costs and disrupted deliveries of key global commodities like oil , not to mention commercial goods. The fee standoff had originally started in mid-October, when China announced its maritime investigation in direct response to the U.S. launching its own. In addition to lifting those probes, Washington agreed to delay a September 29 rule that would‚Äôve blacklisted Chinese firms‚Äô subsidiaries by placing them on the U.S. entity list. This move blocks them from doing business with American suppliers. That rule has now been shelved, for the time being, as part of the broader understanding reached in Busan. On the tariff side, Trump agreed to slash duties on Chinese imports by 10 percentage points, and to keep his ‚Äúreciprocal tariffs,‚Äù originally scheduled to ramp up again, on hold until November 10, 2026. That decision removes a key pressure point that‚Äôs been weighing on tech companies, manufacturers, and the global supply chain. title: Asia markets gain as tech shares bounce back; U.S. shutdown hopes lift sentiment
body: Asia stocks trade higher on Monday, benefiting significantly from a rebound in key technology shares. Sentiment improved after China‚Äôs October consumer prices unexpectedly rose 0.2% y/y, the first gain since June, fueled by holiday spending and expanded trade-in programs. The record-breaking U.S. government shutdown is nearing an end after moderate Senate Democrats agreed to back a deal to reopen the government and fund key departments, Bloomberg News reported on Monday. Gold rose more than 1% to around $4,050 per ounce on Monday, reaching a two-week-high amid mounting concerns over the US economy. The annual inflation rate in Bangladesh fell to 8.17% in October 2025 from 8.36% in the previous month, marking the lowest reading since July 2022. Japan ( NKY:IND ) rose 1.33% to above 50,500, while the broader Topix Index added 0.5% to 3,315 on Monday, recovering part of last week‚Äôs losses. The Japanese yen depreciated toward 154 per dollar on Monday, nearing nine-month lows, amid expectations that the new administration will push for a massive stimulus package and support accommodative monetary policy. The Bank of Japan signaled that it may continue to gradually raise interest rates as economic activity and prices improve, but emphasized caution amid persistent uncertainties, according to the summary of opinions from its October meeting. The Japanese government is expected to finalise an economic stimulus package on November 21, marking Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi‚Äôs first major policy initiative since taking office last month. Japan‚Äôs leading economic index ‚Äî which gauges the outlook for the coming months based on indicators such as job offers and consumer sentiment ‚Äî rose to 108.0 in September 2025 from August‚Äôs five-month low of 107.0, preliminary estimates showed. Japan‚Äôs coincident economic index, which tracks key indicators including factory output, employment, and retail sales, rose to 114.6 in September 2025 from 112.8 in the previous month. China ( SHCOMP ) rose 0.47% to around 3,995 while the Shenzhen Component lost 0.4% to 13,350 on Monday, with mainland stocks sliding for the second straight session as stronger-than-expected inflation data dampened hopes for near-term policy support, and the offshore yuan remained around 7.12 per dollar, trading in a sideways range. China's consumer price index showed unexpected strength in October 2025, rising 0.2% year-over-year (Y/Y). Meanwhile, deflationary pressure at the factory gate continued to ease. China‚Äôs Producer Price Index declined 2.1% Y/Y in October. Core inflation, which strips out volatile food and energy costs, also accelerated, rising 1.2% Y/Y. Within the CPI data, food prices fell 2.9% Y/Y, which represents an easing from the 4.4% drop in September. China has granted exemptions to export controls on Nexperia chips for civilian applications, the commerce ministry said on Sunday, in a move that will help relieve supply shortages for carmakers and automotive suppliers, Reuters reported. Separately, China has suspended its ban on approving exports of ‚Äúdual-use items‚Äù related to gallium, germanium, antimony, and super-hard materials to the United States, the Commerce Ministry said on Sunday. Hong Kong ( HSI ) rose 1.56% to 26,352 in Monday morning trade, rebounding from prior losses as consumer and property stocks led gains. India¬†( SENSEX ) rose 0.52% to 83,424 in morning trade on Monday, erasing losses from the previous three sessions. Australia ( AS51 ) rose 0.75% to close at 8,836 on Monday, recouping about half of last week's losses, with commodity-linked stocks leading the rebound amid stronger underlying prices. The Australian dollar climbed above $0.65, nearing one-week highs, after Reserve Bank of Australia Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser noted that monetary policy faces an unusual challenge and emphasized the need to keep policy tight to contain inflation. Australia‚Äôs monetary policy faces a tricky phase as the economy‚Äôs recovery began with demand already exceeding potential output, leaving little room for near-term easing, the Reserve Bank Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said in a speech on Monday. Private house approvals in Australia grew 4.0% month-on-month to 9,547 units in September 2025, rebounding from a 1.0% fall in the previous month and confirming preliminary estimates. The seasonally adjusted number of total dwellings approved in Australia climbed 12% month-on-month to 17,019 units in September 2025, matching preliminary estimates and rebounding from a 3.6% fall in August. In the U.S. on Friday, all three major indexes rebounded from early losses to close mostly higher on Friday amid hopes that Congress members were making progress toward ending the government shutdown. U.S. stock futures advanced on Monday after the Senate passed the initial stage of a deal to end the government shutdown, securing the minimum 60 votes required, with eight Democratic senators breaking from party leadership: Dow +0.28% ; S&P 500 +0.73% ; Nasdaq +1.27% . Currencies: ( JPY:USD ), ( CNY:USD ), ( AUD:USD ), ( INR:USD ), ( HKD:USD ), ( NZD:USD ). More on Asia: China consumer inflation rises 0.2% Y/Y, core CPI hits 20-month high, PPI decline slows China's trade surplus shrinks in October as exports unexpectedly fall combined with a rise in imports China‚Äôs factory growth cools to 50.6 in October, export uncertainty rises Australian monthly inflation eases slightly, annual figures show persistent pressure China's economic slowdown deepens as factory activity hits six-month low to 49.0 in October

title: Dogecoin Price Set For 1,200% Rally To $2.2 In This 3rd Run
body: So far in history, the Dogecoin price has seen two major price rallies that have led the meme coin to reach brand new all-time highs. Given this trend, the expectations are that the cryptocurrency could be getting ready for another rally like the last two bear markets. Even though the year 2025 is about to come to an end and there has been no such rally in sight, it has not dimmed bullishness among investors. Analyst Predicts 3rd Wave For Dogecoin Price Pseudonymous crypto analyst EtherNaysyonal shared an analysis with the Dogecoin community that shows where they expect the DOGE price to be headed next. This analysis focuses on the sudden explosive bull runs that have happened in the Dogecoin lifetime, predicting the next one that could send the meme coin toward new all-time highs. Related Reading: Big Bitcoin Holders Are Selling, But Few Buyers Are Stepping In As Demand Weakens Highlighting the previous performances, the crypto analyst shows how the Dogecoin price has consolidated for a long time before reaching an end in 2017. Once this bottom was established, the price saw an over 7,000% increase, rising from below $0.00028 to over $0.02 before the bear market began in 2018. Next came another long consolidation trend that spanned years before ending in 2021. Just like the performance in 2021, the end case for the 2021 rally was similar, which was an explosive rally. The Dogecoin price increased from below $0.0028 to over $0.7, registering an over 30,000% increase by the time the run was completed. Pointing to these previous performances, the analyst believes that Dogecoin may be on the verge of another major run. If the price sees a similar bounce, then the analyst believes that the meme coin‚Äôs price will cross $1. By the time it‚Äôs done, it could see an over 1,200% increase, causing the price to reach $2.2 before the momentum fades. The Evolution Of DOGE The analysis comes in response to a previous post that EtherNaysyonal had made, showing how Dogecoin has managed to evolve from a joke into a serious cryptocurrency. They explain that the existence of DOGE shows that money doesn‚Äôt always have to be serious. Related Reading: $300 Million Worth Of XRP On The Move ‚Äì Where Are They Headed? Despite starting out as a joke, though, Dogecoin has since grown beyond that and has seen some major developments that solidified its position in the market. Just like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and XRP, Dogecoin is one of the few cryptocurrencies out of millions to be used as a reserve currency by companies. There have also been several ETF filings for Dogecoin as it is being moved into the mainstream for institutional participation. DOGE has also been incorporated into the likes of Tesla as a payment method for merchandise, expanding its reach. Featured image created with Dall.E, chart from Tradingview.com
