title: Here Are The Bitcoin Whales That Have Been Dumping BTC And Crashing The Price
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs price struggled to regain momentum last week, hovering just above the $100,000 threshold after a turbulent start to November. The entire market sentiment is somewhat fragile following heavy selling pressure from large holders, and on-chain data points to major whale movements that may be adding to the downtrend. High-profile entities, including the Winklevoss Twins‚Äô Gemini Custody wallets and early Bitcoin miner Owen Gunden, have surfaced as key players in this wave of transactions that could be influencing Bitcoin‚Äôs recent price action. Winklevoss Twins Move Millions In BTC From Gemini Custody According to blockchain data, wallets linked to Winklevoss Capital and Gemini Custody have been consistently transferring large amounts of Bitcoin over the past several months in an ongoing deliberate adjustment of their holdings. These movements have occurred in several phases, often involving sizeable transactions that appear timed. The latest transaction stands out, showing 250 BTC, worth approximately $25.45 million at current prices, moved to a Gemini hot wallet just hours ago. Related Reading: New XRP ETF Just Dropped, But Will Anything Be Different This Time? If these transfers correspond to sales, it would mean that the twins have been methodically unloading their Bitcoin positions over time rather than engaging in sudden bulk liquidations. Cumulatively, they have now effectively liquidated over 9,000 BTC, equivalent to around $900 million, since the start of 2025. This has caused their holdings to fall from roughly 24,000 BTC earlier in the year to under 16,000 BTC right now. Bitcoin OG Owen Gunden Moves Final Holdings Toward Exchanges Another major wallet attracting attention belongs to Owen Gunden, an early Bitcoin miner and Genesis creditor. Data from on-chain analytics platform Lookonchain reveals that Gunden recently initiated large transfers totaling 3,549 BTC (around $361.8 million) in a single transaction just eight hours ago. Related Reading: Pundit Highlights Major Move For XRP And RLUSD, Will Price Follow? The move follows earlier transactions this week, including 3,601 BTC ($372.1 million) sent one day prior. Notably, approximately 600 BTC from these transfers, worth over $61 million, have already been deposited on Kraken, signaling possible liquidation. These movements have reduced Gunden‚Äôs total holdings from around 11,000 BTC to nearly zero. Such large transfers to exchange-linked wallets often precede sell orders, contributing to short-term selling pressure. The Gunden transfers, alongside similar large movements like those from the Winklevoss twins, are among several whale sell events recorded in November that have added to Bitcoin‚Äôs persistent selling pressure. This trend is apparent in the broader institutional market, where US-based Spot Bitcoin ETFs have also seen sustained outflows. Data shows that Friday of last week closed with $558.44 million leaving these funds. The combined effect of these whale movements presents a concerning outlook for Bitcoin‚Äôs short-term trend. However, this weekend has been highlighted by another green weekend for Bitcoin. At the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading at $106,270, up by 4.4% in the past 24 hours. This follows a string of green weekends over the past four weeks, which were immediately reversed on the following monday. Featured image from Dall.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Top 3 Best Cryptos with 1,000% ROI Potential by 2026
body: The crypto market in late 2025 looks very different from the meme-fueled runs of past years. Investors now seek projects with real technology, strong demand, and transparent revenue systems. This new cycle favors function over hype, pushing decentralized finance into its most serious growth phase yet. Ethereum (ETH) and XRP continue to hold top positions in institutional portfolios, but a rising DeFi crypto named Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is starting to dominate investor discussions. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) combines lending, staking, and stablecoin innovation into one system. It is designed to attract both retail and institutional users through a model that blends yield generation with smart lending logic. As traders hunt for the next wave of projects with 1,000% ROI potential by 2026, these three tokens‚ÄîMutuum Finance (MUTM), Ethereum (ETH), and XRP‚Äîstand out for distinct reasons. One represents the new frontier of DeFi, while the others define the legacy pillars of the market. Ethereum (ETH) Ethereum (ETH) remains the foundation of decentralized finance. Over 60% of all decentralized applications still run on its network. With scaling improvements from Layer-2 solutions like Arbitrum, Base, and zkSync, Ethereum continues to grow stronger in performance and user adoption. Analysts expect ETH to trade between $8,000 and $10,000 by 2026, a gain of around 300%. While that is significant, Ethereum‚Äôs large market cap limits its explosive upside compared to early-stage tokens. Mutuum Finance (MUTM), still in presale, begins from a far smaller base, where each user and transaction will have a direct impact on growth. XRP XRP remains favored among institutions for cross-border payments. Ripple‚Äôs banking partnerships and regulatory clarity have strengthened its role in global settlements. Analysts target XRP between $3.00 and $3.50 by 2026, marking a potential 4x to 6x rise. Yet XRP functions mainly as a settlement token, not as a yield generator. It lacks the staking and lending utilities that make Mutuum Finance (MUTM) a full DeFi crypto ecosystem rather than a single-purpose asset. XRP serves banks, while Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will serve everyday investors seeking active income and flexible lending exposure. Mutuum Finance (MUTM): The DeFi Disruptor Mutuum Finance (MUTM) isn‚Äôt just another presale token. It is preparing to launch its full DeFi platform and token together, a synchronized rollout that will bring instant liquidity when trading begins. The project‚Äôs total supply is 4B MUTM, and it is now in Presale Phase 6, priced at $0.035. Over $18.55 million has already been raised from more than 17,900 holders in all phases, with 87% of this phase‚Äôs 170 million supply sold out. The next phase will move the price to $0.040, representing a 15% increase for new entrants. This pricing stage marks a final opportunity for early participants before the next price shift. Analysts tracking its steady phase progression estimate that Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will deliver between 200% and 400% growth by launch. The projected post listing range between $0.35 and $0.40 sets the stage for 10x to 15x returns within the next cycle. A participant who invested $5,000 in Phase 2 at $0.015 now holds tokens valued around $12K at current prices. At $0.35, that stake reaches $116K, confirming the project‚Äôs exponential potential. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) also stands out for accessibility. Investors can now purchase tokens directly using debit or credit cards with no buying limits, allowing broader entry for global participants. Its design builds on two distinct lending systems. The Peer-to-Contract model serves stable assets like BTC and USDT. These pools dynamically adjust their yields according to liquidity use, rewarding suppliers as utilization increases. The Peer-to-Peer model, in contrast, supports higher-risk assets such as DOGE or SHIB, where users decide loan terms and rates themselves. This flexible approach caters to both conservative and adventurous lenders in the same ecosystem. The platform‚Äôs revenue cycle is built for sustainability. Fees from lending activities will fund open-market MUTM buybacks, and the purchased tokens will be distributed to mtToken stakers as rewards. This continuous loop of revenue and redistribution builds steady token demand while rewarding community loyalty. Stability Factor and Coming V1 Protocol Launch Borrowers also benefit from a stable interest model. They will be able to lock repayment rates, giving them predictability even when market conditions fluctuate. When the variable market rate changes sharply, the protocol adjusts stable loans automatically to maintain fairness. All loans remain overcollateralized, with the Stability Factor constantly tracking safety margins. When the collateral value drops below set thresholds, liquidation occurs instantly. For example, a user depositing $10,000 in ETH will borrow up to $7,500, and if the collateral declines by 20%, the system will restore balance through controlled liquidation. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has disclosed through its official X profile that the V1 of its protocol is set to be introduced on the Sepolia Testnet in Q4 2025. This early release will activate the platform‚Äôs primary systems, including the liquidity pool, the mtToken and debt token frameworks, along with an automated liquidator bot designed to keep positions balanced and the market functioning smoothly. During this phase, users will be able to borrow and lend assets, using ETH or USDT as collateral. By launching V1 on a testnet first, the team provides users with hands-on access before the full mainnet rollout. This allows the community to understand the platform‚Äôs mechanics, build trust through real usage, and gradually attract more participants. As adoption grows, it may lead to increased attention and long-term demand for the MUTM token. Conclusion: The DeFi Token That Defines the Next Wave Ethereum shapes the infrastructure of Web3, and XRP powers the world‚Äôs payment rails, but Mutuum Finance (MUTM) brings both lending and reward mechanics into one accessible platform. With 87% of Phase 6 already sold and the next price increase approaching, this presale stage marks the last entry at this price level point before broader exposure begins. By 2026, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is set to become the standout among the cheapest cryptocurrency projects evolving into major DeFi powerhouses. As investors search for the next big defi crypto capable of delivering real 1,000% returns, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) leads the list. Its technology, revenue design, and presale timing align perfectly with the new market cycle. Those who join before the next phase will likely secure positions that define the next chapter of DeFi growth. title: CryptoCom CEO: XRP ETF Could Pull In Up to $8 Billion In Its First Year
body: As the market anticipates the launch of spot XRP ETFs, Crypto.com CEO Kris Marszalek has commented on the potential impact of these products. In a video shared by crypto commentator Xaif (@Xaif_Crypto), Marszalek discussed the future of altcoin investments and referenced forecasts highlighting large-scale inflows if an XRP ETF is launched. He emphasized that in the next few years, digital assets with solid capital inflows could outperform others, noting that ‚Äúthere‚Äôs a forecast saying that the ETF for XRP is going to attract $8 billion of inflows next year.‚Äù https://t.co/YoOCWnM3lz CEO Kris Marszalek says an $XRP ETF could pull in up to $8B in its first year He‚Äôs already projecting it‚Ä¶ You better be ready for this. pic.twitter.com/KkzueD0k1D ‚Äî Xaif Crypto | (@Xaif_Crypto) November 8, 2025 Are Institutions Preparing for XRP? Xaif and many other market participants view Marszalek‚Äôs comments as an indication of growing institutional interest in XRP and its potential to drive new liquidity into the market. Although the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has yet to make any official announcement regarding such a product, Marszalek‚Äôs statement adds momentum to ongoing discussions in the community. Franklin Templeton recently modified the language in its ETF filing , and many community members see this as a sign of an impending launch. The DTCC has also listed over 9 XRP ETFs , suggesting these products are also near approval. Spot XRP ETFs are the next major step toward expanding access to digital assets through traditional financial channels. The introduction of ETFs for established cryptocurrencies has historically improved market liquidity and encouraged broader adoption among institutional investors. Marszalek‚Äôs comments suggest that Crypto.com may position itself strategically for this development. He mentioned that the company has a ‚Äúclear, differentiated, exciting strategy that nobody else is pursuing,‚Äù signaling a commitment to innovation in digital finance. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 While he did not specify how this strategy relates to potential ETF participation or XRP exposure, the remarks indicate confidence in the exchange‚Äôs direction as it anticipates billions of inflows into the XRP market . A Potential Turning Point for XRP If the $8 billion projection materializes, an XRP ETF could significantly influence the token‚Äôs trading volume and valuation. Such inflows would reflect a substantial shift in investor sentiment toward regulated crypto instruments, reinforcing XRP‚Äôs standing as one of the most established digital assets. Despite regulatory uncertainties around XRP in recent years, the market‚Äôs anticipation for structured investment vehicles remains strong . As Marszalek concluded, ‚ÄúWe will build it and I hope you guys join along for the ride,‚Äù a statement that shows the confidence driving both Crypto.com‚Äôs outlook and the wider industry‚Äôs expectations for what could become a landmark development in cryptocurrency investing. title: UK to Limit Stablecoin Holdings in Tougher Regime Than US
body: The UK plans to temporarily impose strict caps on stablecoin holdings, including a ¬£20,000 ($26,350) limit for individuals, and allow issuers to have as much as 60% of the backing assets in short-term government debt.

title: World markets jump on stronger U.S. shutdown truce, softer dollar
body: Global market sentiment improved on Monday after U.S. Senate lawmakers late Sunday moved a procedural vote forward to advance legislation to end the ongoing government shutdown, according to CNBC. The vote came after weeks of stalled talks in Washington that had restricted access to federal economic data. The lack of data had made it harder for traders to evaluate interest rate expectations. The new progress immediately showed in U.S. stock futures, which had finished the prior week under pressure from concerns tied to high artificial intelligence stock valuations. S&P 500 futures surged by 0.76%, Dow Jones futures added 112 points or 0.24%, and Nasdaq-100 futures rallied by 1.29% during early Monday trading. Last week had been rough for major indexes, with the Nasdaq Composite recording its worst weekly performance since April, crashing by 3%, while the S&P 500 declined by 1.6%, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell by 1.2%. Asia stocks are posting broad gains after selloff pressure eased Across Asia-Pacific, equities also moved higher on Monday. South Korea‚Äôs Kospi rose 3.02% to 4,073.24. The Kosdaq gained 1.32% to 888.35. Major names advanced, with Samsung Electronics higher by 2.76% and SK Hynix up 4.48%. SK Inc, the holding company for one of the country‚Äôs largest chaebols, rallied by 9.29%. GS Holdings, active in energy, retail, and construction, climbed 11.79%. In Japan , the Nikkei 225 gained 1.26% to 50,911.76, and the Topix index rose 0.56% to 3,317.42. 10-year Japanese government bond yields touched 1.7%, their highest level since October. Hong Kong‚Äôs Hang Seng added 1.54%, and China‚Äôs CSI 300 increased 0.17%. Australia‚Äôs S&P/ASX 200 moved up 0.75% to 8,835.9. In India, the Nifty 50 gained 0.54%, while the Sensex added 0.52%. In Europe, the Stoxx 600 index rose 1% during the morning session. The FTSE in the United Kingdom increased 0.5%, Germany‚Äôs DAX gained 1.4%, France‚Äôs CAC 40 advanced 1%, and Italy‚Äôs FTSE MIB also increased 1%. Nearly every sector moved positive as investors reacted to the new developments in the U.S. policy environment. The trend reflected improving confidence that government operations may soon stabilize, which would allow firmer expectations for economic projections. Meanwhile, the U.S. dollar gained 0.35% against the yen, trading at 153.98, near a nine-month high from earlier in the month. The Australian dollar appreciated 0.55% to $0.6532 and strengthened over 1% against the yen. Frances Cheung, head of foreign-exchange and rates strategy at Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp. , said , ‚ÄúMonday‚Äôs market moves, including dollar losses against risk-proxy currencies, reflected hopes that the U.S. government would reopen.‚Äù Precious metals also saw buying interest. Spot gold rose 1.4% to $4,053.40 per ounce. U.S. gold futures gained 1.3% to $4,062.40. Silver increased 1.8% to $49.18, platinum rose 1.3% to $1,565.36, and palladium moved 0.7% higher to $1,389.94. The MSCI Emerging Markets Index increased 1.3%, and a separate Bloomberg gauge tracking large- and mid-cap returns also showed gains. A developing-nation currency index was up 0.1%. The smartest crypto minds already read our newsletter. Want in? Join them .

title: Analyst reveals what will send XRP to $10
body: Cryptocurrency on-chain analyst Ali Martinez highlighted on November 9 that XRP may be setting up for a significant upside move. According to Martinez, the token is forming a bullish flag on the monthly chart, a classic continuation pattern that often precedes major price breakouts. His view suggests that a brief pullback could create the conditions needed to propel XRP toward double-digit prices. ‚ÄúXRP is forming a bullish flag, and a dip to $1.90 could be the spark for a rally toward $10,‚Äù Martinez wrote. The dream scenario: $XRP is forming a bullish flag, and a dip to $1.90 could be the spark for a rally toward $10. pic.twitter.com/LpTiPQ1FQG ‚Äî Ali (@ali_charts) November 9, 2025 A bullish flag forms when an asset experiences a sharp upward price movement, followed by a period of sideways or slightly downward consolidation, with consolidation usually taking place within parallel trend lines, resembling a flag on a pole. The initial surge is known as the flagpole, and the price action that follows represents a pause in momentum rather than a reversal. Once the pattern matures, breaking above the upper trend line typically signals trend continuation. XRP price action In XRP‚Äôs case, the initial rally earlier this year created the flagpole, while recent monthly candles have moved within a narrowing range between approximately $1.90 and $3.10. Martinez‚Äôs chart indicates that a retest of the lower boundary around $1.90 would maintain the structure, potentially attracting buyers who view the level as key support. A confirmed breakout above the $3.30 to $3.50 resistance zone would then validate the pattern and open the door for a measured move toward $10 based on historical price behavior and technical projection. At the time of writing, the token is trading at $2.51, up 10.27% over the past 24 hours with a market cap of $152 billion. If XRP were to hit $10 it would have a market cap of roughly $600 billion, the largest in the token‚Äôs history. The post Analyst reveals what will send XRP to $10 appeared first on Finbold .

title: Asia FX Markets Stagnate as Dollar Holds Firm ‚Äì Critical Government Shutdown Resolution Looms
body: BitcoinWorld Asia FX Markets Stagnate as Dollar Holds Firm ‚Äì Critical Government Shutdown Resolution Looms Currency traders across Asia are holding their breath as regional currencies show minimal movement while the US dollar maintains its steady position. The financial world‚Äôs attention is laser-focused on Washington, where a potential resolution to the government shutdown could trigger significant market movements. This delicate balance in Asia FX markets reflects the cautious optimism among investors awaiting clarity on US fiscal policy. Asia FX Markets in Holding Pattern Most Asian currencies are trading within tight ranges as market participants adopt a wait-and-see approach. The Japanese yen, Chinese yuan, and other major Asian currencies are showing limited volatility despite ongoing economic uncertainties. This muted performance in Asia FX reflects several key factors: Reduced trading volumes during Asian session hours Caution ahead of potential US policy changes Balanced risk sentiment among regional investors Technical resistance levels limiting price movements Dollar Steady Amid Political Uncertainty The US dollar continues to demonstrate remarkable stability against major counterparts, with the dollar index hovering near recent highs. This dollar steady performance comes despite ongoing political negotiations in Washington. Market analysts attribute this resilience to several supporting factors: Factor Impact on Dollar Market Reaction Safe-haven demand Positive Moderate buying interest Interest rate expectations Neutral Limited price action Global risk sentiment Mixed Balanced flows Government Shutdown Resolution Prospects The potential end to the government shutdown represents a critical inflection point for currency markets. A successful resolution could trigger several immediate effects on currency markets: Reduced safe-haven demand for the US dollar Increased risk appetite supporting Asian currencies Normalization of US economic data releases Improved global economic confidence Currency Markets Await Direction Global currency markets are positioned for potential volatility once political clarity emerges. The current calm in currency markets masks underlying tension as traders prepare for multiple scenarios. Key levels to watch include: Major support and resistance levels for Asian pairs Dollar index technical formations Options market positioning Institutional flow patterns Economic Trends and Forward Outlook The broader economic trends suggest that currency movements will remain data-dependent in the coming sessions. Current economic trends indicate: Region Economic Outlook Currency Impact Asia Moderate growth Selective strength United States Policy-dependent Dollar sensitivity Global Cautious optimism Risk-on potential FAQs Which Asian currencies are most affected by US government shutdown developments? The Japanese yen and Chinese yuan typically show the strongest reactions, though all Asia FX pairs experience some impact. How long can the dollar remain steady amid political uncertainty? Historical patterns suggest the dollar can maintain stability for extended periods, though technical breaks often precede significant moves. What immediate effects would a government shutdown resolution have? Expect reduced volatility premiums, normalized trading conditions, and potential risk-on flows into Asian assets. Which economic indicators should traders monitor closely? US employment data, inflation figures, and Asian export numbers will provide crucial directional signals. How are major financial institutions positioned for this event? Most maintain balanced exposure with contingency plans for sudden market movements in either direction. The current market environment presents both challenges and opportunities for currency traders. The resolution of political uncertainty in Washington could unlock significant movement across Asia FX pairs, while the dollar‚Äôs steady performance provides a stable baseline for strategic positioning. Market participants should remain vigilant for breakouts while managing risk exposure carefully during this transitional period. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping currency markets and economic policy impacts. This post Asia FX Markets Stagnate as Dollar Holds Firm ‚Äì Critical Government Shutdown Resolution Looms first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Essential Upbit Wallet Maintenance: Temporary POKT, THETA, and TFUEL Service Suspension Explained
body: BitcoinWorld Essential Upbit Wallet Maintenance: Temporary POKT, THETA, and TFUEL Service Suspension Explained Attention cryptocurrency traders! South Korea‚Äôs leading digital asset exchange, Upbit, has announced crucial wallet maintenance that will temporarily affect three popular tokens. Starting July 13 at 2:00 p.m. UTC, the platform will suspend deposits and withdrawals for Pocket Network (POKT), Theta Token (THETA), and Theta Fuel (TFUEL). This proactive Upbit wallet maintenance demonstrates the exchange‚Äôs commitment to security and system reliability. What Does This Upbit Wallet Maintenance Mean for You? If you‚Äôre holding or planning to trade POKT, THETA, or TFUEL on Upbit, here‚Äôs what you need to know about this temporary service suspension. The exchange has scheduled this essential maintenance to enhance wallet security and improve transaction processing. During this period: Deposits for all three tokens will be temporarily unavailable Withdrawal requests cannot be processed Trading activities may continue normally for users with existing balances Funds remain secure in cold storage during the upgrade process Why Is Regular Wallet Maintenance Necessary? Cryptocurrency exchanges conduct routine wallet maintenance to ensure optimal performance and security. This Upbit wallet maintenance follows industry best practices for several important reasons. First, it allows for security protocol updates that protect against emerging threats. Second, it enables technical improvements that enhance transaction speed and reliability. Moreover, regular maintenance helps prevent potential system failures that could disrupt trading activities. How Should Traders Prepare for Service Suspensions? When exchanges announce temporary service suspensions, smart traders take proactive steps. If you‚Äôre actively trading these assets, consider these practical tips. Complete any pending transactions before the maintenance window begins. Monitor official Upbit announcements for exact restoration times. Diversify your trading strategies to account for temporary liquidity changes. Remember that such maintenance periods typically last a few hours, though exact durations may vary. What Makes Upbit‚Äôs Approach to Security Stand Out? Upbit has built a strong reputation for security and reliability in the competitive cryptocurrency exchange landscape. Their transparent communication about this Upbit wallet maintenance reflects their commitment to user protection. The exchange consistently prioritizes: Regular security audits and system updates Clear advance notice for planned maintenance Comprehensive insurance coverage for digital assets Multi-layered security protocols including cold storage When Will Normal Services Resume? While Upbit hasn‚Äôt specified an exact completion time for this wallet maintenance, historical patterns suggest services typically resume within several hours. The exchange will provide updates through their official communication channels. Users should monitor: Upbit‚Äôs official website announcements Social media channels for real-time updates Email notifications for registered users The exchange‚Äôs mobile application status alerts Conclusion: Proactive Maintenance Ensures Long-Term Reliability This temporary service suspension represents Upbit‚Äôs dedication to maintaining a secure and efficient trading environment. While brief inconveniences may occur, such proactive measures ultimately benefit all users by ensuring platform stability and asset security. The exchange‚Äôs transparent approach to this Upbit wallet maintenance sets a positive industry standard for user communication and system reliability. Frequently Asked Questions How long will the Upbit wallet maintenance last? While exact duration isn‚Äôt specified, similar maintenance periods typically last 2-6 hours. Upbit will announce when services resume through official channels. Can I still trade POKT, THETA, and TFUEL during maintenance? Yes, trading typically continues for users with existing balances. Only deposits and withdrawals are suspended during the maintenance window. Are my funds safe during wallet maintenance? Absolutely. Funds remain secure in cold storage during maintenance periods. These procedures enhance security rather than compromise it. Will this affect token prices? Temporary maintenance rarely causes significant price impacts. However, reduced liquidity might cause minor volatility until services fully restore. How will I know when services resume? Monitor Upbit‚Äôs official website, social media accounts, and email notifications for restoration announcements. Can I schedule transactions for after maintenance? Yes, you can prepare transactions in advance, but they will only process once wallet services fully restore. Found this information helpful? Share this essential guide about Upbit wallet maintenance with fellow traders on your social media channels to help them stay informed about these important service updates. Knowledge sharing strengthens our entire cryptocurrency community! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency exchange trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital asset security and institutional adoption. title: Binance's CZ bashes marketplace selling 'CZ-followed' X accounts to bad actors
body: The crypto billionaire and former CEO of Binance has bashed the sale of so-called ‚ÄúCZ-followed‚Äù accounts, where some X accounts are using his social media interactions for ‚Äúdigital status currency.‚Äù Binance founder Changpeng Zhao has warned social media users against purchasing X accounts that he follows, threatening to unfollow any that are sold. Zhao posted on X that users should not buy handles he follows. ‚ÄúI will unfollow any sold accounts. If you see an account for sale, let me know. DM, tweet, notify interns,‚Äù he wrote on Monday. The ex-Binance CEO added that he follows accounts randomly because they are ‚Äúsupportive, informative, positive energy people in the community.‚Äù Selling ‚Äòfollowed by CZ‚Äô accounts for 3,000 USDT Zhao made the caution, reacting to a post from an influencer on X, who noted that ‚ÄúBig Cousin,‚Äù a nickname used by the Chinese-speaking crypto community for CZ, had started unfollowing several accounts recently. The influencer said it was ‚Äúa good thing‚Äù because some users had ‚Äúdone bad things under the banner of being followed by CZ.‚Äù Don't buy handles that I follow. I will unfollow any sold accounts. If you see an account for sale, let me know. DM, tweet, notify "interns". I follow accounts "randomly", usually supportive, informative, positive energy people in the community. https://t.co/655fSK9h4S ‚Äî CZ üî∂ BNB (@cz_binance) November 10, 2025 The influencer added that in 2022, an account followed by CZ could fetch up to 20,000 USDT, with some buyers reportedly paying around 3,000 USDT for a handle that later lost the coveted follow. ‚ÄúIf it‚Äôs just for that ‚Äòbeen followed by CZ‚Äô kind of celebrity-chasing psychology, it can still be understood,‚Äù the influencer wrote, ‚Äúbut the most worrying thing is these accounts falling into the hands of criminals, being used for scams and rug pulls.‚Äù Asian-based journalist Linwan had confirmed that Zhao had unfollowed 384 accounts in a single day on November 8. ‚ÄúBefore November, CZ‚Äôs unfollows were sporadic, but on November 8, he unfollowed over three hundred accounts, which feels like a systematic purge of his follow list.‚Äù According to Linwan‚Äôs investigations, the mass unfollowing was on specified categories of users, including projects Binance had exited, investment fund managers with differing views, and industry media that had been bad-mouthing the exchange during its regulatory battles, on top of Zhao‚Äôs recent US presidential pardon . 384 accounts purged by CZ in November, reasons not clear Among the accounts CZ removed from his following list were projects previously supported by Binance, including BakerySwap, TopGoal, Bundle, KOI, CommEX, and ReachMe. CZÂèñÂÖ≥384‰∏™Ë¥¶Êà∑ÔºöË∞ÅË¢´Ê∏ÖÂá∫ÊúãÂèãÂúàÔºü ÊôöÊôöÊàëÁûÖ‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÁúºÔºå11 Êúà‰πãÂâç CZ ÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÈõ∂Êï£ÂØπÂá†‰∏™Â®±‰πêKOLËøõË°åÂèñÂÖ≥ÔºåÂÅè‰∏™Âà´Ë°å‰∏∫Ôºõ11 Êúà 8 Êó•ÂèñÂÖ≥‰∏âÁôæÂ§ö‰∏™Ë¥¶Êà∑ÔºåÊòØÁ≥ªÁªüÊÄßÊ∏ÖÁêÜÂÖ≥Ê≥®Âúà„ÄÇ ÊàëÊääËøô‰∫õÂèñÂÖ≥Ë¥¶Êà∑ËøõË°åÊ¢≥ÁêÜÂàÜÁ±ªÔºå‰πüÊòØÂè¶‰∏ÄÁßçÊäïËµÑÂèÇËÄÉÊåáÊ†á„ÄÇ 1.ÂèñÂÖ≥Â∏ÅÂÆâÂ∑≤ÈÄÄÂá∫ÁöÑÈ°πÁõÆÊñπÁ±ª‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/8GfrHtBbr9 ‚Äî ÊûóÊôöÊôöÁöÑÁå´ (@linwanwan823) November 10, 2025 CommEX had taken over Binance‚Äôs operations in Russia after the company‚Äôs market exit, but Zhao is seemingly distancing himself from Binance‚Äôs legacy assets or its former regional ties. The ‚Äúpurge‚Äù also included notable industry names such as Olaf Carlson-Wee of Polychain Capital, Scott Lewis of DeFi Pulse, Darryl Wang of Tangent, Tushar Aggarwal of Persistence, and Howard Yuan of Shard Capital. According to Lian, these individuals had recently advocated for ‚Äúmulti-centralized trading‚Äù and reduced dependence on Binance, ideas that may have clashed with Zhao‚Äôs positions. Media figures like Mira Christanto of Messari, Angie Lau of Forkast, and analyst Trista Kelley were also among those unfollowed, alongside former Binance executives Ling Zhang, the exchange‚Äôs former investment director, and Cobo founder L√º Xujun. title: QCP Capital Announces Critical Levels for Bitcoin Holding Above $100,000! Details Here
body: QCP Capital reported in its market assessment published today that Bitcoin has held above the $100,000 level in recent days thanks to optimism about a possible budget deal from the US government. QCP Capital: Bitcoin Holds Above $100,000, Market Supported by Expectations of US Government Deal The company noted that Bitcoin struggled to surpass this level several times but eventually rose to $106,000. It's noteworthy that this rise occurred despite selling pressure from long-term investors (OGs) and fund outflows from spot ETFs. QCP explained that fund flows in the options market were sending mixed signals. While some investors are buying bullish options strategies, signaling optimistic expectations in the market, other investors are selling bullish strategies, reflecting a cautious stance regarding the possibility of Bitcoin breaking new records by the end of the year. The report also highlighted that Bitcoin's ability to absorb OG sales has gained strength similar to past Silk Road and Mt.Gox cycles, suggesting increased market depth and resilience. QCP noted that digital transaction volume (DAT) has decreased but its impact on market sentiment remains decisive. According to the analysis, if Bitcoin remains above $100,000, the US bond market may see relief; however, if it breaks above $118,000, selling pressure may arise again. *This is not investment advice. title: Bitcoin Resistance Level: Glassnode Reveals Crucial $108,500 Price Barrier
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Resistance Level: Glassnode Reveals Crucial $108,500 Price Barrier Have you ever wondered what drives Bitcoin‚Äôs price movements beyond simple market sentiment? Glassnode, the renowned on-chain analytics firm, has pinpointed a critical Bitcoin resistance level that could shape the cryptocurrency‚Äôs next major move. Their latest analysis reveals $108,500 as the next significant barrier for BTC, based on sophisticated investor behavior patterns. What Makes This Bitcoin Resistance Level So Important? Glassnode‚Äôs identification of $108,500 as a key Bitcoin resistance level stems from deep on-chain data analysis. This specific price point represents the average cost basis for the top 15% of Bitcoin investors. Historically, when Bitcoin approaches this threshold during market recoveries, it faces substantial selling pressure. The firm‚Äôs research shows that investors who purchased near this price level tend to sell when prices return to their break-even point. This creates a natural Bitcoin resistance level that the market must overcome for continued upward momentum. How Do Resistance Levels Actually Work? Understanding resistance levels requires knowing how investor psychology influences market dynamics. When prices approach key levels where many investors originally entered positions: Investors seek to recover their initial investment Selling pressure increases significantly Market momentum often stalls or reverses Breakthrough requires substantial buying volume The $108,500 Bitcoin resistance level represents one of these critical psychological barriers. Glassnode‚Äôs data indicates this isn‚Äôt just theoretical ‚Äì it‚Äôs a price point that has repeatedly influenced Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory. Why Should You Care About This Analysis? Glassnode‚Äôs identification of this specific Bitcoin resistance level provides valuable insights for both traders and long-term investors. Recognizing these key price zones helps investors make more informed decisions about entry and exit points. Moreover, understanding these resistance levels allows market participants to anticipate potential price movements. When Bitcoin approaches $108,500, traders can watch for signs of either breakthrough or rejection, adjusting their strategies accordingly. What Challenges Does This Resistance Present? Overcoming the $108,500 Bitcoin resistance level requires significant market momentum. Several factors could influence whether Bitcoin breaks through this barrier: Institutional buying pressure Market sentiment shifts Macroeconomic conditions Regulatory developments Each of these elements plays a crucial role in determining whether Bitcoin can successfully surpass this critical Bitcoin resistance level . Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors Glassnode‚Äôs analysis provides practical guidance for navigating this potential Bitcoin resistance level . Investors should monitor trading volume and price action as Bitcoin approaches $108,500. Increased volume during approach could signal potential breakthrough, while declining volume might indicate rejection. Additionally, watching for consolidation patterns near this level can provide clues about market direction. Successful breakthroughs often involve periods of accumulation just below resistance levels before decisive upward moves. The Bottom Line: What This Means for Bitcoin‚Äôs Future Glassnode‚Äôs identification of the $108,500 Bitcoin resistance level offers more than just a price target ‚Äì it provides a framework for understanding market structure. This analysis highlights how investor behavior creates natural price barriers that influence Bitcoin‚Äôs journey. While resistance levels don‚Äôt guarantee specific outcomes, they represent important psychological and technical markers. The $108,500 level serves as a crucial test for Bitcoin‚Äôs strength and could determine whether the cryptocurrency enters new price discovery territory or faces another period of consolidation. Frequently Asked Questions What is a Bitcoin resistance level? A Bitcoin resistance level is a price point where selling pressure typically increases, preventing further price advancement. It represents a psychological barrier where investors often take profits or limit losses. How does Glassnode determine resistance levels? Glassnode uses on-chain data analysis, examining investor cost basis, transaction patterns, and historical price behavior to identify significant resistance levels where concentrated selling typically occurs. Is the $108,500 resistance level guaranteed to hold? No resistance level is guaranteed. While historical data suggests this level has significance, market conditions, volume, and external factors ultimately determine whether resistance holds or breaks. What happens if Bitcoin breaks through this resistance? If Bitcoin successfully breaks through the $108,500 resistance with strong volume, it could signal continued upward momentum and potentially open the path to new all-time highs. How can traders use this information? Traders can watch for price action and volume patterns near this level to make informed decisions about position entries, exits, and risk management strategies. Does this analysis consider market sentiment? Yes, Glassnode‚Äôs approach incorporates both quantitative on-chain data and qualitative market sentiment factors that influence investor behavior at key price levels. Found this analysis helpful? Share this crucial Bitcoin resistance level insight with fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to help them make informed investment decisions! To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action and market analysis. title: Bybit Adds Polkadot (DOT) to On-Chain Earn
body: BitcoinWorld Bybit Adds Polkadot (DOT) to On-Chain Earn DUBAI, UAE, Nov. 10, 2025 /PRNewswire/ ‚Äî Bybit , the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, is thrilled to announce that its On-Chain Earn platform has recently added support for Polkadot (DOT) staking . This new addition allows users to stake DOT directly on-chain through Bybit and earn stable returns while helping to secure the Polkadot network. Polkadot, launched in 2020 by Ethereum co-founder Dr. Gavin Wood, is a multi-chain network designed to connect different blockchains. It enables the transfer of various types of data and assets between chains, improving interoperability and scalability. The network uses a shared security model where the main relay chain secures all connected parachains. DOT, Polkadot‚Äôs native token, is used for governance, staking, and bonding. Bybit On-Chain Earn simplifies the staking process by managing the technical requirements on behalf of users. Participants can earn bonus annual percentage rates (APR) by maintaining a staking period of at least 24 hours. Earnings are distributed to users‚Äô Funding Accounts daily at a fixed time. Once a redemption request is made, interest will no longer accrue. To participate, users must complete Identity Verification Level 1 and comply with Bybit‚Äôs Terms of Service. For more information, visit Bybit On-Chain Earn . #Bybit / #CryptoArk About¬†Bybit Bybit is the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, serving a global community of over 70 million users. Founded in 2018, Bybit is redefining openness in the decentralized world by creating a simpler, open and equal ecosystem for everyone. With a strong focus on Web3, Bybit partners strategically with leading blockchain protocols to provide robust infrastructure and drive on-chain innovation. Renowned for its secure custody, diverse marketplaces, intuitive user experience, and advanced blockchain tools, Bybit bridges the gap between TradFi and DeFi, empowering builders, creators, and enthusiasts to unlock the full potential of Web3. title: Bank of England Proposes ¬£20,000 Cap on Stablecoin Holdings
body: The Bank of England unveiled proposals for a regulatory regime governing sterling-denominated stablecoins, introducing temporary limits of ¬£20,000 for individuals and ¬£10 million for businesses holding systemic stablecoins. Deputy Governor Sarah Breeden defended the restrictions as necessary to prevent rapid deposit outflows from commercial banks that could threaten credit availability, while promising that the caps would be removed once the transition no longer posed a risk to the UK economy. Deputy Governor of the Bank of England | Source: Reuters Earlier today, a ‚Äú Proposed regulatory regime for sterling-denominated systemic stablecoins ‚Äù consultation paper was released. The consultation paper marks a significant step toward establishing Britain‚Äôs framework for digital assets that pose potential risks to financial stability. While Breeden insisted the UK regime would be operational ‚Äú just as quickly as the US ,‚Äù industry executives criticized the holding limits as overly cautious compared to America‚Äôs approach under the GENIUS Act , which established federal stablecoin regulation without ownership caps. Regulatory Framework Balances Innovation With Stability Concerns The proposed regime applies to systemic stablecoins, those widely used in payments that could impact UK financial stability, and will see joint oversight by the Bank of England for prudential matters and the Financial Conduct Authority for consumer protection. The Bank substantially revised its initial 2023 proposal, now permitting issuers to hold up to 60% of backing assets in short-term UK government debt securities while maintaining at least 40% in unremunerated Bank of England deposits. Capital requirements follow international standards, with issuers needing reserves equal to either the cost of recovery from the largest plausible loss event or six months of operating expenses. Statutory reserves placed on trust for coinholders will cover both financial risk from holding sovereign debt and insolvency costs, ensuring redemption requests are honored by the end of each business day. Industry Backlash Intensifies Over Restrictive Approach The proposed caps have triggered fierce criticism from crypto advocates, who view the measures as counterproductive. ‚Äú This proposal only enforces caps on holdings in the more ‚Äòsystemic‚Äô stablecoins most likely used for payments ,‚Äù Laurence wrote on X. ‚Äú It means I will be compelled to move my on-chain funds into something further out the risk curve. It is their safety they are concerned about, not yours. ‚Äú Another user, known as Stani.eth, called the approach ‚Äú absurd ,‚Äù arguing that ‚Äú stablecoins issued onchain do not pose greater risks than traditional electronic money issued on more fragile electronic databases. ‚Äù Meanwhile, Grant announced his departure from Britain, stating ‚Äú i‚Äôm leaving the UK this Friday for good. I just don‚Äôt trust them to fix it as they‚Äôre all highly incompetent and believe taxing their way out of the problem is the only solution. ‚Äú stablecoins are a systemic risk to the system, that's the whole point‚Ä¶ governments are worried about the debasement of their currencies against the crypto-dollar, and rightly so instead of trying to put the genie back in the bottle, get out in front of it, encourage‚Ä¶ https://t.co/idEjStBGrr ‚Äî Grant (@Grantblocmates) November 10, 2025 Strider labeled the proposal ‚Äú draconian ,‚Äù warning that ‚Äú proposed regulations like this is keeping a cap on the European crypto world. ‚Äù Tom Duff Gordon, Vice President of International Policy at Coinbase, has also previously told the Financial Times that ‚Äú imposing caps on stablecoins is bad for UK savers, bad for the City and bad for sterling ,‚Äù noting no other major jurisdiction deemed such limits necessary. Mortgage Market Differences Drive Cautious Stance Breeden explained that the holding limits stem from fundamental differences between British and American credit markets, where UK consumers obtain mortgages from commercial banks rather than government-sponsored enterprises. ‚Äú People in the UK get their mortgages from commercial banks, and so that issue that we talked about, about the need for limits as we transition to a world of stablecoins, is one that is less pertinent to the US regime, ‚Äù she said at a London conference on Wednesday. Despite promises that caps remain temporary, the consultation paper provides no timeline for when limits would be lifted. The global stablecoin market has expanded beyond $305 billion, yet sterling-pegged tokens remain negligible at just $1.65M compared to $511 million in euro-linked stablecoins, according to DeFiLlama data . Source: DeFiLlama The Bank expects to finalize regulations by year‚Äôs end. The post Bank of England Proposes ¬£20,000 Cap on Stablecoin Holdings appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: This Could Be the Fastest-Growing Crypto of Q4 2025, Here‚Äôs Why It‚Äôs Gaining Attention
body: The crypto market has kept rewarding early movers and as we head towards the last quarter of the year 2025, there are investors trying to scan the market in order to know the best crypto to purchase now before the next rally takes place. Amid all the clatter of meme coins and hype, there is one new crypto project that is rising above the rest due to its orderly expansion, accomplishable advancement, and coherent vision that is Mutuum Finance (MUTM) . Mutuum Finance is now self-positioning on the frontier of decentralized lending, liquidity management, and sustainable tokenomics, which can be the further evolution of blockchain-based finance. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Fundamentally, Mutuum Finance is building both a protocol of lending and borrowing that is centered around transparency and efficiency in a decentralized manner. The project operates under smart contracts without intermediaries making all transactions uninterrupted by human intervention. It is based on its Peer-to-Contract (P2C) lending protocol. In this case, lenders will tokenize their assets by depositing them in various liquidity pools and minting mtTokens, or tokens that give them yield, or interest. These mtTokens self-accrue interests to the borrowing activity that allow users to earn passive income with minimal effort. As an illustration, when an investor invests ETH via the Mutuum pool, he would be given an equivalent of mtETH, which would appreciate in value as long as borrowers use the funds. When the demand to borrow more funds grows, the yields of the lenders in terms of the annual percentage will get higher. Peer to Peer (P2P) component provides the ability to do custom lending. Borrowers are able to do direct negotiations with the lenders, and decide on the rates and times that they feel comfortable with. Every position is overcollateralized, that is, the borrowers are required to promise in collateral more than they are adding to the system, making the system robust enough to stand even in the times of market turbulence. Transparent Tokenomics The pre-sale at Mutuum Finance is already one of the most successful fundraising events in 2025. The project has already obtained more than $18.55 million, having attracted 17,850 holders and sale of 795 million tokens. The presale is based on the fixed-price, fixed-allocation strategy that mitigates rampant premature concentration and provides extensive community involvement. Out of 4 billion MUTM supply, 45.5% (1.82 billion tokens) gets to be distributed through the presale. In Phase 1, the token was introduced at a price of $0.01 and since then it has gone up to the current price of $0.035 in Phase 6, which is 250% higher than the initial price. When the presale enters the last phase, the launch price will be at 0.06. Approximately Phase 6 is already sold with more than 85 percent indicating the demand is ever-rapid with the project approaching its greatest milestone, the launch of the V1 Testnet. The project also operates a 24-Hour leaderboard to keep the community engaged and to announce the best contributors by offering them prizes each day via MUTM. Security Foundation and V1 Launch The official roadmap of the project states that V1 of the Mutuum Finance will be deployed on the Sepolia Testnet in Q4 2025, which will be an important move into actual development of the project to live testing. The testnet will include basic but essential features (Liquidity Pools), mtTokens, Debt Tokens, and the Liquidator Bot, and supported assets will be ETH and USDT the first. Security is left as one of the focal points in the project. Mutuum Finance managed to pass a CertiK audit with a score of 90/100 Token Scan and has adopted a 50,000 bug bounty to motivate developers to exploit code vulnerabilities before going live on mainnet. According to some market commentators, given that the platform will likely go through with its testnet phase successfully, the token can experience a high level of revaluation. Growth Prospects As large coins such as Solana and Cardano are showing sluggish growth amidst their very high prices, smaller projects are gaining more traction such as Mutuum Finance. According to a number of analysts, the utility-based model proposed by MUTM has the potential to achieve 5x-7x growth after its launch assuming that the adoption will be in line with the forecasts. The structure of the mtToken generates regular on-chain interactions, and the buy-and-distribute system grants the buyer with long-term purchasing force. Under this model, a portion of the fees charged on the platform are used to purchase MUTM tokens available on the open market and this is redistributed to users who stake mtTokens in the safety module. This construction encourages never-ending movement besides rewarding long-term players. Also, on-chain oracles are planned to be used to provide the right price feeds to all collateral assets and this reduces the liquidation risks and helps keep the market stable. These structural mechanics are some of the reasons why Mutuum Finance could be the best cryptocurrencies to watch in the year 2025 to experience long-term growth. When it comes to new crypto-based initiatives, Mutuum Finance is distinguished in 2025 due to its strong growth and focus on functionality. As the presale approaches its close, the V1 testnet approaches and it has plans underway to build the ecosystem long-term, the project has a solid structure to base what might be one of the most rapidly expanding DeFi cryptos in the next five years. For more information about Mutuum Finance (MUTM) visit the links below: Website: https://www.mutuum.com Linktree: https://linktr.ee/mutuumfinance

title: MEXC Users At Risk Of Losing Their Crypto? Ex-Public Advisor Exposes ‚ÄòStructural Rot‚Äô
body: Crypto trader the White Whale, who had offered to serve as an advisor to crypto exchange MEXC, has retracted his offer. This came as he highlighted a ‚Äòstructural rot‚Äô within the exchange, which puts customers at risk of losing their coins. Crypto Advisor Exposes ‚ÄòStructural Rot‚Äô Within MEXC In an X post, the White Whale described the fake proof of reserves, arbitrary justifications for seizures, the lack of due process, and the ability to block users from their own records as the structural rot within the crypto exchange. He further remarked that MEXC remains a ‚Äúrotten apple‚Äù as long as this structural rot exists. Related Reading: Bitcoin And Crypto Market Set To Bounce As Rate Cut Probabilities Touch 98.3% The White Whale revealed that he has withdrawn his offer to advise MEXC, claiming that something ‚Äúsinister‚Äù is brewing. The crypto trader initially offered to advise the crypto exchange for free after he recovered his $3 million from it. However, he is no longer offering his services as he believes everything within the exchange is all ‚Äúsmoke and mirrors.‚Äù The crypto trader explained that he had raised concerns about MEXC‚Äôs proof of reserves after offering to serve as an advisor to the crypto exchange. He mentioned to the exchange that publishing wallet addresses alone wasn‚Äôt sufficient as proof of reserves, and that they had to do more to ensure transparency with users‚Äô funds. The White Whale indicated that MEXC shrugged off this advice, suggesting that what they were doing was better than nothing. However, the crypto trader described the proof of reserves as ‚Äònothing.‚Äô He added that the exchange continues to push the fake proof-of-reserves narrative, which reminds him of the saying, ‚ÄúIf you have to tell people you‚Äôre a lady, you aren‚Äôt.‚Äù On Confiscating Users‚Äô Funds The White Whale mentioned that he told MEXC to stop confiscating users‚Äô funds and that if they suspect illegal activity, they should report it to law enforcement. However, he claimed the exchange is still confiscating users‚Äô funds and that it is getting worse. The crypto trader revealed that a particular user reached out to him with evidence, which he verified. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Could See A New All-Time High Above $126,000 If It Breaks This Critical Level MEXC allegedly cited its Risk Control Guidelines as the reason for confiscating these funds. The White Whale stated that the crypto exchange still used terms like ‚Äúsuspected,‚Äù meaning it can permanently confiscate funds based on mere suspicion. He further claimed that the exchange could easily prevent the major items on the list through code, but doing so would remove their excuse to seize user funds. Meanwhile, the White Whale noted that MEXC now wipes users‚Äô transaction history after confiscating their funds. He stated that this happened after he made his account history public to prove his innocence, following the confiscation of $3 million from his account. This move by the crypto exchange now makes it harder for users to prove their innocence. Featured image from Pxfuel, chart from Tradingview.com

Bitcoin whales exit Bitcoin for ETF exposure
body: On November 9, Dr. Martin Hiesboeck, Head of Research at the Cloud-based Financial Service Platform Uphold, said that BTC whales are beginning to sell their coins as they transition into exchange-traded funds ETFs and explore other blockchain projects. Hiesboeck claimed that one of the reasons the OG Bitcoin holders are selling their BTC holdings is to repurchase them in the form of ETFs . ETFs offer major tax benefits under current regulations, particularly in the U.S. He emphasized that the sell-off serves as a means of giving covert stashes legitimacy. BTC whales trigger a major sell-off wave According to Hiesboeck, long-term Bitcoin holders have come to realize that blockchain, which is being utilized in every business, is the true revolution, rather than BTC itself. As a result, numerous other initiatives offer higher returns than BTC, which currently has a broad range of use cases. Hiesboeck stated that BTC‚Äôs compound annual growth rate (CAGR) has been declining, indicating that it is shifting from being a high-growth asset to being used ‚Äúas a hedge against traditional financial systems failures and fiat.‚Äù Over the past four years, BTC‚Äôs CAGR has been slowly dropping. As of November 10, BiTBO estimates that CAGR is approximately 13%. Bitcoin CAGR declines over four years to 13%. Source: BiTBO Dr. Martin Hiesboeck stated that Bitcoin‚Äôs maturity is accelerated by the launch of U.S. Bitcoin spot ETFs, which attract huge institutional capital, providing less volatility than retail-driven trading. For instance, over the course of one month, SoSoValue data reveal that U.S. Bitcoin spot ETFs saw a net inflow of $1.2 billion. The ETFs have a total net asset value of $138.08 billion, with an ETF net asset ratio of 6.67% (market capitalization in relation to the entire BTC market cap). The total historical net inflow is $59.97 billion. According to Lookonchain, Bitcoin whale Owen Gunden transferred 3,600.55 BTC (about $372 million) on November 8. Out of this, 500 BTC, or roughly $51.68 million, has already been placed into Kraken. The remaining 3,100.55 BTC, or roughly $320 million, is anticipated to be sent over the next few days. On September 17, Lookonchain revealed that a long-dormant Bitcoin whale transferred over $116 million worth of the cryptocurrency after a 12-year hiatus, just before the U.S. Federal Reserve‚Äôs highly anticipated interest rate decision. The whale had originally purchased the coins for roughly $847 each. According to Lookonchain, the wallet had held $847,000 worth of BTC for more than ten years before transferring it to new wallets on September 17. Dormant BTC Whale Moves $116 Million Worth of BTC After 12 Years. Source: Lookonchain Another Bitcoin whale from the Satoshi era reappeared after 14 years of dormancy, possibly hoping to sell more than $4 billion worth of BTC. According to data from blockchain intelligence platform Nansen, the Satoshi-era Bitcoin whale transferred 40,010 BTC, worth more than $4.6 billion, on July 14 this year. Of this amount, 28,600 BTC were later transferred to Galaxy Digital. On July 15, the remaining 10,200 BTC, valued at $1.2 billion, was transferred to Galaxy Digital, increasing the total amount moved over the previous two days to $4.6 billion. BTC enters new distribution phase amid volatility Earlier last month, macro researcher Jordi Visser proposed that Bitcoin is in its initial product offering phase, with new traders acquiring the tokens and original holders rotating out, expanding distribution. Jordi Visser claims that despite Bitcoin‚Äôs sideways movement, there is still confidence in the core value, as evidenced by ETF approvals and the BTC network hashrate reaching all-time highs. In a post on Substack and an episode of businessman Anthony Pompliano‚Äôs podcast on Saturday, Visser stated that long-dormant coins are moving, ‚Äúnot all at once.‚Äù Not in a panic. However, new investors are gradually entering the market and ‚Äúaccumulating on dips.‚Äù Bitcoin (BTC) is currently trading at $106,483.50, up $1,719.60 (1.64%) for the day. The cryptocurrency has shown increasing volatility over the last seven days, ranging from $106,786 to $115,957. Want your project in front of crypto‚Äôs top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Hits $106K: Why the Big Rally Isn't Loaded Yet?
body: Bitcoin (BTC) rallied to $106,500 early on Monday following a trend breakout on Sunday. Can Bitcoin go higher, or are we about to see a rejection from the current position? Back to retest the trendline or horizontal support? Source: TradingView It‚Äôs all pretty much in the chart as to what probably happens next. It can be seen in the 4-hour chart above that the $BTC price took a quick turn back to the upside on Sunday when it perhaps looked more likely that the price was going back to the $100,000 horizontal support level for another retest. Instead, the price rose steadily through Sunday before breaking out of the downtrend line at the end of the day. Monday morning has seen the price rise to the $106,000 horizontal level where it is currently struggling and looking likely to reject from here. The Stochastic RSI indicators are just starting to roll over and back down, so the likelihood is that the $BTC price could either retest the descending trendline as support, or break through, or follow it down to the major $100,000 support level. If the bulls do manage to push the price higher from here, it just becomes further overbought and the reckoning with the bears will just have to take place a bit higher up - possibly at $110,000. Retest of 15-month trendline before major rally? Source: TradingView On the daily chart one can just about see the little trend break that is currently taking place. At the bottom of the chart, the RSI indicator has also just broken through a downtrend, suggesting that there may be more longevity in this move. However, in the bigger picture this is just a bit more noise. The $BTC price would still be expected to come down that little bit further in order to make a retest of the major ascending trendline. Once that has occurred, all the boxes would then probably be ticked and a proper strong rally could then kick off. Hash Ribbons indicator signals something big is coming Source: TradingView The above weekly chart for $BTC shows the entirety of the bull market so far. A rough trendline has been drawn in order to show that three big upside price waves have taken place. It could be contended that another big price wave exists right at the beginning of the bull market, but we are generally trying to show the waves on an ascending trendline. The vertical green dotted lines in the chart show the Hash Ribbons buy signals. These buy signals are quite rare in the weekly time frame, and it can be seen that they roughly correspond to the end of one wave and the beginning of the next. The Hash ribbons indicator tracks the network hashrate, and triggers a buy signal when Bitcoin miners capitulate, causing the hashrate to drop sharply because of unprofitably mining. This normally combines with a low price and a beginning of network recovery, which normally leads to a rally in price. An anomaly in the chart reveals that instead of 1 or 2 buy signals in a year, 2025 has received 3 buy signals, which has never before happened in such close proximity. The significance here is that miners have restarted mining not once, but three times, suggesting an accelerated hashrate rebound, therefore a deeper capitulation, but followed by a shallower recovery time. Is another big price wave about to form? Wouldn‚Äôt this take the price beyond the 8-year ascending trendline, and in its turn cause a huge explosive rally to the upside? This bull market may be far from over. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: The Bank of England Wants to Impose a Stablecoin Limit on Individual Users! Here Are the Details
body: The Bank of England (BoE) has proposed new regulations for the country's stablecoin market. The Bank plans to limit stablecoin holdings in individuals to a maximum of ¬£20,000, while allowing companies to hold up to ¬£10 million. Bank of England Proposes ¬£20,000 Limit on Individual Stablecoin Investments The move is part of a comprehensive regulatory framework aimed at reducing risks and maintaining financial stability in the UK's digital asset market. The BoE's proposal aims to prevent individual investors from taking excessive risks as stablecoins become more widely used as payment instruments in the country. In addition, reserve rules have been set for stablecoin issuers that will be placed under the new BoE supervision after being audited by the UK Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). Accordingly, a maximum of 95% of the reserve assets of such stablecoins will be allowed to be invested in short-term government bonds. Officials stated that these regulations would both increase user trust and ensure the seamless integration of stablecoins into the UK financial system. The BoE's proposal will enter the legal process following feedback from the public and market participants. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: The Bank of England Wants to Impose a Stablecoin Limit on Individual Users! Here Are the Details

Aptos historic price sentiment Aptos price history chart by CoinGecko Aptos raised seed funding in January 2022, led by a16z. Series A funding included Apollo, Dragonfly, Franklin Templeton, and others. Some members previously worked on the Diem blockchain proposed by Facebook. The Aptos mainnet launched in October 2022 with an initial supply of 1 billion tokens. After the launch hype, Apt fell to its lowest in December 2022, at $3.09. A month later, the tables turned, as it peaked at a time high of $19.90 on January 30, 2023. It pumped, partly driven by the NFT market. Collections such as Aptos Monkeys and Aptomingod have attracted more users. On June 6, it fell below its initial listing price and extended the losses in the preceding months. In October, it started correcting, rising as high as $8.47 in November. In 2024, it broke above $10, reaching $18 in March. From April, it reversed, falling below $10. By September, it had fallen as low as $6. It recovered in October, rising above $7.50. It crossed into November, trading at the $8.9 mark, and rose to as high as $13.91. It corrected and traded at $13.24 into December. It later corrected and crossed into 2025, trading at the $8.71 mark. The drop continued into February, and in May, it fell below $5.10. In October, it crossed above $5.30, then assumed a bear run, and by November, it had dropped to $3.21.

title: HUMA price soars amid Huma Finance‚Äôs strategic expansion into Asia-Pacific
body: The cryptocurrency market turned green on Monday following news of the US progressing toward lifting the prolonged government shutdown . Bitcoin soared from above $101,000 to surpass $106,000 as the cryptocurrency market cap reclaimed $3.58 trillion after an over 4% increase in the past 24 hours. Altcoins recorded notable uptick as they mirrored enhanced broader sentiments. Meanwhile, HUMA‚Äôs 6.4% uptick coincided with the appointment of Jessica Cao to lead Huma Finance‚Äôs Asia-Pacific operations, according to a local source . With over 17 years of leadership at Standard Chartered, Citigroup, and Ant International, Cao will fuel the PayFi project‚Äôs growth, product evolution, and partnerships across the Asia Pacific region as CEO. Commenting on the strategic move, Jessica Cao emphasised Huma Finance‚Äôs long-term goals, stating: The Asia-Pacific region provides unique opportunities to connect traditional finance with emerging blockchain infrastructure. Huma‚Äôs vision goes beyond payment finance to unlock liquidity and provide efficient solutions to businesses across the region. Meanwhile, Cao‚Äôs appointment comes ahead of this week‚Äôs (November 12 to 14) Singapore Fintech Festival, which celebrates ten years of financial innovation. Huma Finance is a PayFi platform aiming to democratise the global payment industry with instant liquidity. Under the new APAC CEO, the project plans to accelerate the adoption of its PayFi solutions by promoting financial inclusion through DeFi and TradFi. A milestone for digital payments Huma Finance‚Äôs strategic expansion into APAC marks a new era for the PayFi platform, reflecting increasing integration between decentralized systems and traditional finance. Huma Finance is now combining leadership experience, stablecoin liquidity, and tokenized assets to shape cross-border finance with inclusivity, cost-efficiency, and speed. As the Asia-Pacific region embraces blockchain, Huma Finance‚Äôs focus indicates how on-chain capital can revolutionise real-world economic activities with instant liquidity access and financial inclusion. With Jessica Cao as CEO, Huma Finance looks to cement its status as a primary player in the vibrant APAC by merging blockchain with traditional finance. HUMA price outlook The altcoin maintained a bullish outlook today, trading at $0.02397. The digital asset looks to extend the gains as Bitcoin targets $110,000 . Chart by CoinMarketCap However, HUMA requires amplified trading volumes to support its recovery in the near term. Technical indicators also suggest feeble momentum. Huma Finance‚Äôs token is trading below the 50 and 100 Exponential Moving Averages on the 24-hour chart. The Relative Strength Index at 44 hints at seller preference. Nonetheless, the emerging green histograms and bullish crossover by the Moving Average Convergence Divergence signals potential reversals. Meanwhile, broader sentiments will shape HUMA‚Äôs performance in the coming sessions. Continued rallies could see the altcoin reclaiming early October levels above $0.03700. On the other hand, overall market struggles will likely erase HUMA‚Äôs latest gains. The post HUMA price soars amid Huma Finance‚Äôs strategic expansion into Asia-Pacific appeared first on Invezz

title: Why Is Crypto Up Today? ‚Äì November 10, 2025
body: The crypto market is up today, with the cryptocurrency market capitalisation increasing by 2.6%, now standing at $3.62 trillion. Nearly all of the top 100 coins have risen over the past 24 hours. At the same time, the total crypto trading volume is at $136 billion. TLDR: The crypto market capitalisation is up by 2.6% on Monday morning (UTC); 99 of the top 100 coins and all of the top 10 coins are up today; BTC increased by 4.3% to $106,253, and ETH rose by 5.7% to $3,606; The US Senate advanced a deal on Sunday to reopen the federal government; Realized losses suggest capitulation among recent BTC buyers; ‚ÄôDon‚Äôt expect a quick unidirectional move lower in BTC‚Äô; We will see the low in the $71,000 to $84,000 region reached sometime towards the second half of 2026; Both US BTC and ETH spot ETFs saw outflows on Friday, with $558.44 million and $46.62 million, respectively; The US Labor Department didn‚Äôt publish its employment report for a second straight month due to the government shutdown; Crypto market sentiment remains firmly in the fear territory. Crypto Winners & Losers At the time of writing, all of the top 10 coins per market capitalization have seen their prices increase over the past 24 hours. Bitcoin (BTC) has appreciated by 4.3% since this time yesterday, currently trading at $106,253. Bitcoin (BTC) 24h 7d 30d 1y All time Ethereum (ETH) is up by 5.7%, now changing hands at $3,606. This is the second-highest increase in the category. The highest rise in the category is 8.7% by XRP , now trading at $2.48. Among these, Tron (TRX) saw the smallest increase, recording a 1.3% rise to the price of $0.2936. Looking at the top 100 coins, three saw double-digit rises. Pump.fun (PUMP) is up 15.4% to $0.004402, followed by Zcash (ZEC)‚Äôs 15.3% to $662.97. The third one is Uniswap (UNI) , which saw an increase of 14.3%, now standing at $6.74. On the other hand, Internet Computer (ICP) is the only red coin, having dropped 9.8% to $7.14. Meanwhile, the US Senate advanced a deal on Sunday to reopen the federal government, funding operations through 30 January 2026. The shutdown has had its influence on the crypto market as it tightened liquidity and increased volatility. Therefore, a resolution would be beneficial for the markets across the board, but any issues could prolong the volatility. BTC May Drop to $70K-$80K in Q2 2026 John Glover, Chief Investment Officer of Ledn , argued that ‚ÄúBTC prices continue to come softer as expected.‚Äù That said, he highlights that there is typically ‚Äúa fair bit of volatility‚Äù as tops or bottoms form. Therefore, he says, ‚Äúdon‚Äôt expect a quick unidirectional move lower in BTC.‚Äù Glover expects that we will see the low in the $71,000 to $84,000 region reached sometime towards the second half of 2026 (the yellow line in the chart below). Source: Ledn One of the key 4 th wave targets is the 23.6% Fibonacci retracement, which sits at $99,000, he continues. ‚ÄúWe have yet to close below that level, so this is where I expect the first bounce.‚Äù ‚ÄúWhile some feel strongly that the 23.6% support will hold, I expect Wave IV to be quite complex, with lots of rallies and sell-offs, eventually hitting the 50% to 38.2% retracement levels ($71k and $84k respectively),‚Äù Glover concluded. Moreover, according to Glassnode analysts, realized losses suggest capitulation among recent BTC buyers. I'm keeping my eye on Spot & Futures Volume and ETF inflows to see if the demand side is ready to step in here. ‚Äî Chris Beamish (@ChrisBeamish_) November 10, 2025 Levels & Events to Watch Next At the time of writing on Monday morning, BTC trades at $106,253. The charts show a clear and gradual increase from the intraday low of $101,546 to the intraday high of $106,488. While green on the daily front, the coin is red in the weekly and monthly timeframes. It‚Äôs down 1.4% over the past 7 days and 4.9% over the last 30 days. It‚Äôs also 16% below its all-time high of $126,080 seen a month ago. Sustaining the price above $106,000 could see BTC move over $110,000. This would open doors for further rallies. On the other hand, falling below $103,200 may lead to the $100,000 level and a decline toward the $98,000-$95,000 zone. Ethereum is currently changing hands at $3,606. Like BTC, ETH recorded a notable increase from the day‚Äôs low of $3,384 to the high of $3,647. It hasn‚Äôt corrected much since. Over the past week, the price moved between $3,162 and $3,727. Overall, the coin is down 3.2% in a week and 6% in a month. Also, it‚Äôs 27.4% away from the August ATH of $4,946. The current key resistance zones stand at $3,783, $4,231, and $4,549. A break above $3,800 could result in a bullish move toward $4,200 and higher. But a failure to hold above $3,300 may lead the coin to retest the support levels around $3,050. Meanwhile, Ethereum network fees have plunged to some of their lowest levels in years . Ethereum (ETH) 24h 7d 30d 1y All time Moreover, the crypto market sentiment has stayed within the fear zone since the beginning of this month. The crypto fear and greed index stands at 24 today , somewhat higher than Friday‚Äôs 21, but still relatively close to the ‚Äòextreme fear‚Äô level. Except for the first third of October, the rest of that month and the first ten days of November have been spent in the neutral and the fear zones. It is clear that fear is leading the market and pulling the prices down. Investors selling their crypto can lead to higher selling pressure and volatility. That said, it‚Äôs also creating buying opportunities for the hodlers. ETFs Return to Negative Flows The US BTC spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) resumed the red performance, following a single day of inflows. On Friday, it recorded $558.44 million in outflows, a level similar to Tuesday‚Äôs. The total net inflow fell to $59.97 billion. Five of the 12 ETFs saw outflows. There were no inflows. Fidelity is at the top of the red list with $256.66 million, followed by Ark&21Shares‚Äô $144.24 million and BlackRock‚Äôs $131.43 million. Same as the BTC ETFs, the US ETH ETFs saw one day of positive flows on Thursday, breaking an outflow streak, but it turned back to red on Friday with $46.62 million in inflows. The total net inflow now stands at $13.86 billion. Unlike BTC ETFs, two of the nine funds saw positive flows, and two saw outflows. BlackRock and Invesco took in $34.43 million and $2.59 million, respectively. At the same time, Fidelity and Grayscale let go of $72.23 million and $11.42 million, respectively. Meanwhile, the US spot Bitcoin ETFs have recorded a net outflow of $1.22 billion in the past week ‚Äì the third-largest ever recorded. This follows ongoing market volatility and macroeconomic pressures. From November 3 to November 7 (ET), spot Bitcoin ETFs saw a weekly net outflow of $1.22 billion, the third-largest on record. Spot Ethereum ETFs recorded a weekly net outflow of $508 million, also the third-largest in history. Spot Solana ETFs posted a weekly net inflow of $137‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/6QHfqFTsRb ‚Äî Wu Blockchain (@WuBlockchain) November 10, 2025 Quick FAQ Why did crypto move against stocks today? The crypto market has increased over the past day, and the stock market saw a mixed picture during work hours on Friday. By the closing time on 7 November, the S&P 500 was up by 0.13%, the Nasdaq-100 decreased by 0.28%, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose by 0.16%. The US government shutdown continues to affect the markets. The October jobs report didn‚Äôt go out on Friday again. This data is useful to investors who are looking for signals on the Federal Reserve‚Äôs next interest rates move. Is this rally sustainable? The US Senate advanced a deal on Sunday to reopen the federal government. Investors are now keeping a close eye on the developments, as successful reopening would ease the volatility and benefit the crypto marker overall.
