Among the many names, some projects are setting themselves apart with working infrastructure, large fundraising milestones, or viral-driven hype. This article explores four of the most talked-about presale crypto coins: BlockDAG, Nexchain, Bitcoin Hyper, and Little Pepe. Each brings a different approach to blockchain and crypto adoption, ranging from high-performance networks and utility mining rigs to AI integration and meme-powered communities. Let‚Äôs break down what makes them worth watching. 1. BlockDAG: Tech, Trust, & Over $435M Raised BlockDAG (BDAG) is one of the biggest presale crypto coins of this cycle, raising over $435 million and gaining 312,000+ holders. Its technology combines Bitcoin-style Proof-of-Work security with a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) structure, allowing 2,000‚Äì15,000 transactions per second. The live Awakening Testnet already processes over 1,400 TPS with full EVM compatibility, showing it‚Äôs not just a whitepaper concept. This hybrid design solves scalability limits without compromising decentralization or security; two issues many chains struggle with. What truly separates BlockDAG from other presale crypto coins is its transparent leadership. CEO Antony Turner brings 30 years of Fintech experience, while CTO Jeremy Harkness and advisor Dr. Maurice Herlihy bring academic and engineering credibility. The platform has completed security audits from CertiK and Halborn, and over 20,000 X-series miners (X10, X30, X100) have already been sold, giving users a way to earn BDAG before mainnet launch. BlockDAG recently shifted into its ‚ÄúValue Era,‚Äù where it ends all bonuses and incentives to build long-term stability. The presale officially closes on February 10, 2026, or when supply sells out. Coins in Batch 32 are currently priced at $0.005, with a target listing price of $0.05. With real infrastructure, active mining adoption, and institutional-scale funding, BlockDAG remains the front-runner among presale crypto coins. 2. Nexchain: The AI-Powered Layer 1 Nexchain is positioning itself as an AI-optimized Layer 1 network using a mix of Proof-of-Stake and DAG architecture. The team claims processing speeds of up to 400,000 TPS and ultra-low fees around $0.001 per transaction. Its presale is currently in Stage 27, selling tokens at around $0.108 with a projected listing price close to $0.30. So far, Nexchain has raised over $10 million, showing strong early traction. Its ecosystem plans include AI-integrated smart contracts, developer SDKs, and cross-chain support. While ambitious, the project is still in presale and yet to prove live performance, meaning execution matters from here on. Still, its tech narrative and growth pace keep it in the conversation. 3. Bitcoin Hyper: Extending Utility Beyond Bitcoin Bitcoin Hyper is marketed as a project built to enhance the Bitcoin ecosystem rather than compete with it. As of early November 2025, the presale has crossed $25.5 million, attracting investors who believe in Bitcoin but want more scalable applications and token-based utility. Some listing platforms show an early trading price around $0.000027, though liquidity remains thin at this stage. Its appeal lies in its narrative; bringing smart contract utility and scalability to Bitcoin-inspired infrastructure. However, many technical details are still limited, and adoption will depend on whether it can deliver real-world use cases. That said, among presale crypto coins, it stands out due to strong branding and community-driven enthusiasm. 4. Little Pepe: Meme Hype With Real Utility Plans Little Pepe takes a meme-first approach but claims to add real usage by launching on a Layer-2 EVM-compatible network. The presale has raised over $27.4 million, selling more than 16.6 billion tokens out of its 100 billion supply. Current presale pricing sits around $0.0022, with expectations of listing near $0.0030. Unlike many meme coins, Little Pepe outlines utility components like zero trading tax, anti-bot protections, and future staking functions. Its success depends on whether it can maintain hype beyond its launch and actually deliver on its technical promises. Still, it‚Äôs one of the fastest-selling presale crypto coins in the meme category. Final Take Presales come with high potential and high risk, but they also offer early access to projects shaping future market conversations. Presale crypto coins like BlockDAG, Nexchain, Bitcoin Hyper, and Little Pepe each target different audiences, whether it‚Äôs hardcore tech believers, meme communities, AI innovators, or Bitcoin purists. Among them, BlockDAG stands out due to its working Testnet, strong leadership, audited code, and massive community funding above $435 million. Nexchain appeals to those focused on AI scaling, Bitcoin Hyper to Bitcoin loyalists looking for utility, and Little Pepe to meme culture with added structure. As always, these are speculative and require proper research, but they highlight where early interest is shifting in the presale crypto coins space. title: First U.S. Spot XRP ETFs Could Launch Next Week. Here‚Äôs Why
body: The cryptocurrency market is on the verge of a pivotal moment. The launch of the first U.S.-listed spot XRP ETFs could happen next week , marking a significant milestone in traditional finance‚Äôs adoption of this major altcoin. What the DTCC Listing Reveals According to Coin Bureau‚Äôs post on X, the Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC) recently listed five spot XRP ETFs under its ‚Äúactive and pre-launch‚Äù category ‚Äî specifically vehicles from Bitwise Asset Management, Franklin Templeton Investments , 21Shares, Canary Capital, and CoinShares. Inclusion in DTCC‚Äôs active/pre-launch registry indicates that operational readiness steps ‚Äî such as custody arrangements and settlement processing ‚Äî are in place for these funds. That said, this listing does not amount to formal regulatory approval by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Approval remains the final gatekeeper. BREAKING: The first U.S. spot #XRP ETFs could launch next week. The DTCC just listed five spot XRP ETFS from Bitwise, Franklin Templeton, 21Shares, Canary, and CoinShares under its "active and pre-launch" category. pic.twitter.com/h1HQRpaEsm ‚Äî Coin Bureau (@coinbureau) November 10, 2025 Regulatory and Market Context The broader regulatory landscape dramatically shifted on September 18, 2025, when the SEC approved rule changes allowing national exchanges to adopt generic listing standards for certain spot crypto ETFs ‚Äî thereby drastically reducing the time and complexity required for listing. With the launch of spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs now behind us, issuers are keen to replicate that window of opportunity with other large-market-cap tokens such as XRP. The firms‚Äô coordinated filing amendments indicate they‚Äôre preparing¬†for¬†a¬†launch. Why This Matters for XRP and the Market If one or more of these spot XRP ETFs begin trading next week, institutional access to XRP could broaden significantly. ETFs offer a regulated, familiar pathway for capital flow into underlying crypto assets, which may enhance liquidity, narrow spreads, and bring new investor classes into the fold. The anticipation of the launch has already boosted XRP‚Äôs price and¬†trading¬†volume. For instance, XRP rose more than 8% in a session as ETF expectations mounted. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Moreover, a successful launch could pave the way for further altcoin ETFs and accelerate the integration of crypto into mainstream asset portfolios. Risks & Timing Considerations Despite the optimism, investors must remain mindful of caveats. Listing on the DTCC does not equal SEC approval. Final regulatory sign-off could still face delays or require additional disclosures. Additionally, the magnitude and timing of fund inflows will depend heavily on issuer market-making infrastructure and investor demand, which can be unpredictable. Given these factors, market watchers will be looking for formal exchange notices announcing ticker symbols, launch dates, and trading venues ‚Äî these are the final stepping stones before live trading begins. Outlook All signs currently point toward a launch window in mid-November, possibly as early as next week. If approved, the first wave of U.S. spot XRP ETFs may go live shortly, marking a notable milestone for the token and the broader digital-asset ecosystem. For crypto journalists, academics, and traders alike, this development merits close attention. Disclaimer: This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are advised to conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on Twitter , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post First U.S. Spot XRP ETFs Could Launch Next Week. Here‚Äôs Why appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: Strategic Bitcoin Investment: KOSDAQ Giant Bitplanet Expands Holdings with 15 Additional BTC
body: BitcoinWorld Strategic Bitcoin Investment: KOSDAQ Giant Bitplanet Expands Holdings with 15 Additional BTC In a bold move that underscores growing institutional confidence, KOSDAQ-listed Bitplanet has significantly strengthened its Bitcoin investment portfolio. The company‚Äôs latest acquisition of 15 additional BTC brings their total holdings to an impressive 200 Bitcoin, signaling a robust commitment to cryptocurrency as a strategic asset. Why Is Bitplanet‚Äôs Bitcoin Investment Strategy So Significant? Bitplanet‚Äôs consistent Bitcoin investment approach demonstrates how traditional companies are embracing digital assets. The KOSDAQ-listed firm, formerly known as SGA, began its cryptocurrency journey after securing backing from Sora Ventures, a prominent crypto venture capital firm. This strategic partnership has enabled Bitplanet to build a substantial Bitcoin investment position that now totals 200 BTC. Corporate Bitcoin investment represents more than just financial speculation. Companies like Bitplanet recognize Bitcoin‚Äôs potential as: A hedge against inflation A diversification tool A long-term store of value A strategic technological bet How Does This Bitcoin Investment Reflect Broader Market Trends? The growing corporate Bitcoin investment trend isn‚Äôt isolated to Bitplanet. Numerous publicly traded companies worldwide are allocating portions of their treasury reserves to Bitcoin. This movement validates cryptocurrency‚Äôs role in modern corporate finance strategies. Bitplanet‚Äôs latest Bitcoin investment of 15 BTC follows careful market analysis and strategic planning. The company‚Äôs approach mirrors patterns seen with other forward-thinking corporations that recognize Bitcoin‚Äôs unique value proposition. Their continued accumulation suggests confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term prospects despite market volatility. What Challenges Do Companies Face with Bitcoin Investment? While the potential rewards are significant, corporate Bitcoin investment comes with unique challenges. Companies must navigate regulatory requirements, security concerns, and accounting complexities. Bitplanet‚Äôs successful navigation of these hurdles provides a blueprint for other corporations considering similar moves. Key considerations for corporate Bitcoin investment include: Secure storage solutions Regulatory compliance Accounting treatment Risk management protocols What Can We Learn from Bitplanet‚Äôs Bitcoin Investment Strategy? Bitplanet‚Äôs methodical approach to Bitcoin investment offers valuable insights for other companies. Their gradual accumulation strategy, starting with initial purchases and continuing with measured additional investments, demonstrates prudent risk management. This Bitcoin investment philosophy balances opportunity with careful consideration of market conditions. The company‚Äôs transparency about their Bitcoin investment holdings, reported through platforms like BitcoinTreasuries, contributes to market confidence and sets a positive example for corporate cryptocurrency adoption. Conclusion: The Future of Corporate Bitcoin Investment Bitplanet‚Äôs expanded Bitcoin investment positions them at the forefront of corporate cryptocurrency adoption. Their growing 200 BTC portfolio reflects a strategic vision that recognizes digital assets as essential components of modern treasury management. As more companies follow this path, corporate Bitcoin investment will likely become standard practice rather than exceptional behavior. Frequently Asked Questions How much Bitcoin does Bitplanet now own? Bitplanet currently holds 200 BTC following their recent purchase of 15 additional Bitcoin. When did Bitplanet start investing in Bitcoin? The company began acquiring Bitcoin after receiving investment from crypto venture capital firm Sora Ventures. What exchange is Bitplanet listed on? Bitplanet is listed on KOSDAQ, South Korea‚Äôs equivalent of NASDAQ. Why are companies investing in Bitcoin? Companies view Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation, diversification tool, and long-term store of value. How does corporate Bitcoin investment affect the market? title: BTC, ETH stage recovery despite ETFs recording $1.2 billion in outflows
body: Since last week, Bitcoin exchange-traded funds have recorded $1.2 billion in outflows even as major Wall Street firms increase their bets. Nonetheless, Bitcoin and Ethereum have recouped their recent losses. Spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds recorded outflows worth $558.44 million on Friday last week, bringing the week‚Äôs total outflows to $1.2 billion. According to data from ETF tracking platform SosoValue, Fidelity (FBTC) led the firms with negative flows worth $256 million, while Ark & 21Shares (ARKB) followed with $144.24 million. BlackRock‚Äôs iBIT sees $131.43 million in net outflows iShares Bitcoin Trust(IBIT) 1D net inflow. Source: SosoValue BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF came in third with $131.43 million, while Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC and Bitwise‚Äôs BITB registered outflows worth $15.44 million and $10.68 million, respectively. Grayscale (BTC), VanEck (HODL), Invesco (BTCO), Valkyrie (BRRR), Franklin (EZBC), Wisdom Tree (BTCW), and Hashdex did not record any flows on Friday. Similarly, data from Sosovalue also shows that Ethereum ETFs registered negative flows last week. The firms recorded outflows worth $46.62 million on Friday, bringing their net outflows for the week to a little over half a billion. In contrast, Solana ETFs outperformed Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs last week. The data shows that the ETFs have had a streak of positive flows since their inception on October 28. On Friday, the ETFs recorded inflows worth $12.69 million, bringing the total inflows for the week to $136.5 million. The prices of Bitcoin and Ethereum have sharply recovered and reversed recent losses brought on by macroeconomic uncertainties, despite the poor flows of spot ETFs. According to crypto price tracking platform CoinMarketCap, Bitcoin is up 4% in the last 24 hours, shedding its seven-day loss to 1.48%. The crypto asset is currently exchanging hands for $106,371.49. On the other hand, Ethereum is up 4.92% in the last 24 hours and down 3.47% in the last 7 days. The crypto asset is currently trading at $3,607. Solana has surged by 5.05% in the last 24 hours, reducing its seven-day losses to 4.62%. SOL‚Äôs current market price is $167.69, and the crypto asset holds the sixth position among the largest cryptocurrencies by market capitalization. Wall Street‚Äôs growing interest in crypto continues Despite the recent performance of Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, Wall Street continues to show significant interest in the crypto ecosystem. BlackRock‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF continues to lead inflows this year with $82.28 billion in net assets under management. FBTC follows IBIT with $20.71 billion in net assets, while GBTC trails closely behind with $17.72 billion in net assets. The firms now cumulatively hold $138.08 billion in net assets under management. Fidelity and VanEck have also expanded their spot product lines, while Bitwise and Grayscale pioneered Solana ETFs in late October. These ETFs have experienced a surge in demand since their inception, attracting nearly $70 million on the first day of trading. The firms have drawn a little over half a billion dollars from investors at the time of this publication, according to SosoValue. Spot XRP ETFs set to launch in the US this month Five spot XRP ETFs from Canary Capital, CoinShares, 21Shares, Franklin Templeton, and Bitwise also recently appeared on DTCC‚Äôs list, which was last updated on Friday. Cryptopolitan recently reported that the ETFs are expected to hit the U.S. market by the end of November and will include both active and pre-launch ETFs. Nate Geraci, co-founder and President of Nova Dius Wealth, said that the end of the government shutdown paves the way for an imminent surge in spot crypto ETFs. Geraci also emphasized that the first ‚Äô33 Act spot XRP ETF could be unveiled as early as this week. Sign up to Bybit and start trading with $30,050 in welcome gifts

title: XRP ETF Watch: DTCC Listing Signals Possible 1933 Act Launch This Week
body: The first spot XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF) structured under the Securities Act of 1933 could debut this week. This follows the recent addition of five XRP ETFs to the Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation‚Äôs (DTCC) active roster. DTCC Listing Brings Spot XRP ETFs Closer to Launch The DTCC inclusion confirms that the clearing and settlement systems are ready for these investment products. The database is a centralized system that records and processes securities transactions, including ETFs, in the United States financial markets. However, the development is not an approval from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) but is widely seen as one of the final steps before launch. The listed funds include the Bitwise XRP ETF (XRP), Franklin Templeton XRP Trust (XRPZ), 21Shares XRP ETF (TOXR), Canary Capital XRP ETF (XRPC), and CoinShares XRP ETF (XRPL). The timing of these additions coincides with the resolution of the U.S. government shutdown, which had previously stalled regulatory processes. Following the Senate‚Äôs approval of a bipartisan funding package, agencies like the SEC can now resume normal operations. This allows for the review of all new financial products, including ETFs, to move forward. Nate Geraci, president of NovaDius Wealth Management, commented on the development, stating, ‚ÄúGovernment shutdown ending = spot crypto ETF floodgates opening,‚Äù adding that he expects the spot XRP ETFs to go live this week. The analyst also believes that these developments show a clear shift in regulatory tone, following the end of Ripple‚Äôs five-year legal dispute with the SEC in August 2025. Amended S-1 Filings Pave the Way for Immediate Release Several issuers have recently submitted amended S-1 registration statements with the financial watchdog, with some removing the ‚Äúdelaying amendment‚Äù clause and adding ‚Äúautomatic effectiveness‚Äù language. This change allows their ETFs to launch immediately once given the green light. Canary Capital CEO Steven McClurg said last week that the firm could launch its XRPC ETF as early as next week. Franklin Templeton and 21Shares have also lodged third amendments, with both removing Section 8(a) delay language to speed up approval. Bloomberg ETF analyst Eric Balchunas noted that the 21Shares filing starts a 20-day waiting period, potentially setting its debut within November if no further holdups occur. Bitwise has also updated its registration for a spot XRP ETF, with Chief Investment Officer Matt Hougan commenting that these funds could ‚Äúeasily become‚Äù billion-dollar investment vehicles within their first few months of trading, citing strong institutional interest and the success of Solana and Bitcoin spot ETFs as examples. The post XRP ETF Watch: DTCC Listing Signals Possible 1933 Act Launch This Week appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Sistine Research Sets Timeline for XRP to Hit $10
body: XRP‚Äôs price movement has entered a defining stage, and the latest chart from Sistine Research places strong emphasis on the $2 mark as a critical level. The chart, which tracks XRP‚Äôs performance against the U.S. dollar from 2013, highlights several recurring support zones that have previously served as the foundation for sustained rallies. These include $0.5, $0.175, and a lower long-term level around $0.005, all of which align with major turning points in XRP‚Äôs historical price structure. Sistine Research noted that XRP will keep defending the $2 level until the time comes to climb toward $10 , adding that the price is not expected to ‚Äúspend meaningful time under $2.‚Äù This view places the current consolidation above $2 in a potentially pivotal position, similar to prior extended accumulation periods seen before earlier bull market expansions. XRP probably just defends $2 monthly level until its time to run to $10. Could be tomorrow, could be in 6 months, but not expecting price to spend meaningful time under $2. pic.twitter.com/ctEkzf4BSc ‚Äî Sistine Research (@sistineresearch) November 8, 2025 Price Behavior and Technical Overview The monthly chart shows that XRP has rebounded repeatedly from deep correction phases, each time setting higher long-term lows marked by green arrows. The latest series of these arrows around the $2 region indicates renewed buying interest after a strong advance between late 2024 and early 2025. Historically, XRP‚Äôs sharp recoveries have often followed these compression zones. The technical layout suggests that the $2 region is more than a psychological barrier, as XRP has reclaimed it swiftly after every dip since its decisive rise above this level in early 2025. Confirmed monthly closes above this zone could reinforce the foundation for a potential breakout toward higher levels, particularly if momentum persists through early 2026. Timelines for XRP $10 Target While short-term volatility remains part of XRP‚Äôs trading environment, the broader monthly view signals structural strength. The asset‚Äôs past reactions to its major levels demonstrate a repeating pattern of consolidation, defense, and expansion. From a technical perspective, defending $2 effectively positions XRP for a move toward $3, with a potential extension toward the previously cited $10 target under favorable conditions. Such a move would mirror earlier parabolic phases seen in 2017 and 2021 when similar consolidation patterns preceded significant price acceleration. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 At the time of this analysis, XRP traded around $2.27, and a surge to $10 would represent a 340.5% increase. The analysis has no immediate timeline. It says ‚Äúcould be tomorrow, could be in 6 months,‚Äù but reinforces confidence that the price will remain above $2. title: Monero Jumps Over 20% This Week as Privacy Narrative Reignites; Why Best Wallet Token Is Riding the Wave
body: Quick Facts: Monero‚Äôs surge ‚Äì about 20% ‚Äì reignites the privacy narrative, with shorts squeezed and an upgrade pipeline adding fundamental support. Its recent Fluorine Fermi update, along with the upcoming Full-Chain Membership Proofs, will contribute to $XMR‚Äôs future success. Best Wallet ($BEST) has raised $19.6M+ in presale with a token price of $0.025925 and a potential 2,291% ROI by late-2026. Best Wallet integrates Fireblocks‚Äô MPC-CMP and a Rubic-powered DEX aggregator, aligning with self-custody demand amid privacy-coin strength. Privacy just reclaimed the spotlight. Monero ($XMR) ripped higher this week ‚Äì roughly a 20% seven-day surge ‚Äì as traders rotated out of Zcash and into $XMR, aided by a clean technical breakout and an anticipated network upgrade. The pump retained its momentum, positioning $XMR above the $412 threshold at the time of writing. This performance stemmed from a sector rotation with $12M in shorts squeezed along the way, which is exactly the kind of flow that revives the entire privacy trade. Coinalyze‚Äôs long-short ratio is quite telling in this sense. That shift matters because rotations rarely stop at one ticker; they tend to spill across the stack, from coins to the wallets and rails that service them. The pump was somewhat expected, given that $XMR‚Äôs developers have been busy: their recent Fluorine Fermi update hardened peer selection against spy nodes, and the next big milestone ‚Äì Full-Chain Membership Proofs ‚Äì aims to boost privacy and throughput. That cocktail of technical progress plus fresh momentum is why privacy names are back on your screen. For traders watching risk rotations, this narrative usually sees demand for tools that make private, cross-chain trading simpler. That‚Äôs the bridge to Best Wallet Token ($BEST) , the utility token for a mobile-first, non-custodial wallet that bakes strong security and a DEX aggregator into one app. When privacy coins run, the wallets that route liquidity ‚Äì especially across chains ‚Äì often catch the second-order bid. Best Wallet Puts MPC Security and Cross-Chain Routing in Your Pocket The Best Wallet app specs read like a checklist for a privacy-leaning, self-custody cycle: Fireblocks‚Äô MPC-CMP technology under the hood, a built-in DEX aggregator powered by Rubic for both same-chain and cross-chain swaps, and a native token ‚Äì $BEST ‚Äì that actually does things. These include reduced fees reduction, governance, staking boosts, and early access to vetted presales via an ‚ÄòUpcoming Tokens‚Äô portal. The four-phase roadmap details multiple milestones, including a fiat offramp, airdrop launches, a dApps gaming hub, and extensive market intel analytics to keep you connected to the market‚Äôs pulse. The positioning hits the moment. Privacy assets are rallying, but liquidity and UX remain fragmented. A wallet that routes across 200+ DEXs and dozens of bridges while keeping keys split via MPC reduces the frictions that push you back to centralized venues. The core app plans support for 60+ chains and is built around mobile UX ‚Äì arguably the default for retail flow in 2025. For traders who want to keep activity close to self-custody while chasing momentum across ecosystems, that‚Äôs the right blend of convenience and control. $BEST Momentum: ~$16.9M Raised as the Presale Draws to a Close Narrative is one thing; presale traction is another ‚Äì and Best Wallet ($BEST) shows plenty of it. The presale has reached over $16.9M so far. For a wallet token tied to an active product, that scale of commitment suggests buyers are paying for utility, not promises. $BEST is currently sitting at $0.025925. Staking, meanwhile, is designed to bootstrap participation rather than offer fantasy yields, with a 77% yearly APY and a 343M-strong pool. Read that as a structured incentive to get in-app behavior moving, not a permanent income machine. High APYs hint at early-stage incentive design; the tell to watch is how quickly rates normalize as TVL grows and whether usage (fee reductions, presale access) keeps holders sticky. Long-term, Best Wallet aims to capture 40% of the crypto wallet market share by the end of 2026. For this reason, the project has allocated 35% of its 10B total token supply to marketing, and 25% to product development. Based on the project‚Äôs utility and scope, our price prediction for $BEST puts the coin at a potential $0.62 by the end of 2026. This represents a 2,291% one-year ROI if you buy your $BEST tokens at today‚Äôs price. This type of potential recommends Best Wallet Token ($BEST) as one of the best crypto presales of 2025 and beyond. However, the $BEST presale is coming to an end, with just 18 days to go. With plans for a DEX listing at a price of $0.026035, there‚Äôs no better time to buy $BEST at its current early-bird price. Ready to jump in? Join the $BEST presale while you still can. Disclaimer: This isn‚Äôt financial advice. Always do your own research before making any investment decision. title: MSTY: Why This Extremely Risky ETF Is Worth My Capital
body: Summary YieldMax MSTR Option Income Strategy ETF offers an extremely high yield but carries significant risk and aggressive volatility due to its options-based strategy. MSTY's performance is closely tied to MicroStrategy shares, with a 1% drop in MSTR causing a 1.41% decline in MSTY, amplifying downside risk. Distributions are high but declining, driven by option premium income and capital return, which erodes the fund's net asset value over time. I rate MSTY as a 'Hold' for small allocations only, given its high risk, volatility, and limited growth potential despite attractive cash flow. Investment thesis According to my previous articles, many may think that I belong to the camp of crypto enthusiasts. But I wouldn't call myself that. Although I have been familiar with the cryptocurrency market for a long time (since 2016), I look at many of its projects and digital assets with a great deal of skepticism. When I was first introduced to the features of the YieldMax MSTR Option Income Strategy ETF ( MSTY ), however, I couldn't believe that more than $2.6 billion in AUM could be invested in such a risky and aggressive investment strategy focused on generating high monthly income. Because this fund focuses on using an options strategy when working with Strategy Inc ( MSTR ) securities, the risk and volatility of this asset increase significantly. And that is probably the main reason why MSTY shows negative monthly dynamics. Despite this, if you are willing to risk part of your capital in order to obtain a truly enormous yield (+230.43% per annum), then this asset is for you. A lot of analysts recommend selling it, and I agree with them because MSTY's momentum is still negative, maintaining a steady downward trend. Despite this, I want to find a few reasons to be optimistic about this asset. My recommendation to "Hold" is largely based on using a minimal amount of personal capital to purchase this asset with the aim of generating high passive income. Those risks associated with investing in MSTY do not allow this asset to be allocated a large portion of the investment portfolio (no more than 3%). Overview of the YieldMax MSTR Option Income Strategy ETF and its features YieldMax MSTR Option Income Strategy ETF is an exchange-traded fund focused on working with option contracts to generate monthly income for investors. The mechanism of the MSTY investment strategy is the active management of client funds, utilizing the sale of covered options or option spreads on Strategy Inc ((MSTR)) shares. The scheme is simple and involves the regular sale of call options on MSTR, utilizing the premium received to distribute monthly dividends to the investment fund's investors. Based on the latest info on the fund's website, the MSTY distribution is 98.04% capital gains and 1.96% income. The Distribution Rate is the annual rate an investor would receive if the most recently declared distribution, which includes option income, remained the same going forward. The Distribution Rate is calculated by annualizing the Fund‚Äôs most recent distribution and dividing the resulting amount by the Fund‚Äôs most recent NAV. Analyzing the payments themselves, it is worth noting that they are decreasing. This is caused by the results obtained in the form of premiums from the sale of options. There are a few reasons for this. Firstly, there is a decrease in the market volatility of the underlying asset Strategy Inc ((MSTR)), because the premium from the sale of call options depends on volatility. Higher volatility means more expensive options and higher premiums. Secondly, there has been a change in the frequency of payments. In fall 2025, monthly payments were switched to weekly payments due to their fragmentation. The third reason is that payments to investors imply a return of capital, due to which the net asset value of the exchange-traded fund decreases. Distributions Importantly, MSTY's investment strategy focuses on generating income from premiums when trading options, but not from direct ownership of MSTR shares. As such, it does not maximize financial gains from situations where the value of MSTR temporarily recovers (as we are seeing in 2025). In effect, MSTY creates an artificial barrier to profiting from the potential upside of MSTR through the sale of options, thereby ensuring a stable cash flow. Although its consistency may be at risk, as payouts may vary depending on the market volatility of MSTR itself. The exchange-traded fund does not directly own the asset Strategy Inc ((MSTR)), but rather uses derivative financial instruments for this purpose. Nevertheless, MSTY correlates with the return on MicroStrategy's stock itself, but not the price dynamics of an asset such as Bitcoin. Technical analysis of Bitcoin, MSTR, and their impact on MSTY Since the YieldMax MSTR Option Income Strategy ETF is an exchange-traded fund linked to MSTR stock options (which is a Bitcoin treasury holder), accordingly, its investment attractiveness should be influenced by market trends in the cryptocurrency market. In the technical analysis of BTC-USD, MSTR, and MSTY, we will use a weekly time frame (1W). First, it is suggested to look at the Bitcoin chart, where it's important to determine the global trend of BTC using classic technical analysis tools. Bitcoin Technical Analysis on the 1W Timeframe According to the weekly chart, we can see that a global upward trend channel has formed. At the same time, the bullish trend did not begin on August 5, 2024 (minimum level‚Äî$49,577), but from November 2022. However, the trend channel that is relevant to me is the one that has formed over the past year. Bitcoin's key support level is the June 2025 low of $98,240. The importance of this horizontal line is due to the fact that this is where the lower boundary of the upward trend channel is located. In case the price works with this support level, a liquidity raid is possible, after which the asset will resume growth in the interval of 2-8 weeks of consolidation. Let's now look at the dynamics of MSTR's share price using the same technical analysis tools and the same 1W time frame. While Bitcoin continues its global upward trend, MSTR has formed reversal patterns. In addition to the fact that the price has already moved far from its historical high ($543), in addition, the lower border of the uptrend channel was broken in the region of $330. Moreover, a key resistance zone ($404‚Äî$457) exists, due to which the asset's growth is limited. Because of these factors, a downward trend channel has already formed, its upper boundary is now around $415. Moreover, the target of the current decline in MSTR has almost been reached (support level‚Äî$231.5). In this zone, there is a whole pool of liquidity formed from equal lows, which raises the likelihood of a raid for a price rebound. However, if the price consolidates below, the next target for decline will be the lower border of the trend channel‚Äîthe $140 price range. MSTR Technical Analysis on the 1W Timeframe The cause of this discrepancy between the price of Bitcoin and MSTR lies in the risks faced by MicroStrategy. I'll discuss this in more detail in the next section of the article. Let us now move on to analyzing the MSTY chart, where one thing is clear: the asset is in an aggressive downtrend, reminiscent of a "falling knife" situation. I could not determine any price range for the trend channel. Basically, we have a continuous price decline that is aimed at an empty chart (due to which there are no support levels or zones). MSTY Technical Analysis on the 1W Timeframe Comparing the MSTY chart with Bitcoin, we can see that there is no direct correlation between them. The MSTR chart, however, shows a similar situation. The only adjustment would be how aggressively each of these assets is moving towards a price decline. MSTR and MSTY both set their historical highs in November 2024, after which a sharp reversal of the uptrend to a downtrend began. If from the high level, the negative dynamics of MSTR turned out to be more modest (according to data for November 7, 2025)‚Äîa decline of -56.3%, the decline in MSTY was more aggressive (-79.6%). So, we can say that a 1% drop in MSTR shares causes a 1.41% drop in MSTY value. Risks of the investment thesis Because the results of the technical analysis of Bitcoin, MSTR, and their impact on MSTY revealed a direct correlation between MSTY and MSTR, where the decrease of the second asset by 1% equals the decrease of the first by 1.41%, then accordingly, to assess the risks of the investment idea, you should consider the factors that affect the change in the value of MicroStrategy. A key concept of this organization is to purchase Bitcoin through the issuance of its securities. Earlier, this was done through additional share issues, however, convertible bonds are increasingly being used today. As a major player in this industry, MicroStrategy now owns more than 600,000 Bitcoin. That's almost 3% of the total supply on the market. The latest data shows that its debt is $8.21 billion . For instance, at the start of 2024, this debt was $2.24 billion, which is 72.7% less. Total debt on balance sheet Also worth considering as a risk is that MSTY, like similar exchange-traded funds linked to cryptocurrency assets, has a high standard deviation . As of today, the figure stands at 53.08%, significantly higher than the median for all ETFs, which is 12.43%. Furthermore, the annual volatility of this asset is 70.42%. For instance, the iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF ( IBIT ), which I have recently recommended as a "Buy," has a volatility of 44.67% . This exchange-traded fund invests in Bitcoin. Conclusion In summary, the results of my fundamental analysis of IBIT allow me to evaluate this ETF as an asset that is accompanied by high investment risk, high market volatility, and a maximum yield received by investors every month (and now every week). My recommendation to "Hold" implies a minor investment in MSTY, since the degree of risk associated with it is comparable to the speculative investments that characterize only the altcoin (cryptocurrency) market. It's important to understand that it's the high payouts to investors that lead to significant cycles of decline in the price of MSTY, because a significant portion of the premium paid by the exchange-traded fund is distributed in such a way that the net asset value of the ETF itself decreases. The bottom line is that MSTY is a risky financial instrument; although it has the highest monthly cash flow, it has limited potential growth and is characterized by higher market volatility than MSTR shares and Bitcoin itself. If you're willing to take a risk in order to get high regular payments, then my recommendation is to "Hold," meaning you should buy a small lot size. If you don't think these risks are worth it, then "Sell" would be a reasonable decision for your investment strategy.

title: Is Wall Street finally ready for XRP?
body: Five spot XRP exchange-traded funds ( ETFs ) from CoinShares, Franklin Templeton, 21Shares, Canary Capital, and Bitwise have appeared on the Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC) list . The funds are expected to debut this month, with Canary CEO Steven McClurg teasing at Ripple‚Äôs Swell conference that they‚Äôre ready to launch as early as next week and reminding investors of the successful launches of Litecoin ( LTC ) and Hedera ( HBAR ) ETFs. ETF Institute co-founder Nate Geraci is of the same opinion, stating on Monday, November 10, that the end of the U.S. government shutdown has ‚Äúopened the floodgates‚Äù for new listings, predicting that the first ‚Äò33 Act spot XRP ETF could launch before Friday. ‚ÄúGovernment shutdown ending = spot crypto ETF floodgates opening‚Ä¶ In meantime, could see first ‚Äò33 Act spot xrp ETF launch this week,‚Äù wrote Geraci on X. Government shutdown ending = spot crypto ETF floodgates opening‚Ä¶ In meantime, could see first ‚Äò33 Act spot xrp ETF launch this week. ‚Äî Nate Geraci (@NateGeraci) November 10, 2025 A few days ago, Geraci also flagged Canary Capital‚Äôs spot XRP ETF as ‚Äúcoming soon,‚Äù adding that WisdomTree had filed for a CoinDesk 20 ETF set to hold the 20 largest crypto assets by market cap (with XRP expected to make up nearly 20% of the portfolio). What do XRP ETFs mean for the market? Hunter Horsley, CEO of Bitwise Asset Management, said in an interview on Sunday, November 9, that a potential XRP ETF could become a major success. According to Horsley, the appeal of the financial product extends far beyond retail investors. Instead, it could provide traditional financial institutions with a compliant entry point to digital asset exposure, expanding the overall crypto investor base. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs incredible. You know, I think it‚Äôs indicative of the broader story this year, which is: traditional financial services and crypto are finally coming together,‚Äù said the CEO. He also highlighted that XRP‚Äôs strong position as the fourth-largest cryptocurrency by market cap and its active community would likely ensure strong demand once such a product receives regulatory approval. XRP skyrockets XRP has surged more than 12% in the past 24 hours, climbing to $2.56 and outpacing the broader crypto market‚Äôs 4.94% gain. The token‚Äôs market capitalization also rose from around $135 billion to more than $152 billion in the same period, adding nearly $17 billion in new capital inflows. XRP 1-day price chart. Source: Finbold The renewed push toward XRP ETFs appears to be the main catalyst behind the move. While inclusion on the DTCC list doesn‚Äôt ensure SEC approval, it typically means the ETFs are structurally ready to go live once approved. Macro conditions also turned favorable for risk assets. Namely, the U.S. Senate‚Äôs approval of a bill to end the government shutdown has helped preserve regulatory continuity for pending ETF reviews. At the same time, talk around the proposed ‚Äútariff dividend‚Äù lifted investor sentiment, despite the Treasury clarifying it may come as tax relief rather than direct stimulus. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Is Wall Street finally ready for XRP? appeared first on Finbold .

title: Revolutionary: Scribe‚Äôs $1.3B Valuation Proves Where AI Actually Pays Off in Enterprise Workflows
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary: Scribe‚Äôs $1.3B Valuation Proves Where AI Actually Pays Off in Enterprise Workflows In a groundbreaking development that signals where artificial intelligence delivers tangible business value, Scribe has secured a massive $1.3 billion valuation following a $75 million Series C funding round. This monumental achievement comes as enterprises worldwide struggle to identify where AI and automation investments will actually yield returns rather than become costly experiments. Scribe‚Äôs Massive Valuation Signals AI Maturity The $1.3 billion valuation represents a fivefold increase since Scribe‚Äôs previous funding round, demonstrating explosive growth and market confidence. StepStone led the all-equity Series C round with participation from Amplify Partners, Redpoint Ventures, Tiger Global, Morado Ventures, and New York Life Ventures. This substantial funding injection will accelerate the rollout of Scribe Optimize, the platform that finally answers the critical question facing every enterprise: what should we automate first? AI Workflow Optimization: The Missing Piece in Enterprise Automation Most companies are racing to adopt AI, but according to Scribe CEO Jennifer Smith, they lack fundamental visibility into their actual workflows. ‚ÄúWithout really knowing how work is done, it is really hard to know where to improve it, where to automate it, where agents can help,‚Äù Smith told Bitcoin World. Scribe Optimize addresses this gap by mining workflows across the enterprise to show exactly what people are doing, how often, and how long it takes. Metric Impact Customer Results Workflow Documentation 10+ million workflows across 40,000 apps 94% Fortune 500 penetration Time Savings 35-42 hours per person monthly 5 million+ users Onboarding Acceleration 40% faster new hire ramp-up 78,000 paid organizations Enterprise Automation That Actually Works Founded in 2019 by Jennifer Smith and CTO Aaron Podoln, Scribe predated the generative AI boom but positioned itself perfectly for the current automation wave. Their flagship product, Scribe Capture, automatically documents how work happens through browser extensions and desktop apps, generating step-by-step guides with text and screenshots. Key Benefits of Process Documentation Reduces repeated questions and minimizes errors Expedites employee onboarding and training Provides data-driven insights for automation priorities Enables scalable knowledge transfer across organizations Series C Funding Powers Global Expansion The $75 million investment comes over a year after Scribe‚Äôs $25 million Series B, which the company has largely not needed to draw down according to Smith. The San Francisco-based startup plans to double its current headcount of 120 employees in the next 12 months while expanding in key international markets including the U.K., Canada, Australia, and Europe. Transforming How Companies Approach Process Documentation Scribe competes not just against other process documentation tools like Tango, Iorad, UserGuiding, and Spekit, but against the status quo of manual workflow recording. ‚ÄúPeople are still using stopwatches to sit behind somebody and understand what this process is,‚Äù Smith noted. ‚ÄúEven now, when it comes to deploying AI agents, the irony is that the process of deploying agents is incredibly manual.‚Äù Actionable Insights for AI Implementation For enterprises looking to avoid AI implementation pitfalls, Scribe‚Äôs approach offers valuable lessons: Start with understanding actual workflows rather than theoretical processes Focus on user adoption from the ground up rather than top-down mandates Use data to identify automation opportunities with the highest ROI Build systems that scale organizational knowledge effectively FAQs What is Scribe‚Äôs core technology? Scribe develops AI-powered workflow documentation and optimization platforms that help enterprises understand how work actually happens and identify where automation will deliver real returns. Who are Scribe‚Äôs key investors? The Series C round was led by StepStone with participation from Amplify Partners , Redpoint Ventures , Tiger Global , Morado Ventures, and New York Life Ventures . Who leads Scribe? Scribe was founded by CEO Jennifer Smith and CTO Aaron Podoln in 2019. What major companies use Scribe? Scribe serves teams at New York Life , T-Mobile , LinkedIn , Hubspot , and Northern Trust , with 94% of Fortune 500 companies having teams using the platform. The Future of Intelligent Enterprise Automation Scribe‚Äôs remarkable valuation and funding success demonstrates a crucial shift in the AI landscape: enterprises are moving beyond experimentation to demand proven solutions that deliver measurable ROI. By providing the missing link between workflow understanding and automation implementation, Scribe positions itself at the forefront of practical AI adoption that actually moves the needle on business outcomes. To learn more about the latest AI workflow optimization trends, explore our article on key developments shaping enterprise automation and institutional adoption. This post Revolutionary: Scribe‚Äôs $1.3B Valuation Proves Where AI Actually Pays Off in Enterprise Workflows first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Aster DEX updates perpetual contract tick size to cover more short-term trading strategies
body: Aster DEX, the BNB chain-based decentralized exchange, announced an adjustment to its ARUSDT perpetual contract tick size that went live at 09:00 UTC Monday. According to the perpetual and spot crypto trading platform‚Äô statement on X, the minimum price increment that was previously set at 0.01 will now change to 0.001. The DEX also confirmed the adjustment ‚Äúwill not affect existing open orders.‚Äù Dear Aster users, Aster will adjust the tick size (i.e., the minimum change in the unit price) of the ARUSDT Perpetual contract from 0.01 to 0.001, effective at 09:00 UTC, 10 Nov 2025. Existing orders will not be affected by the tick size update. pic.twitter.com/OtyAnaADPp ‚Äî Aster (@Aster_DEX) November 10, 2025 The new 0.001 tick could help traders set orders at finer levels, improving entry and exit accuracy and during market conditions that limit them to tighter spreads. For example, a trader previously limited to placing an order at $1.10 can now place it at $1.101 or $1.102, imperative for executing short-term trading strategies. Aster changes tick size as stage 4 harvest begins The tick size update comes on the heels of Aster DEX entering Stage 4 of its Dawn program, known as Aster Harvest, after Stage 3 officially ended at 23:59 UTC on Sunday. The upcoming harvest stage introduces 1.5% of the total ASTER supply, distributed evenly in six weekly epochs, with 0.25% allocated per week. Airdrops from Stage 3 will become claimable later this month, with the checker opening December 1 and claims starting December 15. Stage 4 concludes on December 21, at 23:59 UTC. New features in Stage 4 include ASTER being eligible as a margin asset, alongside an Aster Asset Points system that accounts for ASTER, asBNB, and USDF holdings. Using $ASTER as perpetual collateral grants extra points. Selected perpetuals also benefit from a higher leverage ceiling, reaching up to 300x. Fee buybacks and token burns will continue, and users paying fees in ASTER receive a 5% discount, and points can also be earned across perpetual and spot trading on the platform. Aster CEO Leonard Aster is scheduled to join Ember Aster for a live Ask-Me-Anything session at 1 PM UTC on November 10. The discussion will cover AsterChain‚Äôs roadmap and the exchange‚Äôs future plans. ‚ÄúWe are excited to charge forward, & help lead the next generation of BUILDers to build the future of blockchain and finance on AsterChain; providing exciting opportunities for the community, ASTER holders & builders alike,‚Äù the Aster Build team wrote on Monday. Aster reclaims $1.10 price level after Coinbase roadmap listing The DEX token has posted a strong performance in the last 24 hours, rising 2.35% in 24 hours, which is just slightly under the broader crypto markets‚Äô 3.7% uptick during the same period. Over the past week, ASTER climbed 11.2%, realized after Coinbase‚Äôs November 9 announcement that the token was added to its asset roadmap, causing a 3.5% price spike in the day. Cryptopolitan reported that Coinbase is considering adding the Changpeng Zhao-touted token‚Äôs trading pairs after a thorough vetting process, although the listing is not guaranteed, and neither was the listing date confirmed. title: CFTC Eyes First Leveraged Spot Crypto Products by Next Month
body: Pham wants to expand access to more sophisticated crypto trading instruments under strict delivery and leverage rules. Meanwhile, the Bank of England released a consultation paper proposing a comprehensive framework for regulating sterling-denominated ‚Äúsystemic stablecoins.‚Äù The plan would require issuers to back their tokens with central bank deposits and UK government debt while also imposing holding limits on individuals and businesses to safeguard financial stability. Overall, both the United States and the United Kingdom are advancing major regulatory initiatives in the crypto sector, as there is a growing need for global oversight of digital assets. CFTC Moves Toward Leveraged Crypto Trading Acting Chair of the US Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), Caroline Pham, is reportedly in discussions with several regulated American crypto exchanges to launch leveraged spot crypto products as early as next month. In a post that was shared on X, Pham confirmed her push to expand US crypto market offerings by allowing traders to take leveraged positions in spot markets. This could greatly broaden access to higher-risk, higher-reward crypto trading opportunities for retail and institutional investors. According to Pham, talks are progressing despite the ongoing government shutdown, as the CFTC is still engaging with industry representatives to craft potential guidance for leveraged spot crypto products. The initiative builds on the agency‚Äôs earlier efforts in August, when it launched a proposal to enable trading of ‚Äúspot crypto asset contracts‚Äù on exchanges under its oversight. At the time, the CFTC wanted public input on rules surrounding the retail trading of commodities involving leverage, margin, or financing, which suggests that there is regulatory recognition of the crypto industry‚Äôs demand for more advanced trading products. Announcement from the CFTC Under existing law, the Commodity Exchange Act grants the CFTC authority over leveraged or margined retail commodity transactions, including cryptocurrencies, unless the buyer takes actual delivery of the asset within 28 days. This means that any leveraged crypto spot product offered in the US must ensure either physical delivery within that time frame or risk falling foul of regulatory restrictions. The push for leveraged spot products comes as Washington grapples with a government shutdown that began on Oct. 1. While many federal agencies paused non-essential activities, Pham‚Äôs continued meetings indicate that progress on crypto regulation has not completely stalled. Meanwhile, the US Senate is reportedly close to approving a continuing resolution to end the shutdown, which could potentially clear the way for more active regulatory work. Despite disruptions, several senators still pressed ahead with crypto-related legislative efforts, including a proposed bill to establish clearer market structure rules. Bank of England Moves to Regulate Stablecoins The UK is also making progress with its regulatory plans. The Bank of England (BoE) took a big step toward regulating stablecoins by publishing a consultation paper outlining a proposed framework for sterling-denominated ‚Äúsystemic stablecoins.‚Äù The goal of the proposal is to manage potential financial stability risks posed by stablecoins that are widely used for payments in the United Kingdom. This means that the UK plans to align its regulatory stance with that of other major economies like the United States. Under the new proposal, the BoE would require stablecoin issuers to hold at least 40% of their liabilities in unremunerated deposits at the central bank, while the remaining 60% could be backed by short-term UK government debt. This balance is designed to ensure that stablecoins remain sufficiently liquid and secure, while also supporting the resilience of the broader financial system. Consultation paper published by the Bank of England The consultation is open until Feb. 10, 2026, seeks industry and public feedback before final regulations are introduced in the second half of the year. It also includes proposed limits on individual and business holdings of stablecoins. (Source: Bank of England ) According to the document, individuals will be restricted to a maximum of ¬£20,000 ($26,300) per stablecoin, while businesses would face a cap of ¬£10 million ($13.2 million), with possible exemptions for firms that require higher balances to operate effectively. For stablecoin issuers deemed ‚Äúsystemically important,‚Äù the BoE suggested that as they grow in scale, they could initially back up to 95% of their assets with UK government debt securities, though this ratio would gradually be reduced to 60% once the issuer reaches a size considered systemically significant. The aim is to strike a balance between stability and operational flexibility as stablecoins evolve in the financial ecosystem. The BoE explained that His Majesty‚Äôs Treasury will determine which stablecoin payment systems and service providers qualify as systemically important. Once designated, these entities will fall under the proposed regulatory regime and the central bank‚Äôs direct supervision.

title: Expert Explains Ripple & Mastercard Partnership Strength to XRP Holders
body: Diana (@InvestWithD), a crypto expert and XRP advocate on X, has shared an in-depth post detailing a major collaboration between Ripple, Mastercard, WebBank, and Gemini to test blockchain-based settlements for credit card transactions . The initiative uses Ripple‚Äôs U.S. dollar-backed stablecoin, RLUSD, on the XRP Ledger (XRPL) to enable faster settlement of traditional Mastercard payments. In her explanation, Diana described how, when a customer uses a Gemini Mastercard, WebBank and Mastercard typically settle funds through legacy banking rails, which can take one to three business days. She noted that Ripple is now entering that process to facilitate instant settlement through RLUSD on the XRP Ledger, cutting out the delays that have long characterized card transaction settlement. BREAKING: Ripple Teams Up with Mastercard to Settle Credit Card Payments on the XRP Ledger So let me explain what‚Äôs actually happening ‚Äî @Mastercard , @Ripple , WebBank, and @Gemini just joined forces to bring stablecoin settlement to real credit card payments using‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/rVvRytJOCo ‚Äî Diana (@InvestWithD) November 8, 2025 RLUSD Enters Mainstream Payment Infrastructure According to Diana, this marks one of the first occasions where a regulated U.S. bank will use a regulated stablecoin to settle transactions on a public blockchain. She emphasized that the system would enable the transfer of value to happen ‚Äúin seconds,‚Äù representing a major step toward merging blockchain technology with everyday financial operations . Ripple‚Äôs president, Monica Long, described the move as proof of how regulated digital assets can improve payment efficiency, saying it shows how assets like RLUSD can ‚Äúenhance settlement‚Äù and support faster, compliant transactions. The partnership with Mastercard and Gemini also builds upon RLUSD‚Äôs growing adoption. Diana pointed out that the stablecoin surpassed $1 billion in circulation in under ten months, a sign of confidence in its stability and regulatory framework. By linking it to a major global payment network, Ripple is signaling its intention to position RLUSD as a trusted instrument for financial institutions and consumers, and use XRP as the foundation for this major economic shift. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Strengthening XRP‚Äôs Position in Global Finance For XRP, this collaboration represents another validation of its capacity to support large-scale financial operations. XRP‚Äôs role in processing real-world transactions involving major traditional financial players strengthens its utility beyond speculative trading. Diana described the development as ‚Äúa massive shift,‚Äù highlighting that the ability to settle Mastercard payments in seconds without intermediaries points to the practical advantages of XRP‚Äôs underlying infrastructure . If successful, the pilot could expand across Mastercard‚Äôs broader network, allowing instant blockchain-based settlement for millions of transactions worldwide. The initiative also highlights Ripple‚Äôs push to integrate blockchain technology into regulated financial systems while demonstrating that XRP can handle complex, high-volume settlements. As traditional institutions test blockchain technology in real payment flows , XRP stands to benefit from the increased visibility and credibility that comes with powering such collaborations. title: Revolutionary Digital Green Bond: Hong Kong‚Äôs Third Blockchain-Powered Sustainable Finance Initiative
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Digital Green Bond: Hong Kong‚Äôs Third Blockchain-Powered Sustainable Finance Initiative Hong Kong is making waves in the financial world with its announcement of a third digital green bond issuance. This groundbreaking move combines blockchain technology with sustainable finance, creating what experts call a revolutionary approach to environmental funding. But what exactly makes this digital green bond so special, and why should cryptocurrency enthusiasts pay attention? What Makes This Digital Green Bond Different? The Hong Kong government‚Äôs latest digital green bond represents a significant step forward in financial innovation. Unlike traditional bonds, this issuance leverages HSBC‚Äôs blockchain technology to create a transparent, efficient, and secure financial instrument. The digital green bond aims to fund environmentally friendly projects while demonstrating the practical applications of blockchain in mainstream finance. This isn‚Äôt Hong Kong‚Äôs first venture into digital green bonds. However, the third issuance shows the government‚Äôs commitment to refining and expanding this innovative approach. The use of blockchain technology ensures that every transaction is recorded securely, providing investors with unprecedented transparency about how their funds are being used for environmental projects. Why Choose Blockchain for Green Bonds? Blockchain technology offers several key advantages for green bond issuances. First, it provides immutable records of transactions, ensuring that funds are used exactly as promised. Second, the technology enables real-time tracking of environmental impact. Third, it reduces administrative costs and increases efficiency. Here are the main benefits: Enhanced Transparency: Investors can track exactly how their money supports environmental projects Reduced Costs: Blockchain eliminates middlemen and streamlines processes Global Accessibility: Digital format allows international investors to participate easily Environmental Impact Tracking: Real-time monitoring of sustainability outcomes What Challenges Does This Digital Green Bond Face? Despite the exciting potential, Hong Kong‚Äôs digital green bond initiative faces several challenges. Regulatory compliance across different jurisdictions remains complex. Market acceptance of blockchain-based financial instruments still needs to grow. Technical infrastructure requirements may limit some investors‚Äô participation. However, the government appears committed to addressing these hurdles through careful planning and international cooperation. The success of this digital green bond could set a precedent for other governments and financial institutions. As more organizations recognize the benefits of combining blockchain with sustainable finance, we may see similar initiatives worldwide. This particular digital green bond represents not just an investment opportunity but a test case for future financial innovation. How Can Investors Benefit from This Initiative? Investors looking to participate in Hong Kong‚Äôs digital green bond can expect several advantages. The combination of environmental impact and technological innovation creates a unique value proposition. The bond offers exposure to both sustainable finance and blockchain technology. Additionally, government backing provides a level of security rarely found in cryptocurrency investments. The digital green bond market is still emerging, but early participants may benefit from first-mover advantages. As blockchain technology becomes more mainstream in finance, these instruments could become standard offerings. Investors should consider not just the financial returns but also the environmental impact and technological significance of supporting such initiatives. What Does the Future Hold for Digital Green Bonds? The success of Hong Kong‚Äôs third digital green bond could accelerate global adoption of blockchain in sustainable finance. Other governments are watching closely, and successful implementation might inspire similar projects worldwide. The integration of blockchain technology with environmental finance represents a powerful combination that addresses both technological advancement and climate concerns. As we move forward, expect to see more sophisticated digital green bond structures. Smart contracts could automate impact reporting, while tokenization might enable smaller investment amounts. The potential for innovation in this space is enormous, and Hong Kong‚Äôs initiative serves as an important testing ground for these new approaches. Frequently Asked Questions What is a digital green bond? A digital green bond is a blockchain-based financial instrument that funds environmental projects while providing transparent tracking through distributed ledger technology. How does blockchain improve green bonds? Blockchain enhances transparency, reduces costs, enables real-time impact tracking, and increases accessibility for global investors. Who can invest in Hong Kong‚Äôs digital green bond? While specific eligibility criteria vary, typically both institutional and qualified individual investors can participate, subject to local regulations. What makes this bond different from previous issuances? This third issuance builds on earlier experiences, incorporating improved technology and potentially larger scale, though exact details await official announcement. How does HSBC‚Äôs blockchain technology work? HSBC uses a permissioned blockchain that ensures security and compliance while enabling efficient transaction processing and transparent record-keeping. What environmental projects will the bond fund? While specific projects haven‚Äôt been detailed, digital green bonds typically fund renewable energy, pollution prevention, and other sustainability initiatives. body: BitcoinWorld Republic Technologies ETH Investment: $100 Million Bold Move Signals Institutional Confidence In a groundbreaking move that‚Äôs shaking up the cryptocurrency landscape, Republic Technologies has made a stunning $100 million commitment to Ethereum. This Canadian publicly traded company‚Äôs massive ETH investment represents one of the most significant institutional crypto moves of the year, signaling growing confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs long-term potential. Why Is Republic Technologies Betting Big on ETH? The company raised these substantial funds through convertible notes, demonstrating sophisticated financial strategy. More importantly, 90% of this capital‚Äîa whopping $90 million‚Äîis earmarked specifically for acquiring ETH and expanding validator operations. This Republic Technologies ETH investment isn‚Äôt just a casual dip into crypto waters; it‚Äôs a full-scale strategic commitment. This move comes at a crucial time for Ethereum, as the network continues to evolve post-Merge. The company‚Äôs decision to allocate such significant resources highlights several key advantages: Institutional validation of Ethereum‚Äôs proof-of-stake model Long-term confidence in ETH‚Äôs value proposition Strategic positioning in the growing validator ecosystem Revenue diversification through staking rewards What Does This Mean for Ethereum‚Äôs Future? The Republic Technologies ETH investment sends powerful signals across the cryptocurrency market. When publicly traded companies make commitments of this scale, it often indicates thorough due diligence and strong conviction. Moreover, this move could inspire other institutional players to follow suit, potentially creating a domino effect in corporate crypto adoption. However, such significant investments also come with challenges. The company must navigate: Market volatility management Regulatory compliance requirements Technical infrastructure scaling Security protocols for large holdings How Will This Impact the Broader Crypto Ecosystem? The Republic Technologies ETH investment represents more than just a single company‚Äôs strategy‚Äîit‚Äôs a milestone for institutional cryptocurrency adoption. This substantial commitment demonstrates that major corporations are moving beyond mere exploration and into substantial deployment of capital into digital assets. Furthermore, the focus on validator operations indicates a strategic approach to generating passive income through staking. This aligns with Ethereum‚Äôs transition to proof-of-stake and shows how companies can actively participate in network security while earning rewards. What Can Other Investors Learn From This Move? The Republic Technologies ETH investment provides valuable insights for both institutional and individual investors. The company‚Äôs structured approach‚Äîusing convertible notes and clear allocation targets‚Äîshows how sophisticated players enter the crypto space. Their balanced strategy between direct ETH acquisition and validator operations demonstrates comprehensive market understanding. This move also highlights the importance of: Strategic timing in market entry Diversified exposure within the crypto ecosystem Long-term perspective beyond short-term volatility Active participation in network operations Conclusion: A Watershed Moment for Institutional Crypto Adoption The Republic Technologies ETH investment marks a significant turning point in cryptocurrency adoption. This $100 million commitment not only validates Ethereum‚Äôs position in the digital asset landscape but also sets a precedent for how publicly traded companies can strategically integrate crypto assets into their portfolios. As more institutions observe this successful deployment, we can expect increased corporate participation in the cryptocurrency space. Frequently Asked Questions How much ETH will Republic Technologies purchase with the $100 million? The company plans to use 90% of the raised funds, approximately $90 million, for ETH acquisition and validator operations expansion. The exact amount of ETH will depend on market prices at time of purchase. What are convertible notes and why did Republic Technologies use them? Convertible notes are debt instruments that can be converted into equity at a later date. This financing method allows companies to raise capital while providing investors with potential upside through conversion options. How does this investment benefit Republic Technologies? The Republic Technologies ETH investment provides exposure to a growing asset class, potential appreciation returns, staking rewards from validator operations, and strategic positioning in the blockchain ecosystem. What risks does this large ETH investment involve? Key risks include cryptocurrency market volatility, regulatory changes, technological risks associated with validator operations, and potential security concerns with large digital asset holdings. Could this trigger similar moves from other public companies? Yes, successful deployments by early movers like Republic Technologies often encourage other companies to explore similar strategies, potentially accelerating institutional crypto adoption. How will this affect Ethereum‚Äôs price and network? Large institutional purchases can create buying pressure, while increased validator participation strengthens network security and decentralization, potentially benefiting ETH‚Äôs long-term value. Found this analysis insightful? Share this article with your network to spread awareness about growing institutional cryptocurrency adoption and help others understand the significance of major moves like the Republic Technologies ETH investment. To learn more about the latest Ethereum trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption. title: Bank of England Confirms Plans for 'Temporary' Stablecoin Holding Limits
body: The U.K.'s central bank said on Monday it is proposing "temporary" limits of 20,000 pounds ($26,300) per coin for individuals and 10 million pounds for businesses.
