title: USDT Minted: The Stunning 1,000 Million Dollar Crypto Event That‚Äôs Shaking Markets
body: BitcoinWorld USDT Minted: The Stunning 1,000 Million Dollar Crypto Event That‚Äôs Shaking Markets Have you heard the massive news shaking the cryptocurrency world? Whale Alert just reported that an astonishing 1,000 million USDT has been freshly USDT minted at the Tether Treasury. This monumental event represents one of the largest stablecoin issuances we‚Äôve seen this year, and it‚Äôs sending ripples across the entire crypto ecosystem. What Does This Massive USDT Minted Event Really Mean? When Tether creates new USDT tokens, it‚Äôs not just a technical process ‚Äì it‚Äôs a significant market signal. The USDT minted process involves Tether creating new tokens that are typically backed by reserves. This recent issuance suggests several important developments: Increased demand for stablecoin liquidity Potential preparation for major market movements Growing institutional interest in cryptocurrency Enhanced trading volume expectations How Does USDT Minting Actually Work? The process of having USDT minted follows a specific protocol. Tether creates new tokens on various blockchain networks including: Ethereum blockchain Tron network Other supported platforms Each newly USDT minted token is supposed to be backed by equivalent reserves, though this has been a topic of ongoing discussion in the crypto community. The transparency of these reserves continues to evolve as regulatory scrutiny increases. Why Should Crypto Investors Care About This USDT Minted Event? Historically, large-scale USDT minted events have often preceded significant market movements. When substantial amounts of USDT enter circulation, it typically indicates that exchanges and large traders are preparing for increased activity. This can signal: Potential price volatility ahead Increased buying pressure for major cryptocurrencies Growing market confidence or speculation Enhanced liquidity for trading pairs What Are the Immediate Market Implications? The recent USDT minted announcement has already caught the attention of traders and analysts worldwide. Such substantial stablecoin creation often leads to: Short-term market optimism Increased trading volumes Potential price support for Bitcoin and Ethereum Enhanced arbitrage opportunities However, it‚Äôs crucial to remember that correlation doesn‚Äôt always mean causation. While historical patterns exist, each market cycle presents unique characteristics. How Can Traders Leverage This Information? Understanding the significance of when large amounts are USDT minted can provide valuable insights for your trading strategy. Consider these approaches: Monitor exchange inflows of the newly minted USDT Watch for unusual trading patterns in major pairs Pay attention to market sentiment shifts Consider dollar-cost averaging during potential volatility The Bigger Picture: Stablecoins in Modern Finance This massive USDT minted event highlights the growing importance of stablecoins in global finance. They serve as: Critical liquidity providers in crypto markets Hedging tools against volatility Bridge between traditional and digital finance Essential infrastructure for DeFi applications The recent revelation that 1,000 million USDT was USDT minted represents more than just a technical event ‚Äì it‚Äôs a powerful indicator of the maturing cryptocurrency landscape. As stablecoins continue to play an increasingly vital role in digital finance, understanding these significant minting events becomes essential for any serious market participant. The sheer scale of this issuance demonstrates the growing demand for crypto liquidity and the expanding role of stablecoins in the global financial ecosystem. Frequently Asked Questions What does it mean when USDT is minted? When USDT is minted, it means Tether has created new stablecoin tokens that are typically added to circulation to meet market demand for liquidity. Why would Tether mint 1,000 million USDT? Tether mints large amounts of USDT to meet increased demand from exchanges, institutional traders, and market participants who need stablecoin liquidity for trading and settlements. Does USDT minting affect cryptocurrency prices? Historically, large USDT minting events have often correlated with increased cryptocurrency prices, as the new liquidity can facilitate buying pressure, though this relationship isn‚Äôt guaranteed. How is minted USDT distributed to markets? Newly minted USDT is typically distributed to exchanges and institutional clients who have requested the stablecoin for their trading operations and liquidity needs. Is all minted USDT fully backed? Tether claims all minted USDT is fully backed by reserves, though the composition of these reserves has been subject to discussion and regulatory scrutiny over time. Can anyone request Tether to mint new USDT? Typically, only authorized partners, exchanges, and large institutional clients can request significant USDT minting through proper channels and compliance procedures. Found this analysis of the massive USDT minted event helpful? Share this article with fellow crypto enthusiasts on your social media channels to spread the knowledge about this significant market development! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping stablecoin adoption and future price action. This post USDT Minted: The Stunning 1,000 Million Dollar Crypto Event That‚Äôs Shaking Markets first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Robert Mitchnick interview sparks shift in Bitcoin ETF flows and XRP whale behavior
body: A video featuring Robert Mitchnick, BlackRock‚Äôs Head of Digital Assets, has garnered significant attention across the crypto market. His remarks on crypto asset strategy coincided with unexpected investment activity in Bitcoin and XRP. In the interview , Mitchnick discussed BlackRock‚Äôs approach to crypto-based exchange-traded funds and the evolving role of major digital assets within institutional portfolios. Following the video‚Äôs release, analysts noted unusual inflows and trading patterns in both Bitcoin and XRP. Prob the closest you‚Äôll get to an answer on why BlackRock isn‚Äôt going deeper into the coins. Also stresses patience w bitcoin, traders and leveraged bets are almost always gonna underperform the long term ppl, which is a universal truth. https://t.co/OL91lPnMtB ‚Äî Eric Balchunas (@EricBalchunas) November 10, 2025 The former Ripple executive noted that BlackRock is cautious in the crypto market because most coins are considered worthless. He praised Bitcoin, stating that its dominance demonstrates its enduring value over time. However, X users who have become sensitive to social media videos said that the video is AI-generated. One X user said , ‚Äúhis mouth moves independent of the muscles in his face that surround his mouth, it‚Äôs a fake video.‚Äù But Eric Bachunas, who re-tweeted the video, assured his followers that the video is authentic. Bitcoin and XRP investors reduce selling Following Mitchnick‚Äôs statement that the flows reversed significantly for Bitcoin spot ETFs, there was a noticeable shift in investment behavior. He emphasised at the Token2049 Dubai conference that initial inflows had come heavily from high-net-worth individuals and retail investors. However, the share held by institutional and wealth advisory clients has been increasing recently. Shortly after, reports surfaced of large-scale ‚Äúin-kind‚Äù conversions. According to Mitchnick, more than $3 billion worth of Bitcoin had been moved into BlackRock‚Äôs platform via in-kind ETF transactions, allowing holders to convert coins into ETF shares without triggering a sale event. On the other hand, although XRP was not directly commented on by Mitchnick, linking a specific interview to sudden flows, there were signs of unanticipated investment activity in the wake of his remarks. It was mainly linked to institutional crypto adoption being ‚Äústill early‚Äù and that ETFs for XRP were ‚Äúunconfirmed.‚Äù His background working with Ripple has the XRP army high on wishful thinking. XRP whales have now reduced selling, easing $650 million in outflows. Also, new XRP ETF entries were seen on the Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC). This initiated the 20-day SEC review clock and increased confidence in speculating in the cryptocurrency market. Franklin Templeton, Bitwise, Canary Capital, 21Shares, and CoinShares were all listed on the DTCC. To that end, more investors are adopting a ‚Äúbuy the rumor, sell the news‚Äù approach, driven by fears that a significant drop could follow any price rise. Meanwhile, Bitcoin is up 1.1% in the past 24 hours, trading at $105,095. This is a welcome bounce after last week, when the asset dipped below $100,000 multiple times and Bitcoin ETFs saw $1.22 billion in outflows. XRP is also up 9.6% in the last 24 hours, now trading at $2.53. Mitchnick asks new investors to refrain from leveraging According to Mitchnick, new investors should be careful and patient in the crypto markets. He asserts that long-term investors gain more and are more secure than short-term traders who focus on leverage bets. This has been seen mostly in the so-called Uptober that underperformed this year. For instance, one anonymous large trader on Binance, whose BTC-USDT long position was forcibly closed during the rout, reported realized losses of approximately $ 450 million. This was one of the biggest individual liquidations. Another trader is said to have lost over $30 million in about 10 minutes due to cross-margin exposure and rapid price changes. Earlier, as reported by Cryptopolitan, high-leverage crypto trader Wynn took a very large long position of approximately $1.25 billion on Bitcoin with 40√ó leverage. That position was liquidated when Bitcoin briefly dipped, resulting in a loss of approximately 949 BTC, worth $100 million. Additionally, Wynn placed another leveraged long of approximately $100 million and lost $25 million in a liquidation event. He admitted publicly that his trading had basically become gambling. If you're reading this, you‚Äôre already ahead. Stay there with our newsletter .

title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC Rebounds As Bearish Whales Face Unrelenting Liquidations
body: Bitcoin ( BTC ) has started the week with a strong comeback, rising from a Friday low of $99,170 to reclaim $106,000 during the ongoing session. The scale of the recovery caught overleveraged traders off guard, wiping short positions as bullish sentiment returned. The flagship cryptocurrency reclaimed $104,000 on Sunday and has crossed $106,000 during the ongoing session, up 1.29% at $106,058. Market Heaves Sigh Of Relief As Shutdown End In Sight The cryptocurrency market could soon heave a sigh of relief after the US Senate reached an agreement on Sunday on a three-part budget deal to end the ongoing government shutdown. According to reports, the Senate passed the bills in a 60-40 vote on Sunday night. The agreement was Republican Senate Majority Leader John Thune‚Äôs 15th attempt to secure Democratic support for a House-approved bill. The vote could potentially end the longest government shutdown as early as this week. The uncertainty over the shutdown and when the US government would resume key services has been a key factor behind BTC‚Äôs sluggish price action. It has also impacted the broader crypto market. The flagship cryptocurrency initially rallied to a new all-time high following the shutdown, but has struggled to regain momentum and fell below $100,000 last week. Trump Media Posts Q3 Loss Despite Bitcoin (BTC) Holdings Trump Media and Technology Group reported a $55 million loss in its third-quarter earnings despite its substantial Bitcoin ( BTC ) holdings. The company, which operates the Truth Social platform, disclosed that its Q3 net loss increased substantially from the $19.3 million in losses recorded in Q3 2024. The company also reported a marginal decline in revenue, which fell from over $1 million a year ago to $972,900. Trump Media shares also ended Friday down 1.73% at $13.10. Trump Media reported that it held 11,542 Bitcoin ( BTC ) as of September 30. The company first announced its intention to begin buying BTC in late July, flagging plans to acquire more, along with similar cryptocurrencies. The company generated $15.3 million of realized income from its Bitcoin options investment, posting $33 million in unrealized gains from its Cronos holdings. Robert Kiyosaki Doubles Down On Bitcoin Bet Renowned author Robert Kiyosaki has doubled down on his bullish outlook for Bitcoin and other hard assets, stating he is buying more gold, silver, Bitcoin, and Ethereum. Kiyosaki warned of an impending economic downturn, adding that he is preparing for it by accumulating assets that he calls ‚Äúreal money.‚Äù ‚ÄúCrash coming: Why I am buying, not selling.‚Äù Kiyosaki set ambitious price projections, stating Bitcoin will reach $250,000 by 2026, while silver will reach $100, and gold will reach $27,000. Meanwhile, BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes believes the Federal Reserve will be forced into a form of stealth quantitative easing (QE) as government debt skyrockets. Hayes stated the Fed will likely inject liquidity into the financial market through its Standing Repo Facility to help finance Treasury Debt without actually calling it quantitative easing. Strategy Launches Euro-based Preferred Stock Sale Strategy, the world‚Äôs largest public Bitcoin treasury, has announced the pricing of its euro-dominated perpetual-preferred stock. The company priced the stock at ‚Ç¨80 per share. The sale of the euro-based preferred STRE stock is part of the company‚Äôs plan to raise funds for future Bitcoin purchases. According to a statement, the issuance and sale of the STRE stock is expected to close on November 13. Strategy expects gross proceeds of ‚Ç¨620 million (or $715 million), while net proceeds should be roughly around ‚Ç¨608.8 million ($702 million). The company stated that the net proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including the purchase of more Bitcoin. The company announced the purchase of 397 BTC worth $45.6 million on November 3. The purchase was made at an average cost of $114,771 per coin, taking Strategy‚Äôs total Bitcoin holdings to 641,205 BTC . Bitcoin (BTC) Price Analysis Bitcoin ( BTC ) has started the week on a bullish note as market sentiment has flipped to positive. The flagship cryptocurrency rose nearly 2% on Friday before dropping 0.97% on Saturday and settling at $102,285. Positive sentiment returned on Sunday as the price rose 2.36% to cross $104,000 and settle at $104,694. BTC is up over 2% during the ongoing session, trading around $106,158. While traders are wishing for a strong recovery, one analyst has warned that BTC reaching $250,000 this year could be ‚Äúone of the worst things‚Äù to happen. According to the macro analyst, BTC reaching $250,000 too quickly could lead to a ‚Äúblow-off top‚Äù moment, with investors scrambling to secure profits. Macro analyst and investor Mel Mattison stated in an interview with Anthony Pompliano, ‚ÄúOne of the worst things that could happen is Bitcoin shoots up to $250,000, and the S&P to 8,000 in like 3 months. And you get this blow-off top, and everybody rushes to the exits to take profits, and it starts going down.‚Äù Mattison believes BTC is having healthy rotations, with the price action reaching some interesting points. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre having healthy rotations, healthy movement, and we are getting some very interesting points at some of the channels that I look at.‚Äù BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes and BitMine Chairman Tom Lee recently reiterated a bullish outlook for Bitcoin, suggesting the flagship cryptocurrency could yet reach $250,000 before the end of the year. November has historically been the highest-performing month on average for Bitcoin, with average returns of around 42%. Meanwhile, blockchain data has revealed the Bitcoin whales dumping BTC and crashing the price. Several high-profile entities, including the Winklevoss Twins‚Äô Gemini Custody wallets and early Bitcoin miner Owen Gunden, have emerged as key players influencing the flagship cryptocurrency‚Äôs price action. According to blockchain data, wallets linked to Winklevoss Capital and Gemini Custody have been methodically transferring large quantities of Bitcoin. The transfers have occurred in phases and involve several timed transactions. If the transactions correspond to sales, it means the Winklevoss twins have been methodically offloading their assets. The Winklevoss twins have liquidated over 9,000 BTC , worth around $900 million, since the beginning of 2025. BTC started the previous weekend in positive territory, rising 1.15% on Friday and settling at $109,555. Price action remained positive on Saturday and Sunday as BTC rose 0.45% and 0.44% to cross $110,000 and settle at $110,536. Selling pressure returned on Monday as the price fell nearly 4% and settled at $106,557. The bearish sentiment intensified on Tuesday as BTC slipped below $100,000, falling to a low of $98,892. However, it rebounded from this level to reclaim $100,000 and settle at $101,468. Despite the overwhelming selling pressure, BTC recovered on Wednesday, rising over 2% and settling at $103,869. Source: TradingView BTC returned to bearish territory on Thursday, dropping to a low of $100,235 before settling at $101,290. The price slipped below $100,000 again on Friday, falling to a low of $99,170 before recovering and settling at $103,284, ultimately rising nearly 2%. Price action was mixed over the weekend as BTC fell 0.97% on Saturday before rising 2.36% on Sunday and settling at $104,964. The flagship cryptocurrency has reclaimed $106,000 during the ongoing session, up nearly 2%, trading around $106,296. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Jack Dorsey's Block Enables Bitcoin Payments for Millions of Square Sellers
body: Payments firm Block is enabling no-fee Bitcoin payments for sellers worldwide via Square's point-of-sale platform.

title: US firms aim to invest large amounts in new AI infrastructure amid power shortages
body: Two of the world‚Äôs largest data center developers are facing prolonged delays in bringing their facilities online in Nvidia Corp.‚Äôs hometown, as local power shortages stall the projects indefinitely. This news was released after Digital Realty Trust Inc., a real estate investment trust that owns, operates, and develops data centers worldwide, mentioned that it applied to construct a data center in 2019. Notably, the company applied to build a data center in Santa Clara, California. Although they applied about six years ago, sources confirmed that the project is still awaiting complete power activation and is currently under development. On the other hand, Stack Infrastructure, which was acquired by Blue Owl Capital Inc. earlier this year, has also revealed a 48-megawatt project that is currently sitting idle. At the same time, Silicon Valley Power, the city-owned utility, works to improve its ability to provide services. The situation surrounding these facilities demonstrates a critical challenge for the US tech industry and the wider economy. This follows a report from analysts highlighting that, although demand for data centers is greater than ever before due to a surge in cloud computing and AI, gaining access to an electricity supply is becoming a significant problem. US firms aim to invest large amounts in new AI infrastructure amid power shortages The power supply issue primarily stems from slow progress on new transmission lines , outdated power infrastructure, and various challenges with regulations and permits. Sources have also pointed out the likelihood that pressure on power systems will escalate. BloombergNEF shared its forecast that US demand for electricity from AI computing could double by 2035. This forecast aligns with the predictions of company executives, such as OpenAI‚Äôs Sam Altman and Nvidia‚Äôs Jensen Huang, who anticipate that trillions of dollars will be invested in building new AI infrastructure . ‚ÄúThe demand has reached an all-time high, and we are facing a power-supply issue,‚Äù said Bill Dougherty, the executive vice president for data center solutions at real estate firm CBRE Group Inc., during an interview. Meanwhile, in terms of size, the Santa Clara projects are reportedly smaller than those in big facilities that leading AI developers are constructing in New Mexico, Louisiana, Texas, and Pennsylvania. Although these areas have lower electricity costs, their power supply sources are still being developed. The smaller centers serve local cloud clients who pay more for electricity and real estate, thereby reducing delays caused by long-distance data transfers. This is critically important for self-driving car operators and high-frequency traders, who require rapid access to information. Dougherty explained that some types of data center demand must be located near population centers. According to him, this is the kind of demand that needs to be addressed in California. However, he raised concerns that they cannot start up due to the restrictions on the available power supply. Regarding the situation, a May presentation by the city council highlighted that Santa Clara currently has 57 data centers that are either operational or under construction. In an email, utility spokesperson Janine de la Vega mentioned that Silicon Valley Power has contracts with Digital Realty and Stack that outline how they will provide their services. The representative also revealed that they regularly review requests for additional power supply. ‚ÄúSVP is working on a $450 million upgrade to their system to meet the needs of these customers and others. This project is on track to finish by 2028,‚Äù she added. The dilemma of power shortage in the US sparks concerns among data center developers Apart from Santa Clara, analysts discovered that many other places are also facing delays due to restrictions on utility capacity. Based on their argument, utilities across the United States have struggled to maintain their pace as the electricity demand grows faster than the power grid can deliver. Last year, Dominion Energy Inc. forecasted that connecting large data centers to the grid would take an additional one to three years, with some projects potentially taking up to seven years. Dominion serves northern Virginia‚Äôs Data Center Alley, home to the world‚Äôs largest group of computing facilities. In the meantime, Amazon.com Inc. has filed a complaint against a utility owned by Berkshire Hathaway Inc. in Oregon, alleging that the electricity provider has not supplied enough power for four of its data centers. Get seen where it counts. Advertise in Cryptopolitan Research and reach crypto‚Äôs sharpest investors and builders.

title: Bitdeer revenue surges 173% on self-mining boom, but stock drops on Bitcoin weakness
body: Crypto mining and AI cloud company Bitdeer said on Monday it pulled in $169.7 million in revenue for the third quarter of 2025, representing a 173% surge compared to the same quarter last year. Bitdeer‚Äôs revenue beat was powered by rising Bitcoin prices and a huge increase in its self-mining output, according to the earnings report. Despite the top-line growth, Wall Street didn‚Äôt react kindly. Bitdeer‚Äôs stock (BTDR) dropped more than 9% on Monday morning, with analysts pointing fingers at a softening in Bitcoin‚Äôs price that spooked investor sentiment. Bitdeer also logged a net loss of $266.7 million for the quarter, which is more than five times the $50.1 million loss it posted last year. But the company‚Äôs adjusted EBITDA did turn positive, hitting $43 million, which is a complete 180 from the $7.9 million adjusted loss in Q3 2024, thanks to a combination of stronger operational efficiency and higher mining capacity. Bitdeer‚Äôs self-mining output surges, cloud contracts phased out Revenue from self-mining alone exploded to $130.9 million, up from $31.5 million a year earlier. Bitdeer mined 1,109 Bitcoins during Q3, more than doubling its 511 BTC output from the same time last year. The company completely wound down its Cloud Hashrate contracts, which used to bring in $7.1 million, and instead reallocated that hardware to its in-house mining fleet, boosting efficiency. As of September 30, Bitdeer held $196.3 million in cash and equivalents, alongside $246.2 million worth of cryptocurrency on its books. But costs followed revenue, so Bitdeer‚Äôs operating expenses surged by 41% year-over-year, hitting $60.5 million, as the company scaled up infrastructure. Research and development expenses jumped to $39.1 million, from $24.8 million, due to active work on the SEAL04 chip, Bitdeer‚Äôs next-generation ASIC miner. By the end of October, Bitdeer said it had hit 41.2 EH/s (exahash per second) of self-mining capacity, overshooting its 40 EH/s target for the year. Mass production of SEALMINER A3 machines is already underway. But SEAL04 development hit a snag. The company flagged ‚Äúsignificant delays‚Äù in manufacturing due to design hurdles. Chief Strategy Officer Haris Basit said the delays stem from technical complexities involving both EDA tools and design flows, and added that ‚Äúwe completed the first tape-out in September‚Äù. He confirmed that volume production for SEAL04 remains on schedule for Q1 2026, though the version with updated architecture won‚Äôt meet its initial launch timeline. GPU rollout builds momentum, data centers break ground Bitdeer is also building out AI data centers beyond crypto. By October, the company had deployed 584 GPUs, pulling in an annualized $8 million in recurring revenue. They‚Äôve already placed orders for NVIDIA‚Äôs GB300 and B300 systems, which are expected to arrive in December. The company now controls 1,611 megawatts of energized power capacity spread across Texas, Norway, Bhutan, and Ethiopia, while another 1,381 megawatts are under development. Among the projects in motion: a 221 MW facility in Massillon, Ohio, scheduled to go live in early 2026, and a 570 MW site in Clarington, Ohio, set to finish by mid-2027. On top of that, Bitdeer has begun energizing new capacity in Massillon and Oromia, Ethiopia, per the earnings report. Don‚Äôt just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .

title: Revolutionary Bitcoin Payments: Square‚Äôs Game-Changing Real-Time Transaction Support
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Bitcoin Payments: Square‚Äôs Game-Changing Real-Time Transaction Support Imagine walking into your favorite coffee shop and paying with Bitcoin as easily as tapping your credit card. This vision just became reality as Square, Jack Dorsey‚Äôs payment giant, has launched revolutionary real-time Bitcoin payments through its point-of-sale systems. This groundbreaking development marks a significant milestone in cryptocurrency adoption, bringing Bitcoin payments directly to mainstream retail environments. How Do Bitcoin Payments Work Through Square? Square‚Äôs new Bitcoin payments feature leverages the Lightning Network, a second-layer solution built on top of the Bitcoin blockchain. This technology enables near-instant transactions while keeping fees remarkably low. When customers choose to pay with Bitcoin, the system generates a Lightning Network invoice that can be scanned and paid within seconds. The merchant receives confirmation almost immediately, making the entire process as seamless as traditional payment methods. This implementation represents a major step forward for cryptocurrency usability. Previously, Bitcoin transactions could take minutes to confirm on the main blockchain. However, with Lightning Network integration, Square has eliminated this barrier, creating a practical solution for everyday purchases. What Benefits Do Real-Time Bitcoin Payments Offer? The advantages of Square‚Äôs Bitcoin payments system extend to both merchants and customers. For business owners, accepting Bitcoin payments opens up new revenue streams and attracts tech-savvy customers. Meanwhile, consumers gain more payment flexibility and can use their cryptocurrency holdings for everyday purchases. Instant settlement eliminates waiting for blockchain confirmations Lower transaction fees compared to traditional credit card processing Global accessibility without currency conversion hassles Enhanced security through blockchain technology New customer acquisition from the crypto community Why Is This Important for Cryptocurrency Adoption? Square‚Äôs move represents a crucial validation of Bitcoin as a legitimate payment method. As one of the world‚Äôs leading payment processors, Square‚Äôs endorsement signals to other businesses that Bitcoin payments are ready for mainstream adoption. This development could trigger a domino effect, encouraging more merchants to explore cryptocurrency payment options. The timing couldn‚Äôt be better, as cryptocurrency awareness continues to grow globally. By integrating Bitcoin payments into existing point-of-sale systems, Square has removed significant technical barriers that previously prevented widespread merchant adoption. What Challenges Might Merchants Face? While the benefits are substantial, merchants should consider several factors before implementing Bitcoin payments. Price volatility remains a concern, though Square likely implements instant conversion to stable currencies. Technical understanding among staff and customers may require additional training and educational materials. Regulatory compliance varies by jurisdiction, and merchants must ensure they meet local requirements for cryptocurrency transactions. However, Square‚Äôs established compliance framework should help streamline this process for participating businesses. How Can Businesses Get Started? Merchants using Square‚Äôs point-of-sale systems can enable Bitcoin payments through their dashboard settings. The setup process is designed to be straightforward, requiring minimal technical expertise. Square provides comprehensive documentation and support to help businesses navigate the implementation. Access Bitcoin payments through Square dashboard Configure settlement preferences (instant conversion optional) Train staff on processing Bitcoin transactions Promote Bitcoin payment acceptance to customers Monitor transaction performance and customer response The Future of Bitcoin Payments in Retail Square‚Äôs implementation of real-time Bitcoin payments could fundamentally change how we think about digital currency in commerce. As more businesses adopt similar systems, we may see a significant shift toward cryptocurrency integration in everyday transactions. This development positions Bitcoin not just as an investment asset, but as a practical medium of exchange. The success of Square‚Äôs Bitcoin payments initiative could inspire other payment processors to follow suit, accelerating cryptocurrency adoption across multiple industries. This represents a pivotal moment where digital currencies transition from niche interest to mainstream financial tool. Frequently Asked Questions How fast are Square‚Äôs Bitcoin payments? Transactions process in near real-time, typically completing within seconds thanks to Lightning Network technology. Do merchants receive Bitcoin or traditional currency? Merchants can choose to receive Bitcoin directly or opt for instant conversion to their local currency. Are there extra fees for Bitcoin payments? Square‚Äôs Bitcoin payments generally feature lower fees than traditional credit card processing, though specific rates may vary. Can any Square merchant accept Bitcoin? The feature is available to merchants in supported regions using compatible Square point-of-sale systems. Is special hardware needed for Bitcoin payments? No additional hardware is required beyond standard Square payment terminals that can display QR codes. How secure are Bitcoin payments through Square? Transactions benefit from blockchain security while maintaining the convenience of traditional payment processing. Join the Payment Revolution The integration of Bitcoin payments into Square‚Äôs platform represents a monumental step toward cryptocurrency mass adoption. Share this breakthrough news with fellow crypto enthusiasts and business owners who could benefit from understanding this game-changing development. Help spread awareness about how Bitcoin payments are transforming retail transactions by sharing this article on your social media channels. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. title: Donald Trump Is Giving Out $2,000 To Americans, Here‚Äôs What Happened To Bitcoin The Last Time Government Gave Out Free Money
body: US President Donald Trump has announced plans to give out $2,000 to American citizens, drawing attention from analysts who are debating how this influx of cash could impact Bitcoin (BTC) . The last time the US government initiated direct cash payments to citizens, it ignited a massive BTC rally. Now analysts are wondering if history could repeat itself with Trump‚Äôs latest stimulus plan. How Bitcoin Surged After Donald Trump‚Äôs Stimulus Checks In 2020 The Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (CARES Act), signed into law on March 27, 2020, provides a historical blueprint of how payments from the US government can affect the crypto market. According to crypto analyst Satoshi Flipper, once $1,200 checks started reaching Americans in 2020, many recipients immediately funnelled the funds into cryptocurrencies. The analyst noted that just days after the cash distribution announcement, both Coinbase and Binance reported spikes in $1,200 Bitcoin purchases, with users often matching the exact check amounts. At the time, Bitcoin was trading around $6,800, more than 93% below its price of $106,317 at the time of writing. Within six weeks, the leading cryptocurrency had jumped 50% to $10,000, starting the momentum of its historic 2020 price rally . Between 2020 and 2021, Satoshi Flipper disclosed that BTC rose from $3,850 after the March 2020 crash to a previous all-time high above $69,000 . Ethereum also saw dramatic gains, rising from $120 to $4,800. Furthermore, the total cryptocurrency market capitalization grew from around $180 billion to over $3 trillion. He also highlighted that during the cash distributions, millions of new users entered crypto through applications like Robinhood and Cash App. Notably, the combination of government cash, market uncertainty, and retail excitement created a powerful wave of investment that fueled the biggest bull run the market had ever seen. Now, with Trump announcing a new $2,000 stimulus plan for Americans, analysts are speculating about whether history could repeat itself‚Äîand if Bitcoin could experience another dramatic bull run . Trump‚Äôs $2,000 Cash Plan To Millions Of Americans On November 9, the Trump Truth Social X account, run by the Trump Media & Technology Group (TMTG), announced that Americans who are not classified as high-income earners could expect $2,000 payments. The post started by criticizing people against tariffs and highlighting the strong economic indicators in the US, including record stock market levels, high 401(k) balances , and low inflation. Trump framed the $2,000 payments as a dividend to ordinary Americans while also emphasizing investments in US businesses, factories, and infrastructure. The administration also claimed that this approach will support citizens directly while managing the nation‚Äôs broader economic growth and its $37 trillion debt reduction goals. Speaking on the new cash stimulus, political commentator Brian Krassentein suggests that the plan is intended to help boost the economy, which Trump has described as struggling. Additionally, the total cost of the program could add around $650 billion to the national deficit .

title: Binance ETH Volume Explodes Past $6 Trillion: Here‚Äôs What It Means
body: Speculation is emerging as the dominant driver in the Ethereum market rather than spot accumulation, as ETH trading volume and open interest set new all-time highs. According to CryptoQuant, ETH trading volumes on centralized exchanges, particularly Binance, have never been this high, and compared to previous cycles, the difference is obvious. Speculation Dominates the Market On Binance alone, ETH trading volumes have already crossed $6 trillion in 2025, a figure that is roughly two to three times higher than what was observed in prior market cycles. Other major centralized exchanges have followed a similar path, although Binance remains by far the largest venue for ETH derivatives and high-frequency trading. Open interest data further supports the same trend. In August this year, ETH open interest on Binance surpassed $12.5 billion in a new record, which represented a dramatic jump when compared to the previous historic peak. Back in November 2021, when the market was euphoric and Ethereum was approaching its then all-time highs, ETH open interest topped out at only $2.5 billion. The fivefold increase in open interest is in line with the view that speculative positioning has expanded to a scale not previously seen in earlier periods. CryptoQuant added, ‚ÄúAltogether, this shows that the market is highly speculative on ETH this cycle, making its dynamics more fragile than when the spot market represented a larger share of activity. It also explains why the market behaves differently now and seems noticeably less stable.‚Äù Key Resistances and Support Against this backdrop, market commentator Ted Pillows observed that Ethereum is approaching a ‚Äúkey‚Äù resistance level, and the next major move will likely be determined by price action around $3,700. In his post, Pillows stated that if ETH manages to close a daily candle above this mark, the momentum could trigger a continuation rally toward the $4,000 region. However, if it fails to break above that threshold and is rejected from current levels, a pullback may be imminent. On the flip side, crypto analyst Ali Martinez identified three critical support levels for the altcoin while taking the Pricing Bands as a reference. The first major support sits at $2,866, which currently acts as the closest buffer zone for bulls. The next important level is at $2,528, a deeper support area that could become relevant if selling pressure accelerates or if market volatility spikes. Finally, long-term support sits all the way down at $1,789, a region that has previously served as a strong demand zone. The post Binance ETH Volume Explodes Past $6 Trillion: Here‚Äôs What It Means appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Analyst to‚ÄØXRP‚ÄØHolders: It‚Äôs Only Over When This Happens
body: The crypto market is gripped by a resurgence of fear around XRP, and yet, amid the panic, a seasoned analyst delivers a contrarian message: the moment you surrender might mark the end‚Äînot the reversal. According to crypto analyst Steph, now is one of those junctures. He reminds holders that when sentiment plunges and chart patterns recall past collapses, it may not be ‚Äúover‚Äù for XRP; it could be the calm before a rebound . Steph points to the 2017 run where XRP surged from fractions of a cent to over $2 in a matter of months, even after widespread ‚Äúit‚Äôs over‚Äù declarations. His thesis: if you keep holding, the story may not be finished yet. I‚Äôts only over when you sell. $XRP pic.twitter.com/BjKyZLZ7fv ‚Äî STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) November 9, 2025 Echoes of 2017: A Historical Precedent In 2017, XRP began the year at roughly $0.006‚ÄØUSD, and by December it had climbed toward $2‚Äì$3, representing gains of over 30,000%. That explosive rise came after periods of doubt and market fatigue. What matters is that the environment of extreme fear preceded the breakout. Steph argues the market today reflects a similar visitor: fear is high, sentiment is low, and many are shouting ‚Äúit‚Äôs over‚Äù. Yet history shows that such moments can flip. Sentiment & Technical Signals: Watch the Thresholds Steph highlights two connected signals. First: sentiment. Fear‚Äëand‚Äëgreed measures are headed toward rock bottom for XRP‚Äërelated assets. When the crowds exit, contrarians note the opportunity. Second: technical structure. Steph specifically warns that the key moment will be when you sell. He‚Äôs referenced the 200‚Äëweek simple moving average (SMA) for XRP, noting that prior weeks below this line preceded major drops. The implication: the threshold between ‚Äúit‚Äôs over‚Äù and ‚Äújust beginning‚Äù may hinge on whether holders capitulate or stay in. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Why ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Over When You Sell‚Äù Matters Steph‚Äôs catch‚Äêphrase is deceptively simple: the only time the rally ends for you is when you exit . In plain terms, selling in a panic transforms a potential rebound into a personal defeat. By contrast, staying the course (or at least not panicking out) preserves optionality. The current climate, Steph argues, is more about shadowing the prior cycle than copying it exactly‚Äîbut the psychology is the same. When everyone says ‚Äúgame over,‚Äù someone still holds the ticket. Balanced Context: Risks Remain But this isn‚Äôt blind optimism. Even Steph has pointed out clear caveats: XRP must hold critical support levels‚Äîespecially that 200‚Äëweek SMA‚Äîto keep the bullish thesis alive. And external risks remain: regulatory headwinds, macro shocks, or unexpected partner setbacks could undo even the best chart. The past doesn‚Äôt guarantee the future. In short, unless you sell, the opportunity may still be alive for XRP. Steph contends that the moment many think ‚Äúit‚Äôs over‚Äù might instead mark the moment a new chapter begins. For long‚Äëterm holders prepared to endure fear, the question isn‚Äôt if the story continues, it‚Äôs when. Disclaimer: This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are advised to conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Spot Gold Soars to $4,110 ‚Äì Highest Price Since October Sparks Market Excitement
body: BitcoinWorld Spot Gold Soars to $4,110 ‚Äì Highest Price Since October Sparks Market Excitement Have you been watching the precious metals market lately? The price of spot gold just hit an exciting milestone, reaching $4,110 per ounce ‚Äì the highest level we‚Äôve seen since October 24. This remarkable surge in spot gold prices has investors and market watchers buzzing with anticipation about what‚Äôs next for the yellow metal. What‚Äôs Driving the Spot Gold Rally? The recent spike in spot gold values didn‚Äôt happen in isolation. Several key factors are contributing to this impressive performance. Investors who‚Äôve been tracking spot gold performance will recognize this as a significant breakthrough. Why Should You Care About Spot Gold Prices? When spot gold climbs this dramatically, it often indicates that investors are seeking stability amid market volatility. How Does This Spot Gold Performance Compare Historically? Looking back at spot gold price history, we can see this current level represents a significant recovery from earlier declines. The last time spot gold traded at these heights was in late October, making this a noteworthy comeback story. Historical data shows that when spot gold breaks through key resistance levels, it often establishes new trading ranges. Seasoned gold investors understand that spot gold movements follow patterns influenced by multiple factors. The current spot gold rally appears supported by both technical and fundamental drivers, suggesting this might be more than a temporary spike. However, as with any market movement, careful analysis remains essential. What Can We Expect Next for Spot Gold? While predicting exact price movements remains challenging, several indicators suggest continued strength in spot gold markets. The combination of economic uncertainty and strong physical demand creates a supportive environment for spot gold values. Furthermore, central bank policies and currency fluctuations typically influence spot gold pricing significantly. Market analysts will be watching closely to see if spot gold can maintain these levels and potentially push higher. The $4,110 mark represents an important psychological barrier that, if sustained, could open the door to further gains. However, investors should always approach spot gold investments with appropriate risk management strategies. Final Thoughts on the Spot Gold Surge The recent achievement of $4,110 for spot gold marks an important moment for precious metals investors. This price level, not seen since October, demonstrates gold‚Äôs enduring appeal as a safe-haven asset. Whether this represents a new normal for spot gold prices or a temporary peak remains to be seen, but the movement certainly commands attention. As markets continue to evolve, spot gold will likely remain a key indicator of investor sentiment and economic health. The current price action suggests that gold‚Äôs traditional role as a store of value remains firmly intact, offering potential opportunities for informed investors. Frequently Asked Questions What exactly is spot gold? Spot gold refers to the current market price for immediate delivery of gold bullion, as opposed to futures contracts for delivery at a later date. Why did gold prices drop in October? Gold prices typically fluctuate based on multiple factors including dollar strength, interest rate expectations, and global economic conditions that affected markets in October. Is now a good time to invest in gold? Investment decisions should be based on individual financial goals and risk tolerance. What‚Äôs the difference between spot gold and gold ETFs? title: What Will Happen to Bitcoin and Altcoins if the US Government Shutdown Ends? ‚Äì XRP Spot ETF Hype Begins
body: The US Senate used the ‚Äúcloture‚Äù procedure to advance a funding bill to reopen the government in a crucial vote Sunday night, reaching the 60 votes needed to break a weeks-long deadlock. With seven Democrats and Maine Senator Angus King siding with Republicans, the bill has moved to a final vote. The vote could be completed as early as today. If the bill passes, the government would reopen later this week after a 40-day shutdown. The House of Representatives, which recessed months ago, will also be recalled to vote on the Senate's revised text. The agreement includes funding the government through January 30th, reversing the federal layoffs of recent weeks, and holding a special vote on ACA tax credits in December. The Senate's progress quickly revived the crypto market after a week of low morale. Bitcoin jumped over 4 percent to $106,200, Ethereum rose 7.7 percent to $3,629, XRP rose 9.7 percent to $2.47 on Thursday in anticipation of a potential first spot XRP ETF. Bitcoin and Ethereum saw some pullback after the surge. For weeks, ETF outflows, weak retail demand, and fears about tech stock valuations have weighed on cryptocurrencies. The government reopening could inject new energy into the sector, particularly as the SEC resumes operations after a month-long standstill. This means an acceleration of measures like ETF approvals, drafting of formal crypto regulations, and the ‚Äúinnovation exemption‚Äù championed by SEC Chairman Paul Atkins. Other agencies like the CFTC and OCC are also expected to reactivate. Related News: After Zcash, Another Altcoin Jumps at the Possibility of Collaboration with ZEC The government reopening also increases the likelihood that the Senate Banking and Agriculture committees will consider crypto-related market structure bills. However, neither committee has released its draft text. With Congress only a week away from the Thanksgiving recess, committee hearings are expected to extend into December. The Senate will also be able to schedule a confirmation hearing for Mike Selig, who has been nominated to chair the CFTC. Selig's inauguration would mark the end of Caroline Pham's term as acting chair. Canary Capital's XRP spot ETF appears poised to begin trading on Nasdaq on Thursday morning. The company bypassed the SEC's scheduling control by removing the ‚Äúdeferral amendment‚Äù clause in its S-1 filing, allowing the filing to automatically become effective after the 20-day waiting period required by Section 8(a) of the Securities Act of 1933. The same method was used last month for Bitwise and Grayscale's Solana ETFs. Even if SEC staff are still not fully operational due to a government shutdown, the ETF could launch automatically. Bloomberg ETF analyst Eric Balchunas noted that the fact that XRP ETF applications haven't undergone the lengthy due diligence period for the Solana ETFs suggests the SEC deems the products ready. This launch will mark a historic turning point for XRP, which has been overshadowed by the years-long Ripple lawsuit. ‚ÄúThe launch of spot XRP ETFs represents the final, official closure of the legacy anti-crypto approach,‚Äù commented Nate Geraci, President of NovaDius Wealth Management. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: What Will Happen to Bitcoin and Altcoins if the US Government Shutdown Ends? ‚Äì XRP Spot ETF Hype Begins

title: Tom Lee‚Äôs BitMine acquires 110,288 ETH, pushes ETH holdings to 2.9% of supply
body: BitMine Immersion Technologies, the world‚Äôs largest Ethereum holder, has added more of the altcoin to its haul. The firm, led by Wall Street veteran Tom Lee, announced it had significantly bolstered its Ethereum reserves on November 10, 2025. The acquisition strengthens BitMine as the largest corporate holder of ETH. BitMine buys more ETH On Nov. 10, BitMine announced the purchase of 110,288 ETH, valued at approximately $385 million based on current market prices. The purchase brings the Nasdaq-listed company‚Äôs total Ethereum holdings to an impressive 3.5 million tokens. Accordingly, this latest acquisition elevates BitMine‚Äôs ETH portfolio to roughly 2.9% of Ethereum‚Äôs circulating supply of 120.7 million tokens, a threshold that amplifies the firm‚Äôs influence in the ecosystem. The transaction, executed through over-the-counter desks and spot exchanges, reflects a deliberate strategy to capitalize on recent price dips, which have seen ETH trade in the $3,400 to $3,500 range over the past month. Tom Lee, co-founder of Fundstrat Global Advisors and BitMine‚Äôs guiding force, emphasized the rationale in a statement: ‚ÄúThe recent dip in ETH prices presented an attractive opportunity and BitMine increased its ETH purchases this week,‚Äù said Thomas ‚ÄúTom‚Äù Lee of Fundstrat, Chairman of BitMine. ‚ÄúWe acquired 110,288 ETH tokens over the past week, 34% more ETH acquired compared to the week prior. This pushed our ETH holdings to 3.5 million, or 2.9% of the supply of ETH. We are now more than halfway towards our initial pursuit of the ‚Äòalchemy of 5%‚Äô of ETH. Additionally, BitMine increased our cash holdings to $398 million from $389 million.‚Äù This purchase follows BitMine‚Äôs aggressive expansion in 2025, with the firm‚Äôs total crypto and cash reserves now standing at $13.2 billion. Its stock has attracted buying from Cathie Wood‚Äôs Ark Invest. Ethereum price outlook Ethereum‚Äôs price continues to struggle amid short-term bearish pressures. As of November 10, ETH traded near $3,553, down 28% from its August peak of $4,953. Over 24 hours, the price was around 1.2% up, but down 3% over the week. Despite this, more bullish projections abound, including from Tom Lee himself. He envisions a surge by year-end, driven by spot ETH ETF inflows and broader ecosystem growth. ‚ÄúIn the aftermath of crypto‚Äôs largest ever single day deleveraging event on October 10th, crypto trading volumes are still recovering, which also affect crypto equities. The fourth quarter is seasonally strong for crypto and equity price, and historically encourages investors to increase ‚Äòopen interest‚Äô and therefore, associated trading volumes should improve in coming weeks,‚Äù Lee said. Tom Lee has said the S&P 500 will hit $7,500, and maintains Bitcoin will reach $200,000 and Ethereum $7,000. ETH price hovered at lows of $1,500 in April before it bounced to its all-time peak near the $5k level in August. The post Tom Lee‚Äôs BitMine acquires 110,288 ETH, pushes ETH holdings to 2.9% of supply appeared first on Invezz

title: Ethereum (ETH) Rebounds 20% From Recent Bottom, but Bulls Still in Danger (Analyst)
body: The cryptocurrency market experienced a notable revival over the past several hours, and Ethereum (ETH) is among the top performers. Despite its resurgence, though, one popular analyst believes the asset may not be entirely out of the woods yet. Cause for Concern The past week has been quite turbulent for ETH, whose price crashed below $3,100 on November 5. In the following days, the bulls made some attempts to reclaim the lost ground, and the major uptick occurred on November 9 when US President Donald Trump promised to distribute at least $2,000 to every American outside the high-income bracket. ETH rose to as high as $3,650 before slightly retracing to the current $3,610 (per CoinGecko‚Äôs data), representing a nearly 20% increase from the local bottom witnessed earlier this month. ETH Price, Source: CoinGecko Despite the pump, however, some analysts warned that the second-largest cryptocurrency remains in a dangerous zone. X user Posty supports that thesis, arguing that the ‚Äústructure is still in a multi-month downtrend.‚Äù He thinks multiple key levels in and around $4,000 might prevent a more substantial comeback. ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs put in a higher low and higher high if we‚Äôre truly ready to run this back,‚Äù the analyst added. Ted also outlined a rather cautious prediction. In his view, crossing a daily candle above $3,700 could lead to a rally to $4,000, but a rejection may be followed by a drop to the $3,400 support area. The Road to a New ATH? Many others have no concerns and think ETH‚Äôs valuation could soon skyrocket to new historic peaks. X user Cas Abbe suggested that the asset‚Äôs plunge towards $3,000 last week appears to be ‚Äúa fakeout,‚Äù comparing it to the dip that occurred in Q2 this year, which was followed by a 100% rally. For his part, Ali Martinez envisioned the rise to a fresh all-time high of $10,000. However, he assumed that the price could first collapse to $2,000 before exploding to that level. The low amount of ETH tokens stored on crypto exchanges supports the long-term bullish scenario. Currently, there are fewer than 16 million coins held on such platforms, which is quite close to the nine-year low witnessed earlier this month. The development suggests that investors have been shifting towards self-custody methods, thus reducing the immediate selling pressure and signaling that there are no signs of mass profit-taking. The post Ethereum (ETH) Rebounds 20% From Recent Bottom, but Bulls Still in Danger (Analyst) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Institutional Crypto Adoption Soars as Biopharma Giant Secures $100M for Digital Assets
body: BitcoinWorld Institutional Crypto Adoption Soars as Biopharma Giant Secures $100M for Digital Assets In a groundbreaking move that signals growing institutional crypto adoption, Nasdaq-listed Propanc Biopharma has secured up to $100 million specifically for cryptocurrency purchases. This strategic decision marks one of the most significant entries by a publicly-traded biopharmaceutical company into the digital asset space, potentially setting a new trend for healthcare companies exploring alternative investments. Why Is Institutional Crypto Adoption Gaining Momentum? The $100 million funding from Hexton Capital represents a major vote of confidence in both Propanc‚Äôs oncology research and the cryptocurrency market. This move demonstrates how institutional crypto adoption is expanding beyond traditional financial sectors into healthcare and biotechnology. Companies are increasingly recognizing digital assets as viable components of corporate treasury strategies. Propanc‚Äôs dual-purpose approach ‚Äì allocating capital for both cryptocurrency acquisition and oncology treatment development ‚Äì showcases a sophisticated investment strategy. The company hasn‚Äôt yet specified which cryptocurrencies it plans to purchase, leaving market observers curious about their selection criteria and asset allocation approach. What Does This Mean for Healthcare and Crypto Markets? This development highlights several important trends in institutional crypto adoption: Diversification Strategy: Companies are using crypto to diversify beyond traditional assets Sector Convergence: Healthcare and technology sectors are increasingly overlapping Risk Management: Institutional investors are developing sophisticated approaches to digital assets Market Validation: Public companies entering crypto lends legitimacy to the entire sector The timing of this announcement comes as more institutions are warming to cryptocurrency investments. Propanc‚Äôs decision could encourage other healthcare companies to consider similar moves, potentially creating a new wave of institutional crypto adoption across different industries. How Will This Impact Future Institutional Crypto Adoption? As a Nasdaq-listed company, Propanc‚Äôs move sets an important precedent for institutional crypto adoption. Other publicly-traded companies may follow suit, particularly those in research-intensive fields like biopharma where innovation and forward-thinking strategies are valued. This could accelerate mainstream acceptance of cryptocurrencies as legitimate investment vehicles. The company‚Äôs approach to balancing traditional medical research with cutting-edge digital asset investment demonstrates how modern corporations are adapting to evolving financial landscapes. This strategic blend of healthcare innovation and financial technology represents the next phase of institutional crypto adoption. What Challenges Might Propanc Face? While this move represents exciting progress for institutional crypto adoption, Propanc will need to navigate several challenges: Regulatory Compliance: Ensuring all cryptocurrency transactions meet SEC requirements Volatility Management: Developing strategies to handle crypto market fluctuations Security Concerns: Implementing robust digital asset protection measures Shareholder Communication: Explaining the strategy to investors unfamiliar with crypto Despite these challenges, the company‚Äôs bold approach to institutional crypto adoption could pay significant dividends if executed properly. The $100 million commitment shows serious intent and could position Propanc as a pioneer in corporate cryptocurrency strategy. Conclusion: A New Era of Institutional Crypto Adoption Propanc Biopharma‚Äôs $100 million cryptocurrency allocation marks a significant milestone in institutional crypto adoption. This move demonstrates how digital assets are becoming integrated into corporate treasury management across diverse sectors. As more companies observe Propanc‚Äôs experience, we may see accelerated institutional crypto adoption throughout 2024 and beyond, potentially transforming how corporations manage their assets and approach investment diversification. Frequently Asked Questions What is Propanc Biopharma‚Äôs main business? Propanc Biopharma is a Nasdaq-listed company focused on developing oncology treatments for cancer patients. How much funding did Propanc secure for cryptocurrency purchases? The company secured up to $100 million from Hexton Capital specifically for acquiring digital assets. Why would a biopharma company invest in cryptocurrency? This represents a diversification strategy and shows growing institutional confidence in digital assets as part of corporate treasury management. Has Propanc specified which cryptocurrencies it will buy? The company has not yet revealed which specific digital assets it plans to acquire with the $100 million funding. What does this mean for other healthcare companies? Propanc‚Äôs move could encourage other healthcare and biotech firms to consider similar cryptocurrency investment strategies. This significant institutional entry adds legitimacy to the crypto space and may encourage more traditional companies to explore digital asset investments. title: Revolutionary Stablecoin Payments Expansion: Exodus Acquires Grateful to Transform Latin American Commerce
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Stablecoin Payments Expansion: Exodus Acquires Grateful to Transform Latin American Commerce In a groundbreaking move that‚Äôs set to transform digital finance across Latin America, cryptocurrency wallet provider Exodus has announced its acquisition of Grateful to dramatically expand stablecoin payments throughout the region. This strategic partnership represents a significant leap forward in making cryptocurrency accessible for everyday transactions. Why This Stablecoin Payments Expansion Matters The acquisition positions Exodus to become a major player in the Latin American stablecoin payments market. Grateful‚Äôs sophisticated software platform enables merchants to seamlessly accept stablecoins through multiple channels. This development comes at a crucial time when many Latin American countries are experiencing currency volatility and seeking reliable digital payment alternatives. Traditional payment systems in the region often face challenges including high fees, slow processing times, and limited accessibility. The integration of Grateful‚Äôs technology into Exodus‚Äôs ecosystem addresses these pain points directly. Moreover, this expansion of stablecoin payments could provide financial inclusion for millions who currently lack access to traditional banking services. How Will Stablecoin Payments Work for Merchants? Grateful‚Äôs platform offers three primary methods for accepting stablecoin payments, each designed for simplicity and security: Wallet-to-wallet payments for direct peer-to-peer transactions QR-based point-of-sale systems for in-store purchases On-chain invoicing for business-to-business transactions These stablecoin payment options provide merchants with immediate settlement and significantly lower transaction costs compared to traditional payment processors. The system operates 24/7, eliminating the delays associated with banking hours and weekend closures that often plague conventional payment systems. What Challenges Might This Stablecoin Payments Initiative Face? While the potential is enormous, expanding stablecoin payments across Latin America presents several hurdles. Regulatory frameworks vary significantly between countries, requiring careful navigation of local financial laws. Additionally, consumer education remains crucial ‚Äì many potential users still need to understand how stablecoin payments work and why they‚Äôre beneficial. Technical infrastructure also varies across the region, with internet connectivity and smartphone penetration differing between urban and rural areas. However, the simplicity of QR-based stablecoin payments makes them accessible even in areas with limited technological resources, potentially bridging this digital divide. Real-World Impact of Enhanced Stablecoin Payments The expansion of stablecoin payments could revolutionize commerce across Latin America. Small businesses can benefit from reduced payment processing fees, while consumers gain access to a stable store of value amid local currency fluctuations. This is particularly valuable in countries experiencing high inflation rates. Cross-border trade within Latin America could also see significant improvements through these stablecoin payment solutions. Traditional international payments often involve multiple intermediaries and lengthy processing times, whereas stablecoin payments can settle almost instantly with minimal fees. Future Outlook for Stablecoin Payments in Latin America The Exodus-Grateful partnership signals a growing recognition that stablecoin payments represent the future of digital commerce in emerging markets. As more merchants adopt these systems, network effects could accelerate adoption exponentially. The success of this initiative could inspire similar stablecoin payment expansions across other developing regions. Looking ahead, we can expect to see continued innovation in stablecoin payment technologies, with potential integrations of loyalty programs, automated accounting features, and enhanced security measures. The foundation being laid today could shape the future of financial transactions across Latin America for years to come. Conclusion: A New Era for Digital Payments The acquisition of Grateful by Exodus marks a pivotal moment in the evolution of stablecoin payments. By combining Exodus‚Äôs established wallet infrastructure with Grateful‚Äôs merchant-focused technology, this partnership creates a comprehensive solution that addresses real-world payment challenges across Latin America. The expansion of stablecoin payments through this collaboration has the potential to bring financial stability, reduced costs, and increased accessibility to millions of users and businesses throughout the region. Frequently Asked Questions What are stablecoin payments? Stablecoin payments involve using cryptocurrency tokens pegged to stable assets like the US dollar to conduct transactions, combining the stability of traditional currency with the efficiency of blockchain technology. How will Exodus integrate Grateful‚Äôs technology? Exodus will incorporate Grateful‚Äôs merchant payment tools directly into its wallet ecosystem, allowing users to make stablecoin payments to participating merchants seamlessly. Which countries in Latin America will benefit first? While specific rollout plans haven‚Äôt been detailed, countries with existing cryptocurrency adoption like Brazil, Argentina, and Mexico are likely early targets for the stablecoin payments expansion. Are stablecoin payments secure? Yes, stablecoin payments utilize blockchain technology which provides transparent, encrypted transactions that are generally more secure than traditional digital payment methods. What advantages do stablecoin payments offer merchants? Merchants benefit from lower transaction fees, faster settlement times, reduced chargeback risk, and access to customers who prefer using digital assets. How can consumers start using these stablecoin payment services? Consumers can download the Exodus wallet, acquire stablecoins, and then use them at merchants who have implemented Grateful‚Äôs payment acceptance technology. Found this insight into the future of stablecoin payments fascinating? title: Jack Dorsey announces that Bitcoin-to-Bitcoin payments are now live
body: Former Twitter (now X) CEO and present CEO of Block Inc., Jack Dorsey, has announced that Bitcoin-to-Bitcoin payments are now live. The company will enable over 4 million merchants with its Square payment system to accept Bitcoin as payment. Dorsey announced the update on X. He stated , ‚ÄúO ur sellers can now receive BTC to BTC, BTC to fiat, fiat to BTC, or fiat to fiat we have one in CashApp, all merchants (not just Square) worldwide that accept bitcoin.‚Äù Now, traders worldwide can choose their preferred settlement method without added complexity. Traders go live with Bitcoin payments Dorsey first confirmed that his company was actively working on integrating Bitcoin payments for merchants on April 3rd. He wrote, ‚Äúnot a simple flip, but we are doing it.‚Äù The company provided more details on the project last month, promising that it would go live today. It‚Äôs here. Starting today, over 4 million Square sellers can accept Bitcoin at checkout. Zero fees until 2027. Instant settlement. Global freedom. The switch is flipped ‚Äì and this is only the start. @Square | @block | #Bitcoin ‚ö°Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/q03dpLxdz7 ‚Äî Jacob Szymik (@JacobSzymik) November 10, 2025 The launch provides access to instant settlement with no fees until 2027. Thereafter, the company shall levy a nominal fee of 1%. This is significantly lower than the typical credit card rates, which can range from 2.5% to 3.5%. The feature is accessible to traders from the Square‚ÄÇdashboard to activate. Buys are executed on the‚ÄÇBitcoin blockchain, making transactions transparent and traceable. BTC and Fiat money‚ÄÇare both supported on the platform. Block is also using the Lightning Network. It is a scaling solution of Bitcoin, which transacts almost instantly with low charges. This allows traders not only to get Bitcoin directly, but they can also use auto-conversion to US dollars as a more stable option. However, Bitcoin payments cannot be reversed, and compared to credit cards, there is no chargeback option. Although the feature is limiting, it lowers the possibility of fraud. The project will enable millions of businesses, online shopping platforms, and major retail outlets to receive Bitcoin payments safely and securely. Block has previously invested in Bitcoin‚Äôs infrastructure. The company owns more than 8,000 BTC worth around half a billion dollars. According to reports, it continues to build out its crypto ecosystem with products like the Bitkey hardware wallet. To that end, Block has recorded significant growth in the financial technology and crypto sectors. Meanwhile, the company reported earnings of $0.54 per share in the third quarter. Revenue was $6.11 billion, slightly below the estimated‚ÄÇ$6.312 billion. However, despite the earnings gap, Square‚Äôs gross payment volume still rose 12% from a year earlier. According to market watchers, this integration will provide users and businesses with financial freedom through open systems. The Bitcoin market bounces back as institutional demand rises Jack Dorsey‚Äôs Block generated $1.97 billion in Bitcoin revenue for Q3. This is nearly one-third of its total revenues. However, Block‚Äôs Bitcoin costs dropped to $1.89 billion in Q3, though its 8,780 BTC balance sheet holdings booked a $59 million quarterly loss. Additionally, Kazakhstan plans to establish a $1 billion cryptocurrency reserve fund by 2026. It plans to use seized and repatriated assets plus proceeds from state mining. Meanwhile, the price of BTC is up by approximately 1.68% in the last 24 hours. Its trade volume is still up a big 39%, at $74 billion. The rise in trading volume may have been pushed by Strategy‚Äôs purchase, which added more Bitcoin to its portfolio. As reported by Cryptopolitan, Strategy purchased an additional 487 Bitcoin, worth approximately $50 million. This is the largest purchase the company has made since late September 2025, and it now holds a total of 641,692 BTC in its portfolio. Want your project in front of crypto‚Äôs top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

title: Wikipedia Demands AI Giants Stop Scraping and Use Paid API Instead
body: BitcoinWorld Wikipedia Demands AI Giants Stop Scraping and Use Paid API Instead In a bold move that could reshape how artificial intelligence companies access online knowledge, Wikipedia has issued a clear directive to AI developers: stop scraping our content and start using our paid API. This development comes as the nonprofit Wikimedia Foundation faces declining human traffic while AI bots increasingly drain server resources without contributing to the platform‚Äôs sustainability. Why Wikipedia‚Äôs AI Strategy Matters Now The Wikimedia Foundation recently revealed that AI bots caused unusually high traffic spikes in May and June 2025, with bots actively trying to evade detection systems. Meanwhile, human page views dropped 8% year-over-year, creating a perfect storm that threatens the encyclopedia‚Äôs long-term viability. This situation highlights the urgent need for a sustainable approach to Wikipedia AI content access. The Wikimedia Enterprise Solution for AI Companies Wikimedia Enterprise represents the foundation‚Äôs answer to the AI content access dilemma. This paid platform offers companies reliable, scalable access to Wikipedia‚Äôs vast knowledge base without overwhelming the nonprofit‚Äôs servers. The service ensures that: AI companies get clean, structured data through official channels Wikipedia‚Äôs servers aren‚Äôt taxed by excessive scraping The nonprofit receives financial support for its mission Content attribution remains clear and consistent The Real Cost of AI Scraping on Wikipedia Unauthorized AI scraping doesn‚Äôt just strain technical resources‚Äîit threatens Wikipedia‚Äôs very ecosystem. When AI companies extract content without proper attribution or support, they undermine the human contributors who create and maintain the knowledge. The foundation warns that with fewer visits to Wikipedia, fewer volunteers may grow and enrich content, and fewer individual donors may support this crucial work. Impact Area Before AI Scraping After AI Scraping Surge Human Traffic Stable growth 8% decrease year-over-year Server Load Predictable patterns Spikes from evasive AI bots Volunteer Engagement Consistent participation Potential decline risk How Generative AI Companies Can Respond Responsibly The Wikimedia Foundation isn‚Äôt just making demands‚Äîit‚Äôs providing clear guidelines for ethical generative AI development. Companies should: Use the official Wikimedia Enterprise API for large-scale access Provide clear attribution to human contributors Support Wikipedia‚Äôs nonprofit mission financially Ensure transparency about content sources The Critical Role of Proper API Access For AI companies seeking reliable knowledge integration, proper API access through Wikimedia Enterprise offers significant advantages over scraping. The paid service provides structured data feeds, technical support, and the assurance that access won‚Äôt be suddenly blocked due to bot detection systems. This reliability is crucial for companies building AI systems that depend on current, accurate information. What This Means for AI Development Wikipedia‚Äôs stance represents a watershed moment for the AI industry. As more content providers reconsider their relationships with AI companies, the era of free, unrestricted scraping may be ending. Companies that adapt early to paid, ethical content access models will likely face fewer disruptions and build more sustainable AI systems. FAQs: Wikipedia‚Äôs New AI Guidelines What is Wikimedia Enterprise? Wikimedia Enterprise is the Wikimedia Foundation‚Äôs paid API service that provides companies with reliable, scalable access to Wikipedia content while supporting the nonprofit‚Äôs mission. Which AI companies are affected by this change? All companies using generative AI that train on or access Wikipedia content, including major players in the AI industry, should consider transitioning to the official API. How does this impact Wikipedia‚Äôs nonprofit status? The Wikimedia Foundation remains a nonprofit, but Wikimedia Enterprise provides a sustainable revenue stream to support its operations amid declining human traffic. What happens if companies continue scraping? While Wikipedia hasn‚Äôt threatened legal action, continued scraping may lead to more sophisticated bot detection and potential access restrictions. Wikipedia‚Äôs call for responsible AI content access marks a crucial turning point in how technology companies interact with open knowledge resources. By choosing paid API access over uncontrolled scraping, AI developers can help ensure that the world‚Äôs largest encyclopedia continues to thrive in the artificial intelligence era. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features and institutional adoption. This post Wikipedia Demands AI Giants Stop Scraping and Use Paid API Instead first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Investing in RentStac (RNS) Today? Here‚Äôs How $10,000 Could Turn Into $800,000
body: As the DeFi sector heads into what analysts expect to be another strong market cycle in early 2026, investor sentiment is shifting away from speculative tokens and meme-driven hype. title: Stablecoins Are Booming ‚Äî And The Fed Thinks They Could Cut Rates
body: Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said growing demand for dollar-pegged stablecoins could push down interest rates , putting a new factor on the Fed‚Äôs radar. According to a speech he gave at the BCVC Summit on November 7, stablecoins that channel savings into dollar assets may raise the supply of loanable funds and lower the Neutral interest rate, or ‚ÄúR‚Äù star. Stablecoin Growth And Scale Based on reports compiled by Fed staff, private-sector estimates place stablecoin adoption between $1 trillion and $3 trillion by the end of the decade ‚Äî a jump large enough to matter for markets and policy. Miran compared the possible scale of stablecoin demand to the Fed‚Äôs own purchases during the COVID-era stimulus and noted that under $7 trillion in Treasury bills are outstanding today, making any major new buyer meaningful. How It Could Lower Rates Researchers have started to put numbers on the effect. Work cited in Miran‚Äôs remarks estimates stablecoins, if widely used and backed by US securities, might nudge interest rates down by as much as 40 basis points. That kind of shift in R rating would change what counts as a neutral policy stance and could prompt the Fed to set lower policy rates than otherwise. Big Buyers And Reserve Holdings Reports and working papers point to one tangible channel: where stablecoin issuers park their reserves. Evidence shows some large issuers have been big buyers of short-term Treasury bills. For example, one study found Tether held an estimated $98 billion in T-bills by Q1 2025, roughly 1.6% of outstanding T-bills, and that such buying has been linked to lower short-term yields. That suggests stablecoin flows can have real effects on front-end rates. Risks And Policy Choices Miran told listeners that regulatory clarity will shape the path forward. He praised proposals like the GENIUS Act for forcing issuers to hold safe, liquid dollar assets, but warned that how stablecoins are financed matters: if issuance simply repackages existing dollar holdings, the effect on loanable funds will be small. Policymakers must weigh the boost to dollar demand against possible strains on banks, money markets, and the Treasury market. Reports have disclosed that the scale and speed of adoption remain uncertain. If the higher forecasts play out, central bankers will need to consider stablecoin demand as part of the mix when setting rates. For investors and officials alike, the message is plain: stablecoins are not just a payments tool anymore. They are a potential macroeconomic force, and their growth will be watched closely by the Fed and other authorities. Featured image from Gemini, chart from TradingView
