title: Ethereum (ETH) Holds Strong as Analysts Target $4,400 Despite ETF Outflows
body: The cryptosphere is keeping a close eye on Ethereum (ETH), as the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap demonstrates resilience amid market shakes. Related Reading: MEXC Users At Risk Of Losing Their Crypto? Ex-Public Advisor Exposes ‚ÄòStructural Rot‚Äô While spot ETF outflows are causing concern in some quarters, underlying network fundamentals and technical charts are painting a cautiously optimistic picture, with analysts pointing to a potential move toward the $4,400 mark. Ethereum ETF Outflows and Institutional Sentiment Despite ETH‚Äôs recent price recovery, institutional sentiment appears to be on firmer ground even as exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to Ethereum record sizeable outflows. Data show that Ethereum spot ETFs suffered a net outflow of approximately $508 million over the week, marking one of the largest weekly withdrawals in their history. This mirrors a broader shift in investor behaviour: while traditional crypto-fund inflows have tapered, margins of institutional conviction remain steady. On the one hand, redemptions suggest a short-term cooling of enthusiasm for ETH amongst ETF investors. On the other hand, this rotation may reflect a more strategic recalibration rather than a wholesale withdrawal of institutional capital. ETH's price trends to the upside on the daily chart. Source: ETHUSD on Tradingview Strong ETH Price Support and Technical Setup From a price-action standpoint, Ethereum shows signs of stabilisation. After a sharp weekly drop of around 12 %, the asset has rebounded above the $3,400 level. Analysts have identified key resistance near $3,720, with breakout targets in sight at approximately $4,400 and a further extension toward $4,955. Key technical highlights include: Holding the $3,200‚Äì$3,350 liquidity zone as support before the rebound. The break of a bearish trend line near $3,350, alongside clearing the 50 % Fibonacci retracement of the recent decline. Momentum indicators, such as MACD and RSI, are entering bullish territory, suggesting that the upside could be favored if resistance levels are conquered. Network Fundamentals and Catalysts Beyond price movements, Ethereum‚Äôs on-chain fundamentals offer reason for optimism. While some metrics are cooling, the total value locked (TVL) in the network has fallen by roughly 24% in the past 30 days to around $74.2 billion. On the flip side, Ethereum‚Äôs revenue from applications hit record levels as recently as mid-October, driven by stable-coin activity and increasing usage of the network‚Äôs ‚Äúeconomic machine.‚Äù A key upcoming catalyst is the planned ‚ÄúFusaka‚Äù upgrade, scheduled for early December, which is expected to enhance scalability and security in the Ethereum network, potentially boosting long-term value drivers. Related Reading: Here Are The Bitcoin Whales That Have Been Dumping BTC And Crashing The Price While short-term challenges persist, including ETF outflows and macroeconomic uncertainty, the confluence of a strong technical setup, institutional interest, and network upgrades has led some analysts to feel comfortable pushing higher targets. Cover image from ChatGPT, ETHUSD chart on Tradingview

title: Pundit to‚ÄØXRP‚ÄØHolders: This Bullish History Is About to Happen Again
body: The crypto market stands at a potentially pivotal moment. Signals of fresh liquidity and policy‚Äëdriven stimulus are echoing through digital asset circles. Analysts are now pointing to macro moves that could reignite momentum for risk assets‚Äîincluding XRP. In a recent video clip circulating on X, commentator Levi Rietveld urged XRP holders to heed a specific policy announcement by President Donald J. Trump : ‚ÄúTrump just made a historic announcement, he is looking to bring back the stimulus checks. This is going to be so huge for XRP.‚Äù Rietveld‚Äôs commentary ties Trump‚Äôs proposed $2,000 ‚Äútariff dividend‚Äù to a new bull‚Äërun narrative for crypto. The Stimulus Plan and Its Market Implications President Trump announced that most Americans would receive a ‚Äúdividend of at least $2,000 a person (not including high‚Äëincome people)‚Äù funded by tariff revenue. The plan remains a proposal, requiring congressional approval and subject to legal review by the tariff authority. Analysts in crypto media immediately flagged this as a possible liquidity injection that could drive asset markets. F*CK!! ITS HAPPENING #XRP !! Comment ‚Äúknowledge‚Äù and I‚Äôll DM you access to my community! #crypto #ripple pic.twitter.com/4yANzRLVS9 ‚Äî Levi | Crypto Crusaders (@LeviRietveld) November 9, 2025 Why XRP Could Be a Beneficiary Rietveld‚Äôs bullish angle on XRP is rooted in the expectation that newly liberated consumer cash will find its way into risk assets. With crypto infrastructure stronger and investor appetite higher than during the 2020‚Äë21 stimulus era, XRP may be well‚Äëpositioned when fresh capital hits. Rietveld specifically linked the stimulus narrative to XRP‚Äôs utility and cross‚Äëborder payment prospects , arguing the conditions are favorable for out‚Äësized upside. Market Environment and Liquidity Context The last major wave of stimulus during the COVID‚Äë19 era coincided with the crypto bull run of 2020‚Äì21. Presently, policy signals include both direct payments and potential rate cuts, increasing the appeal of risk assets. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 The proposed tariff dividend gains traction as many households may receive relief, which could generate new flows into crypto holdings like XRP. Risks and Realistic Perspectives While the narrative is compelling, significant caveats remain. First, the plan remains unlegislated, and its funding mechanism (tariffs) is under legal scrutiny. Second, implementing the payments as tax credits rather than direct checks may blunt the expected injection of liquidity. In addition, any global liquidity surge could also raise inflation pressures and provoke a tighter monetary response‚Äîpotentially countering the bullish effect. Strategic Takeaways for XRP Holders For holders of XRP , the message is clear: monitor the policy process closely and be prepared, but remain grounded. If the tariff‚Äëdividend is approved and executed, it may catalyze a renewed leg up in crypto valuations. But investors must also weigh the legal, timing, and inflation risks that could temper outcomes. In closing, the combination of direct payments, enhanced crypto infrastructure, and a supportive policy backdrop presents one of the most intriguing setups in recent memory. For XRP holders, the question isn‚Äôt simply whether the narrative will play out‚Äîbut how well‚Äëpositioned you are before the wave hits. title: Visa, Mastercard strikes a revised settlement with retailers amid long-standing disagreements over high credit card processing fees
body: Today, Visa and Mastercard have struck a revised settlement with retailers after a judge rejected an earlier $30 billion deal to resolve long-standing disagreements over high credit card processing fees. The new agreement would allow slightly lower swipe fees, give retailers more freedom to accept specific cards, and marginally reduce swipe fees. The deal reached on Monday would put an end to twenty years of litigation. Merchants accused Visa and Mastercard of conspiring to violate U.S. antitrust laws, notably through the card networks‚Äô collection of ‚Äúswipe fees‚Äù to process transactions. Visa, Mastercard settlement offers merchants more flexibility According to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) report , the agreement grants retailers the freedom to decide whether to accept commercial and consumer credit cards independently. Merchants would have more freedom to take ‚Äústandard‚Äù and ‚Äúpremium‚Äù credit cards under consumer credit. However, merchants wouldn‚Äôt be able to distinguish between cards of the same level issued by various financial institutions. Mastercard and Visa agreed to provide a 10-point basis average system-wide effective interchange rate for U.S.-issued consumer credit and commercial credit transactions at U.S. merchant locations. Additionally, the interchange reduction will apply to specific U.S.-issued credit programs recognized under the Mastercard brand and is intended to function as a cap for a duration of five years. As part of the agreement, the networks agreed to implement a direct method of surcharging credit card transactions, giving merchants additional options. According to the SEC, these regulations, which replace standards that were revised in 2012, are intended to preserve fundamental consumer safeguards and openness. Standard consumer rates would be limited to 1.25% until the end of the agreement. Additionally, merchants would have additional possibilities to charge surcharges for credit card purchases. According to the U.S. National Retail Federation, swipe fees amounted $111.2 billion in the U.S. in 2024, up from $100.8 billion in 2023 and quadrupling the amount in 2009. Visa confirmed that the settlement offers meaningful relief, more flexibility, and options to control how it accepts payments from its customers to businesses of all sizes. According to Mastercard, companies and customers would have a better payment experience with greater flexibility, cheaper prices, and easier regulations, especially for smaller retailers. Notably, neither of the companies acknowledged any wrongdoing in relation to the plaintiffs‚Äô claims when they agreed to the deal. After the agreement is approved, all rule and practice modifications will take place, which is anticipated to happen most likely in late 2026 or early 2027. Judge rejects $30B card fee settlement The settlement will require approval by U.S. District Judge Margo Brodie in Brooklyn, who had previously rejected the $30 billion agreement in June 2024. The $30 billion accord would have reduced swipe costs by around 0.07 percentage points over five years, giving retailers additional leeway to apply surcharges. However, the judge stated that fees would continue to be high and that the $6 billion in yearly savings for retailers was ‚Äúpaltry‚Äù in comparison to what Visa and Mastercard might still charge. Brodie also criticized the agreement for imposing the ‚ÄúHonor All Cards‚Äù requirement on merchants, which mandates that they take all Visa and Mastercard cards or none at all. Additionally, merchants have long accused Visa and Mastercard of implementing ‚Äúanti-steering‚Äù regulations that prohibit companies from guiding clients toward less expensive payment methods. According to the Merchants Payments Coalition, the charge reduction was ‚Äúminuscule,‚Äù and Visa and Mastercard would be allowed to increase prices without any limitations once temporary cuts expired. The Merchants Payment Coalition claimed that merchants had ‚Äúno choice‚Äù but to accept rewards cards, which make up 85% of all cards issued. The Coalition added that banks could still shift cards into different categories, effectively requiring merchants to accept all cards. The reported settlement proposal comes as Congress is considering the Credit Card Competition Act in an attempt to bring competition into the system. title: Coinbase launches a new platform for retail investors to buy crypto tokens before exchange listings
body: Coinbase has launched a new crypto token sales platform that puts retail investors directly into early-stage deals, something Wall Street firms have long kept for themselves. The platform, revealed this week, allows individuals to buy new crypto tokens before they‚Äôre listed on the Coinbase exchange. According to Coinbase , this is the company‚Äôs latest attempt to grab more control of the crypto fundraising pipeline and pull retail buyers back into the game for the first time since 2018. Sales on the new platform will happen monthly, with one token launch per cycle. Users get a one-week window to send in purchase requests. An algorithm then decides how to spread out the tokens. This isn‚Äôt some lottery or insider deal. The company said the goal is to keep it fair and prevent the same people from snapping up everything every time. Buyers must be fully registered with Coinbase, follow all compliance rules, and fund their purchases in USD Coin, a stablecoin tied to the U.S. dollar and issued by Circle Internet Group. Investors must follow rules while issuers face vetting process Only users who are in good standing with Coinbase will be allowed to take part. If you‚Äôre not verified, you don‚Äôt get in. And if you plan to flip your tokens immediately for a quick gain, don‚Äôt expect to get as much allocation in the future. That‚Äôs straight from Scott Shapiro, head of trading at Coinbase, who explained that users who dump tokens right after a sale will get a lower allocation in the next round. The same goes for project founders. They and their affiliates won‚Äôt be able to sell any tokens, privately or publicly, for six months after launch. That applies across the board. The process for launching tokens on the platform is just as strict. The company said crypto projects will be screened based on how much interest they have from users, the track record of their teams, how the tokens will work economically, and how they‚Äôll be released over time. No more ‚Äújust white paper‚Äù launches like in 2017. The first token to go live on the platform will come from Monad, a crypto startup that plans to launch its token next week. Once a token goes through this new system, Coinbase said it intends to list it on the exchange, giving it exposure to a broader user base. The platform will be open to most global users at launch, and Coinbase said it plans to roll it out to more regions later. Platform revives public crypto sales for U.S. retail investors This is the first time since the ICO crash of 2018 that retail users in the U.S. are being invited back into public token offerings. Back then, billions of dollars were thrown at crypto startups that had nothing but ideas. No products. No accountability. That whole scene collapsed when prices tanked and regulators came for everyone. Coinbase is trying to bring that same excitement back, but with guardrails. Scott said that things are different now. ‚ÄúIn 2017, the market was so young that no one really had a deep crypto resume before launching a token,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúNow, projects and their teams have more to show than just a white paper.‚Äù The platform is part of a bigger plan for Coinbase. The company has been looking to move away from relying too much on crypto trading fees, which have dropped across the industry. By charging projects to launch their tokens and growing the number of coins available to trade, Coinbase is aiming to bring in new revenue streams while luring users who‚Äôve been going to offshore platforms. The launch also adds to the company‚Äôs push to become an ‚Äúeverything exchange‚Äù‚Äînot just a place to trade Bitcoin or Ethereum, but a one-stop platform for financial services built around crypto. title: Coinbase Revives Retail Token Sales With New Regulated Offering Platform
body: Coinbase is reintroducing U.S. retail investors to regulated crypto fundraising through a new platform dedicated to primary token offerings, marking the first such opportunity since the 2018 ICO boom. The American exchange announced it will launch the initiative later this month, aiming to restore public participation in early-stage crypto projects under strict compliance controls. The first token to debut on the new platform will be from Monad, a blockchain protocol whose sale will run from November 17 to 22, as Bitzo reported. Coinbase plans to host roughly one token sale per month going forward, creating a structured, recurring schedule for new digital asset launches. A Fairer Model for Token Distribution Each token sale will be open for one week, during which verified users can submit purchase requests. Once the sale period ends, Coinbase‚Äôs allocation system will prioritize smaller buyers first, gradually expanding to fill larger orders. This approach, the company said, is meant to ensure broader participation and prevent large investors from dominating the process. Coinbase has also added a mechanism to discourage rapid speculative selling. Users who immediately offload their tokens after launch will see their allocation potential reduced in future offerings. The exchange described the system as a way to promote fairer distribution and reduce ‚Äúdumping‚Äù behavior that has historically plagued public token sales. Compliance and Settlement in USDC Only verified Coinbase users will be eligible to participate, and all purchases will be settled in USDC, the dollar-backed stablecoin issued by Circle. Token issuers listing through the platform will face a six-month lockup period, preventing project founders and affiliates from selling or transferring tokens on secondary markets without Coinbase‚Äôs prior approval and public disclosure. This restriction aims to maintain price stability and protect investors from insider selling shortly after launch. Participation will be free for retail buyers, but token issuers will pay a fee based on the total amount of USDC raised, along with any associated listing costs. Renewed Access for U.S. Retail Investors The move represents a major milestone for the U.S. crypto sector, where retail access to regulated public token offerings has been virtually nonexistent since 2018. Coinbase‚Äôs regulated approach seeks to fill a long-standing gap between private fundraising rounds‚Äîtypically reserved for venture capitalists‚Äîand the broader investing public. By implementing compliance safeguards and transparent rules, the platform could set a precedent for how token sales are conducted in the United States going forward. Remembering the ICO Boom and Its Collapse Coinbase‚Äôs new offering arrives years after the spectacular rise and fall of the Initial Coin Offering (ICO) era. ICOs emerged in 2017 as a novel method for blockchain startups to raise capital directly from the public by selling newly minted tokens. By the first half of 2018, ICOs had raised an estimated $13.7 billion , more than double the total collected in 2017. However, the boom quickly attracted regulatory attention. In 2017, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) signaled that some tokens could qualify as securities under the Howey test , bringing them under existing investment laws. A 2018 report by Ernst & Young examined over 140 major ICOs and revealed that 86% of tokens were trading below their launch prices within a year, while nearly a third had lost almost all their value. The combination of regulatory crackdowns, investor losses, and a deep crypto bear market effectively ended the ICO frenzy. Coinbase‚Äôs Attempt to Modernize the ICO Model By introducing transparency, compliance oversight, and anti-dumping mechanisms, Coinbase appears to be reviving the ICO model with institutional-grade safeguards. If successful, the platform could usher in a new era of compliant token fundraising, bridging the gap between the innovation of crypto‚Äôs early days and the regulatory expectations of today‚Äôs markets. Earlier this month, Coinbase clashed with several US banks over a key stablecoin interest rule as part of the recently passed GENIUS Act.

title: Early Buyers Believe This $0.035 Token Could Be the Best Crypto Investment Before 2026

A DeFi Ecosystem Constructed to be Open and Efficient Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a decentralized protocol, developed to enhance the functionality of on-chain markets. It is a hybrid of automation, transparency and control by users using smart contracts that govern all transactions. It is aimed at ensuring that decentralized finance is smoother and safer to both lenders and borrowers. The model of Mutuum Finance comes with a provision of Peer-to-Contract (P2C) lending markets where users may deposit assets into common liquidity markets and receive back a yield. Once a user deposits tokens, such as ETH or USDT, they are issued with mtTokens, or a digital receipt, which earns interest automatically whenever a borrower uses the liquidity. In addition to the pooled model, Mutuum Finance will also roll out a Peer-to-peer (P2P) marketplace whereby users can come up with custom loan arrangements. The borrowers will be able to choose the rates and terms that reflect their risk preference, and the system-permitted parameters such as Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratios and liquidation limits facilitate the selection of the terms and rates. The liquidation system of the platform helps in closing the over stretched positions automatically to save the lenders. Growth, Demand and Metrics The presale of Mutuum Finance has been widely discussed as one of the DeFi events of 2025. The project has accumulated over $18.55 million in the first place and has drawn over 17,850 holders. The total number of MUTM token supply is 4 billion, with 45.5% (approximately 1.82 billion) of it being allocated to presale. As the presale started in early 2025, the token price started at $0.01 in Phase 1 and is now standing at $0.035 in Phase 6, which is a 250% rise. The launch price is pegged at $0.06 which is another progress in an upward direction as the project moves towards possible top-tier exchange listings. All of our phases are fixed-allocation-model, that is, when all the tokens in that phase have been sold, the next one commences at a higher price. Phase 6 is already more than 85% sold and the pressure is mounting with supply becoming tight. The increased involvement indicates the high demand of this new crypto. The V1 will have liquidity pools to lenders and borrowers, mtTokens to deposits and debt tokens to borrowers and a liquidator bot to keep the system in balance. Since inception, the team has been very keen on security. Also, the team operates a bug bounty program of $50,000 to encourage any code vulnerabilities that may be ethically reported prior to the mainnet release. According to the market observers, such measures would boost investor trust, since transparency and security continue to be the main mantra in the growth plan of the project. Long-term Catalysts The other fundamental element of the roadmap of Mutuum Finance is the creation of USD-pegged stablecoin, which is embedded within the lending protocol. title: Russia holds nearly 10% of global rare-earth reserves but produces just 0.64% of supply
body: Russia holds one of the largest rare-earth deposits on Earth, but it barely contributes to global production. This comes at a time when demand for these minerals is exploding across industries that make electric vehicles, wind turbines, advanced electronics, and defense systems. According to CNBC, President Vladimir Putin last week ordered officials in Moscow to finish a full road map by December 1 for the long-term extraction and processing of rare and rare-earth metals. That order was issued inside the Kremlin, as the government tries to regain ground in a field where others moved earlier and faster. The United States Geological Survey estimates there are around 110 million tonnes of rare-earth deposits worldwide. China controls around 44 million tonnes, followed by Brazil with 21 million tonnes, while India and Australia hold significant shares as well. Myanmar holds large, heavy rare-earth deposits, but the size is not officially known. Russia is believed to have the fifth-largest reserves, totaling roughly 3.8 million tonnes. That is larger than the United States, which is estimated to have around 1.9 million tonnes. Yet despite this advantage, Russia produced only about 2,500 metric tons this year, or roughly 0.64% of global output. Moscow orders expansion plan as demand rises Putin‚Äôs government is now preparing to expand production. The effort comes as global supply chains tighten, especially after China limited exports of rare-earth materials in reaction to U.S. tariffs . Those limits were paused after an agreement between Donald Trump, now back in the White House, and Xi Jinping, where China agreed to suspend controls for one year in exchange for reduced fentanyl-related tariffs. Trump has also explored securing rare-earth resources in Ukraine, where deposits lie mostly in the south and east of the country, areas partially occupied by Russian forces. He has also repeatedly shown interest in resource-rich Greenland. Aware of that, Putin stated publicly that the country is open to joint projects with foreign partners to extract and process its rare-earth metals. Willis Thomas, principal consultant at CRU Group, said Russia has mined rare metals for decades but is now trying to reposition itself. Thomas said, ‚ÄúThe U.S. is scrambling for a need. Russians are scrambling for an opportunity.‚Äù That opportunity, however, depends on the quality of deposits and the transparency of geological reporting. Earlier this year, the Natural Resources Ministry in Moscow claimed the country has reserves of 15 rare-earth metals totaling 28.5 million tonnes, which is far higher than U.S. Geological Survey figures. Thomas said some reserves may be of lower quality, while others may be undisclosed entirely. He said the only reason a government would reveal full geological breakdowns is to raise outside capital. Decision between China and the U.S. remains unresolved A major question now is whether Russia strengthens ties with China or seeks development deals with Western partners. Thomas explained that mining is the simple part. Processing, separation, and finding buyers is where China dominates, handling roughly 69% of global rare-earth refining. Russia has already expanded supply chains with Beijing and could become one of several raw-ore suppliers, alongside Myanmar, Malaysia, and Laos. China has been increasing imports of raw materials to maintain output as some of its domestic deposits decline in grade. The option to partner with the U.S. is complicated by the war in Ukraine and strained relations between Trump and Putin. Trump recently met leaders from five Central Asian nations to discuss critical minerals and said expanding American supply chains is a key priority. Piyush Goel, a critical metals analyst at CRU, said Western companies may refuse to buy material from Russia while the war continues. That would push the country closer to China instead, even if that means selling with no pricing advantage. Goel said China‚Äôs processing and separation network is so advanced that Russia could position itself to fill future supply gaps when Chinese deposits decline. title: U.S. Government Shutdown Relief Lifts BTC Above $105k, ETF Outflows Persist
body: Risk appetite improved after Washington moved toward ending the federal shutdown, and crypto rose with the shift in tone. The Senate cleared a procedural hurdle on a funding package that would restore agency operations and provide back pay if enacted. Reuters reported the advance on November 10, 2025. Bitcoin reclaimed levels north of $105,000 on relief buying while sentiment gauges stayed cautious, with the Crypto Fear & Greed Index lodged in the ‚Äúfear‚Äù zone. The split between price and mood captures a market reacting to policy progress yet still managing damage from recent drawdowns. Bitcoin Price (Source: CoinMarketCap) Policy Relief Meets Heavy Outflows Listed product flows set a cooler backdrop. Farside Investors‚Äô tracker shows roughly $1.2 billion in net outflows from U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs over the latest week, a sum that has frequently absorbed rebounds and limited follow-through during New York hours. Reuters noted that a shutdown resolution lowers near-term policy noise, which typically steadies risk positioning. That effect can help liquidity providers rebuild depth; however, persistent ETF redemptions can offset those gains by recycling supply into the market during rallies. Glassnode‚Äôs previous ‚ÄúWeek On-Chain‚Äù review described long-term holders as net distributors in strength since late October. When seasoned wallets sell into bounces at the same time ETFs see outflows, cash demand needs to expand to absorb both channels before any base becomes durable. A clean finish to the funding bill would remove a near-term overhang. If that outcome pairs with slowing ETF redemptions, relief can extend beyond a single session and broaden to more trading windows. WLFI and Official Trump climb after Senate passes funding bill, easing shutdown fears and lifting sentiment across altcoin markets. #shutdown #trump #altcoin https://t.co/quXGxOj3fp ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) November 10, 2025 Flows, Depth, And The Price Path Basis and funding normalized during the pullback, which often marks a reset rather than a trend change. The next phase depends on cash inflows. A turn from net outflows to net inflows in the U.S. spot ETFs would indicate that fresh demand is exceeding distribution. Order-book quality provides a second check: rebuilt depth on BTC pairs across top venues during London and New York sessions tends to reduce gap risk and helps rallies survive headline swings. Market participants track cumulative depth bands to judge whether liquidity is returning evenly. With the good news kicking off a new week, sentiment remains cautious. The Fear and Greed Index in the 20s has historically coincided with two-way trade, where intraday spikes fade unless supported by heavier spot volumes. Stronger closes on days with firmer volumes would mark a healthier repair than squeezes driven by derivatives. A U.S. government shutdown deal can steady rate-cut expectations at the margin and calm collateral stress, but crypto direction has increasingly hinged on whether cash products receive steady allocations rather than on futures-led bursts alone. THE MAN WHO DOES IT ALL. pic.twitter.com/n5RJFDx5RO ‚Äî The White House (@WhiteHouse) November 10, 2025 Beyond Bitcoin: ETH, SOL, XRP Reads Ethereum tracked the bounce with slightly wider percentage moves, a pattern seen when DeFi-linked activity lifts realized volatility. Flows into or out of ETH-focused vehicles will help determine whether the move extends beyond relief, especially if exchange balances continue to edge lower on spot demand. Solana has drawn attention from product development and discretionary traders. Weekly ETF flow roundups showed relative resilience in SOL-linked vehicles compared with BTC and ETH during recent sessions, hinting that breadth can return if Bitcoin steadies and redemptions slow. XRP often amplifies shifts in majors during stressed weeks. A calmer BTC tape with better depth typically narrows XRP intraday ranges and reduces slippage around event headlines. The near-term test is straightforward. If U.S. spot ETF outflows ease while the shutdown deal moves to signature and long-term holder distribution slows, bidders can build a base with less friction. Until those series turn together, rebounds will continue to meet supply at familiar levels. The post U.S. Government Shutdown Relief Lifts BTC Above $105k, ETF Outflows Persist appeared first on Cryptonews .

The Future of Smart Entertainment is Here The integration of Google Gemini into the Google TV ecosystem represents a monumental leap forward in home entertainment. With advanced voice control and a sophisticated AI assistant that understands context and nuance, your television becomes more than just a screen‚Äîit becomes your entertainment concierge, your educational partner, and your smart home command center. title: Bitcoin‚Äôs Taproot Supply Falls 3% Since 2024 as Quantum Risk Fears Rise
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs Taproot address supply has fallen by roughly 3% since January 2024, according to on-chain analyst Willy Woo. The decline is sparking debate across the crypto community, with experts split on whether long-term holders (LTHs) are quietly selling or simply repositioning their funds amid rising concerns about quantum computing threats. Bitcoin Housecleaning or Whale Sell-Off? Data shared by Woo on X shows Taproot addresses, Bitcoin‚Äôs latest transaction format, trending downward since early 2024. The analyst explained that this shift might not signal panic selling but rather ‚Äúhousecleaning‚Äù by early holders, who are moving BTC to more secure or custodial setups. ‚ÄúWhat constitutes an ‚ÄòOG dump‚Äô is simply BTC moving out of an address untouched for seven years,‚Äù Woo wrote, adding that on-chain data can misinterpret such activity as selling when it often reflects reorganization or collateral posting. Fellow analysts, including Charles Edwards of Capriole Investments, countered that large-scale movements by early Bitcoin holders usually correlate with sell pressure. ‚ÄúWe know this empirically,‚Äù he said, pointing to colorful on-chain charts showing hundreds of millions in old BTC moving in 2025. Others, however, supported Woo‚Äôs view. On-chain researcher Shanaka Anslem Perera noted that around 470,000 BTC, worth about $50 billion, has left dormancy this year, but much of that movement involved custody rotations and treasury placements rather than market sales. ‚ÄúThe story is not capitulation,‚Äù he wrote, ‚Äúrather it‚Äôs custody evolution, collateralization, and an institutional catcher‚Äôs mitt.‚Äù Quantum Fears Drive Custody Shifts The timing of these Taproot withdrawals has coincided with growing unease over Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term resilience against quantum computing attacks. In July 2025, developers proposed ‚ÄúP2QRH,‚Äù a quantum-resistant address type aimed at protecting up to 4 million vulnerable BTC, roughly 25% of the supply, from future key exposure risks. The urgency grew after Project Eleven launched its Q-Day Prize challenge in April, offering 1 BTC to anyone who could crack Bitcoin‚Äôs cryptography using Shor‚Äôs algorithm before April 2026. The experiment, designed to test whether real quantum hardware can threaten Bitcoin‚Äôs elliptic curve encryption, reignited debate about how soon the network might face real cryptographic stress. Hardware makers are also responding , with Trezor announcing the Safe 7 wallet, its first ‚Äúquantum-ready‚Äù self-custody device, in October. The post Bitcoin‚Äôs Taproot Supply Falls 3% Since 2024 as Quantum Risk Fears Rise appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Mantle Partners with Anchorage Digital to Deliver Secure Institutional Custody for $MNT on Ethereum
body: BitcoinWorld Mantle Partners with Anchorage Digital to Deliver Secure Institutional Custody for $MNT on Ethereum Mantle , a leading distribution and liquidity layer for real-world assets (RWAs), built on Ethereum Layer 2 network, announced that its native token, $MNT (on Ethereum), is now supported by Anchorage Digital‚Äô s secure custody and self-custody wallet Porto. The announcement marks a transformative step in making Mantle‚Äôs on-chain economy accessible to regulated financial institutions, enabling them to hold $MNT on Ethereum directly on their balance sheets or treasuries through a secure and compliant custody solution. This unlocks global participation in one of the largest and fastest-growing Layer 2 ecosystems. $MNT serves as the governance and utility token powering the Mantle network, enabling holders to participate in protocol governance, access decentralized applications, and engage with Mantle‚Äôs expanding DeFi ecosystem. With Anchorage Digital‚Äôs custody solution, $MNT holders can now hold $MNT on Ethereum as a treasury asset while leveraging Anchorage Digital‚Äôs comprehensive suite of custody services. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre excited to enable institutions to access Mantle‚Äôs ecosystem through a trusted partner with a strong reputation for institutional-grade security,‚Äù said Emily Bao, Key Advisor to Mantle. ‚ÄúGlobal institutions can now access $MNT on Ethereum through Anchorage Digital, opening the door to broader participation in Mantle‚Äôs on-chain economy. This partnership reinforces our commitment to building institutional-grade infrastructure that bridges traditional finance with decentralized innovation.‚Äù ‚ÄúBacking the Mantle ecosystem is exactly what we were built for ‚Äî giving institutions a secure, regulated way to participate in the next generation of blockchain networks,‚Äù said Nathan McCauley, Co-Founder and CEO of Anchorage Digital . ‚ÄúOur job is to make innovation safe to touch, and Mantle is a perfect example of where that matters.‚Äù Through Anchorage Digital‚Äôs advanced infrastructure, Mantle is bridging the gap between cutting-edge blockchain technology and institutional capital, reinforcing $MNT‚Äôs position as an institutional-ready asset. This partnership underscores Mantle‚Äôs dedication to enhancing liquidity, market depth, and institutional adoption‚Äîultimately strengthening the foundation for broader participation in Mantle‚Äôs RWA economy and unlocking new opportunities for global digital asset engagement. About Mantle Mantle positions itself as the premier distribution layer and gateway for institutions and TradFi to connect with onchain liquidity and access real-world assets, powering how real-world finance flows. With over $4B+ in community-owned assets, Mantle combines credibility, liquidity and scalability with institutional-grade infrastructure to support large-scale adoption. The ecosystem is anchored by $MNT within Bybit, and built out through core ecosystem projects like mETH, fBTC, MI4 and more. This is complemented by Mantle Network‚Äôs partnerships with leading issuers and protocols such as Ethena USDe, Ondo USDY, OP-Succinct and EigenLayer. For more information about Mantle, please visit: mantle.xyz For more social updates, please follow: Mantle Official X & Mantle Community Channel This post Mantle Partners with Anchorage Digital to Deliver Secure Institutional Custody for $MNT on Ethereum first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Brazil‚Äôs classification of stablecoin transactions as foreign exchange operations will take effect in February 2026
body: Brazil‚Äôs central bank released on Monday, November 10, long-awaited rules for virtual assets that will affect how stablecoins are classified in a framework that extends the country‚Äôs existing anti-money-laundering, counter-terrorism, and consumer protection laws to virtual-asset service providers (VASPs) and foreign-exchange (Forex) operators. According to the central bank, any transaction that involves virtual assets pegged to fiat currencies will be treated as a foreign exchange operation. The same classification will apply to international payments or transfers made using virtual assets, including those carried out through cards or other electronic payment methods. The regulations are expected to come into effect in February 2026. It is one of the first major moves the central bank has made towards regulating crypto assets and stablecoins since 2022, when the country approved a legal framework for cryptocurrencies, but its implementation rested on complementary regulations that the central bank was expected to provide. Central bank introduces new rules Brazilian authorities have been monitoring the surge in stablecoin transactions, with central bank governor Gabriel Galipolo describing the rise as ‚Äúsignificant and worrying.‚Äù Earlier this year, Galipolo said around 90% of Brazil‚Äôs crypto transaction volume is tied to stablecoins, many of which are being used for payments or to bypass traditional financial systems that are more tightly regulated and taxed. Policymakers say that while stablecoins are less volatile than cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, their increased adoption has created regulatory blind spots. The central bank said it wants to ensure that these assets are no longer used as channels for illicit transfers, tax evasion, or money laundering. ‚ÄúNew rules will reduce the scope for scams, fraud, and the use of virtual asset markets for money laundering,‚Äù said Gilneu Vivan, the central bank‚Äôs director of regulation, at a press conference announcing the measures . Regulatory alignment and compliance challenge The classification of stablecoins as forex operations means that each transaction will now need to adhere to the same disclosure and compliance standards that apply to conventional cross-border currency dealings. This change could increase compliance costs for crypto firms operating in Brazil, but it also provides some form of legitimacy to the sector as it clarifies how virtual assets fit into the national financial framework. Last month, Roberto Campos Neto, the central bank governor, shared that they should be regulating the stablecoins and asset tokenizations next year, and this latest regulatory rollout seems to be the first step in that direction. Jurisdictions roll out stablecoin regulations on a case-by-case basis The central bank‚Äôs move positions Brazil among the first large economies to treat stablecoins as foreign exchange instruments, a step that could influence how other jurisdictions deal with similar challenges. Various countries continue to regulate stablecoins and treat them according to their own realities. The US landmark GENIUS Act touches on reserves and anti-money laundering programs. The European Union has the Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA); Hong Kong also launched its stablecoin ordinance in August. Singapore and the United Arab Emirates also have frameworks and regulations in place for stablecoins. The stablecoin market is mostly dominated by coins pegged to the US dollar, and Brazil treating stablecoins as forex speaks to this fact. Many nations are trying to work around this by issuing their own e-currencies or stablecoins pegged to their own local currencies. Join Bybit now and claim a $50 bonus in minutes

title: Ethereum Finds Structural Support at $3.4K On Strong Whale Bid ‚Äì Bulls Target $4,500 Next
body: Strong bids from Ethereum whales have triggered a price recovery, prompting ETH to find structural support around the $3,400 level. ETH bulls are now back in control, targeting the $4,500 resistance as the next stop for continuation of the recovery. Analysts at CryptoQuant have observed that since the October 10 sell-off, the Spot Average Order Size metric for Ethereum has increased, a trend that has historically preceded local bottoms and early accumulation phases. Ethereum Whale Bid Flashes Local Bottom Across previous cycles, analysts point out that similar whale accumulation has marked the start of trend reversals or late-stage compression phases before major upswings. Source: CryptoQuant ‚ÄúIf this behavior persists and the $3-$3.4K region holds as structural support, Ethereum may be entering a low-volatility accumulation zone, setting up for a potential final bullish impulse toward the upper range of $4.5K‚Äì$4.8K.‚Äù Ethereum treasury companies have topped the list of institutional whales accumulating Ether to keep its bullish structure intact. In a recent company report, leading Ethereum treasury firm Bitmine Immersion Technologies revealed that it now owns 2.9% of the ETH token supply. The company‚Äôs Ethereum holdings now stand at 3,505,723 ETH, worth approximately $12 billion. BitMine provided its latest holdings update for Nov 10th, 2025: $13.2 billion in total crypto + "moonshots": -3,505,723 ETH at $3,639 per ETH (Bloomberg) ‚Äì 192 Bitcoin (BTC) ‚Äì $61 million stake in Eightco Holdings (NASDAQ: ORBS) (‚Äúmoonshots‚Äù) and ‚Äì unencumbered‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Bitmine (NYSE-BMNR) $ETH (@BitMNR) November 10, 2025 Other publicly listed companies are also accumulating Ethereum. On November 10, Canadian-listed company Republic Technologies announced a $100 million convertible note financing, intended to expand its Ethereum staking and reserve operations. Other Nasdaq-listed companies like Sharplink Gaming , The Ether Machine, Bit Digital, and ETHZilla all hold over $6 billion worth of Ethereum, per CoinGecko Tom Lee Says ‚ÄúBest of Ethereum About to Come‚Äù as Q4 Momentum Builds Thomas ‚ÄúTom‚Äù Lee of Fundstrat, chairman of BitMine, said that ‚ÄúThe recent dip in ETH prices presented an attractive opportunity and BitMine increased its ETH purchases this week.‚Äù Tom Lee believes that the best of Ethereum is about to come as the company keeps accumulating what it believes is the ‚Äútokenization layer‚Äù for Wall Street‚Äôs transition from TradFi to the on-chain economy. Bitmine acquired 110,288 $ETH in the past week https://t.co/c176vY9GsR ‚Äî Thomas (Tom) Lee (not drummer) FSInsight.com (@fundstrat) November 10, 2025 ‚ÄúThe fourth quarter is seasonally strong for crypto and equity prices, and historically encourages investors to increase ‚Äòopen interest.‚Äô Therefore, associated trading volumes should improve in coming weeks,‚Äù he added. Ethereum whales are now entering long setups in anticipation of a massive rally. An insider whale known for his 100% win rate is now adding more to his ETH long position, with order size now worth $194.3 million. This adds to the conviction from other bulls that ETH is heading to the $4,500-$4,800 range. ETH Eyes $5,058 if $3,520 Support Holds The Ethereum (ETH/USD) daily chart shows the formation of a potential double-bottom pattern, a classic bullish reversal sign. The two labeled lows (‚ÄúBottom 1‚Äù and ‚ÄúBottom 2‚Äù) suggest that buyers have defended the $3,500‚Äì$3,520 region twice, indicating strong demand at that zone. The neckline of the pattern aligns near the descending trendline resistance, which ETH appears to be testing after a brief breakout attempt. The ascending green trendline from the previous rally acts as structural support, and price reclaiming this level reinforces bullish sentiment. Source: TradingView Additionally, the Fibonacci retracement levels show multiple resistance targets at $3,888, $4,069, and $4,261, with a broader breakout target projected toward $5,058 if momentum sustains. Volume activity shows accumulation near the second bottom, a typical sign of buyers stepping back in after exhaustion of selling pressure. Overall, the chart setup leans bullish. If Ethereum can hold above $3,520 and break decisively above $3,800, it could confirm the double-bottom breakout and aim for the $4,200‚Äì$5,000 range. The post Ethereum Finds Structural Support at $3.4K On Strong Whale Bid ‚Äì Bulls Target $4,500 Next appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Critical Stopgap Budget Vote Faces Uncertain Future as Senate Leader Expresses Doubts
body: BitcoinWorld Critical Stopgap Budget Vote Faces Uncertain Future as Senate Leader Expresses Doubts In a dramatic development that could shake government operations, Senate Republican Leader John Thune has cast serious doubt on whether today‚Äôs crucial stopgap budget vote will proceed as planned. This uncertainty surrounding the stopgap budget vote creates immediate concerns about potential government disruptions and economic impacts. Why Is This Stopgap Budget Vote So Critical? The stopgap budget vote represents a temporary funding measure designed to prevent government shutdowns. However, when this stopgap budget vote faces uncertainty, it triggers concerns across multiple sectors. Government agencies, federal employees, and contractors all depend on the certainty that comes with successful budget approvals. Leader Thune‚Äôs comments highlight the political challenges in reaching consensus. The stopgap budget vote requires bipartisan support, and current divisions make the outcome unpredictable. This uncertainty affects more than just political negotiations‚Äîit impacts real people and services. What Are the Immediate Consequences of Vote Uncertainty? When a stopgap budget vote hangs in the balance, several critical areas face immediate risk: Government operations could face partial shutdowns Federal employees might experience payment delays Essential services could be disrupted Market stability may be affected The timing of this stopgap budget vote uncertainty couldn‚Äôt be more significant. Many government programs operate on tight deadlines, and any delay in funding approval creates cascading effects throughout the system. How Does This Stopgap Budget Vote Impact Broader Economic Stability? Beyond immediate government operations, the uncertainty surrounding this stopgap budget vote sends ripples through financial markets. Investors monitor these developments closely because government stability directly influences economic confidence. The stopgap budget vote serves as a barometer for political cooperation and fiscal responsibility. Historical patterns show that when stopgap budget votes face delays or uncertainty, market volatility often increases. This particular stopgap budget vote carries additional weight given current economic conditions and global uncertainties. What Solutions Could Break the Impasse? Several approaches could resolve the stopgap budget vote uncertainty: Bipartisan negotiations to address key concerns Modified legislation that addresses opposition points Extended deadlines for more comprehensive discussions Compromise provisions that satisfy multiple stakeholders The path forward for this stopgap budget vote requires political will and practical compromise. Both parties recognize the severe consequences of failure, which may drive last-minute agreements. Conclusion: The High Stakes of Budget Uncertainty The uncertainty surrounding today‚Äôs stopgap budget vote represents more than just political maneuvering‚Äîit reflects broader challenges in governance and fiscal management. As Senator Thune‚Äôs comments demonstrate, even routine budgetary processes can become unpredictable. The resolution of this stopgap budget vote will signal either political cooperation or continued division, with real consequences for millions of Americans who depend on consistent government operations and services. Frequently Asked Questions What is a stopgap budget vote? A stopgap budget vote approves temporary funding to keep government operations running when full-year budgets aren‚Äôt finalized, preventing shutdowns. Why is today‚Äôs stopgap budget vote uncertain? Senate Republican Leader John Thune indicated insufficient consensus exists among lawmakers to guarantee the vote will proceed as scheduled. What happens if the stopgap budget vote fails? Government agencies could face partial shutdowns, federal employees might not get paid, and essential services could be disrupted. How often do stopgap budget votes occur? Stopgap measures typically happen several times per year when Congress cannot agree on full-year funding bills by deadlines. Can the stopgap budget vote be rescheduled? Yes, congressional leaders can reschedule the vote, but delays create uncertainty and potential service interruptions. Who decides if the stopgap budget vote proceeds? Senate leadership, in consultation with both parties, determines the voting schedule based on legislative support and urgency. Found this analysis of the uncertain stopgap budget vote helpful? Your shares help spread awareness about how political decisions affect everyday Americans. title: Revolutionary Crypto ETF Staking Guidance: US Treasury Unveils Clear Path for Investors
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Crypto ETF Staking Guidance: US Treasury Unveils Clear Path for Investors Exciting news for cryptocurrency enthusiasts! The US Treasury Department has just dropped a game-changing announcement that could transform how everyday investors participate in crypto ETF staking. Treasury Secretary Scott Besent revealed new guidance that clarifies the rules for cryptocurrency ETFs and staking rewards. What Does This Crypto ETF Staking Guidance Mean for You? The new rules create a straightforward framework for retail investors to engage in crypto ETF staking. This guidance addresses previous uncertainties that made many hesitant to participate. Now, investors can confidently explore staking opportunities through regulated ETF products. This development represents a significant step toward mainstream cryptocurrency adoption. The IRS and Treasury Department have worked together to provide much-needed clarity. Their collaboration ensures that investors understand their tax obligations and legal protections. Key Benefits of the New Staking Framework The updated crypto ETF staking guidance offers several advantages for investors: Clear regulatory compliance ‚Äì No more guessing about legal requirements Simplified tax reporting ‚Äì Straightforward documentation for staking rewards Enhanced investor protection ‚Äì Regulated environment reduces risks Accessible participation ‚Äì Lower barriers for retail investors How Will Crypto ETF Staking Change Investment Strategies? This guidance opens up new possibilities for portfolio diversification. Investors can now incorporate crypto ETF staking into their long-term strategies with confidence. The rules specifically address reward-sharing mechanisms, making it easier to understand potential returns. Moreover, the framework encourages more financial institutions to develop staking-enabled ETF products. This increased competition could lead to better terms and lower fees for investors participating in crypto ETF staking programs. What Challenges Does This Guidance Solve? Before this announcement, crypto ETF staking existed in a regulatory gray area. Many investors avoided staking due to uncertainty about tax treatment and legal compliance. The new guidance eliminates these concerns by providing specific rules and requirements. The Treasury Department‚Äôs proactive approach demonstrates growing institutional recognition of cryptocurrency‚Äôs importance. This move could accelerate the development of more sophisticated crypto investment products featuring advanced staking capabilities. Actionable Insights for Investors If you‚Äôre considering crypto ETF staking, here are practical steps to take: Research ETF providers offering staking features Understand the specific reward structures Consult with tax professionals about reporting requirements Start with small investments to test the waters The Future of Crypto ETF Staking Looks Bright This guidance marks a turning point for cryptocurrency regulation. The Treasury Department‚Äôs clear stance on crypto ETF staking creates a foundation for future innovation. We can expect more sophisticated products and services to emerge in response to this regulatory clarity. The announcement also signals growing government acceptance of cryptocurrency as a legitimate asset class. This validation could encourage more traditional investors to explore crypto ETF staking opportunities they previously avoided. Frequently Asked Questions What is crypto ETF staking? Crypto ETF staking involves participating in proof-of-stake networks through exchange-traded funds, allowing investors to earn rewards while maintaining liquidity through traditional investment vehicles. How do the new rules affect existing staking positions? The guidance provides clarity for both new and existing staking activities. Investors should review their current positions to ensure compliance with the updated requirements. Are there any restrictions on who can participate? The rules primarily benefit retail investors by creating clear pathways for participation, though specific ETF products may have their own eligibility requirements. How are staking rewards taxed under the new guidance? The guidance clarifies that staking rewards through ETFs follow standard income tax rules, providing consistency with other investment income reporting. When do these rules take effect? The guidance is effective immediately, though the Treasury Department may provide additional implementation details in coming weeks. Can international investors access these staking ETFs? While the guidance applies to US markets, international investors should consult local regulations regarding access to US-based crypto ETF staking products. Found this information valuable? Help other investors stay informed by sharing this article on your social media platforms. Together, we can build a more educated cryptocurrency community! To learn more about the latest crypto ETF trends, explore our article on key developments shaping cryptocurrency institutional adoption. This post Revolutionary Crypto ETF Staking Guidance: US Treasury Unveils Clear Path for Investors first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Pundit Reveals Final Nail In The Coffin For XRP, What This Means
body: The crypto industry is approaching a major milestone as the market anticipates the potential approval of an XRP Spot ETF in the United States (US). Analysts suggest that recent developments regarding the US Securities and Exchange Commission‚Äôs (SEC) review could deliver the final nail in the coffin for XRP. With ETF filings still awaiting approval, the market is watching closely, as a green light could pave the way to greater mainstream adoption and institutional investment in XRP. XRP ETF To Become Game-Changer For The Market Nate Geraci, President of NovaDius Wealth Management and co-founder of The ETF Institute, recently stated on X social media that the first Spot XRP ETF could launch within the next two weeks. He described this event as the ‚Äúfinal nail in the coffin‚Äù for the previous wave of anti-crypto regulators. Related Reading: Analyst Predicts XRP Price Will Decouple From Bitcoin, Here‚Äôs What Would Happen Notably, the US SEC had been involved in litigation against Ripple for five years, which concluded about three months ago. Geraci believes that the approval of a Spot XRP ETF represents a significant step forward for not only XRP but also the broader cryptocurrency industry. The temporary delay caused by the US government shutdown, which started in October, has pushed back XRP ETF approvals. However, new reports of bipartisan efforts to reopen government operations have reignited expectations of an ETF. Geraci pointed out in a subsequent X post that the end of the government shutdown could unleash a wave of crypto ETF launches, with a 33 Act spot XRP ETF likely coming this week. Recently, the US Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC) listed nine new Spot XRP ETFs on its platform, increasing expectations of a launch this November. The list includes XRP ETFs from top asset managers such as Bitwise, Franklin Templeton, Canary Capital, Volatility Shares, CoinShares, T-Rex Osprey, 21Shares, and many others. ETF Filing Amendment Brings Launch Closer Than Ever Further evidence that an XRP ETF may be imminent comes from recent filing updates by leading issuers. Eric Balchunas, senior ETF analyst at Bloomberg, reported that 21Shares has submitted an 8(a) form with the US SEC on November 7 for its spot XRP ETF. The new changes in the filing officially activate a 20-day countdown for the approval and launch of an XRP ETF by November 27. Related Reading: Rare Chart Formation That Led To An 87% XRP Price Crash Has Resurfaced Crypto commentator John Squire also noted that if the US SEC does not take action within the allotted period, the approval would automatically proceed. Similarly, multiple issuers, including Canary Capital, have also withdrawn ‚Äúdelaying amendments,‚Äù triggering the same 20-day automatic approval countdown. Notably, these filings suggest that the market is moving closer to a regulatory green light for XRP ETFs. Amid recent developments, Squire has pointed out that the US has never been this close to fully approving an XRP ETF. Should the SEC give its authorization, it could significantly transform trading volume, liquidity, and institutional participation in the market. It would also expand the current major ETF offerings beyond just Bitcoin and Ethereum. Featured image from Peakpx, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Recovers Past $105K as Shutdown Relief and Whale Buying Fuel Bullish Reversal
body: Bitcoin surged past $105,000 on Monday, extending gains to trade near $106,000 as optimism over the U.S. government‚Äôs shutdown resolution revived risk appetite across global markets. Reports of a Senate breakthrough to fund key departments and reopen government operations triggered a wave of investor confidence after the 40-day standoff, the longest in U.S. history. Shutdown Breakthrough Sparks Crypto Relief Rally The U.S. Senate decision marked Bitcoin‚Äôs strongest rebound in nearly a week, lifting the broader crypto market‚Äôs capitalization to $3.58 trillion, up 4.8% in 24 hours. Ethereum rose 6.9% to $3,618, while XRP, Solana, Dogecoin, and Cardano each gained more than 4%, signaling renewed bullish sentiment. Analysts noted that the end of the shutdown could restore liquidity and encourage institutional inflows, particularly after eight sessions of ETF outflows totaling more than $2 billion. ‚ÄúRelief in Washington has translated into relief on the charts,‚Äù said market analyst Abhay H., who projects short-term upside targets between $108,000 and $110,000 if momentum holds above $105,000. Whales Accumulate $32 Billion as Support Strengthens On-chain data revealed that Bitcoin whales , addresses holding between 10,000 and 100,000 BTC, accumulated more than 300,000 BTC worth approximately $32 billion after prices briefly dipped below $101,000. This large-scale accumulation helped reinforce the $105,000 support zone, offsetting broader market weakness. The Realized Profit/Loss ratio remains elevated at 9.1, suggesting holders are still comfortably in profit despite volatility. Analysts believe the buying spree demonstrates ‚Äúdeep conviction‚Äù among long-term investors. ‚ÄúWhales have effectively turned $105K into the new line in the sand,‚Äù said Glassnode researchers, adding that structural demand remains robust even amid reduced ETF inflows. Technical signals back this trend. Bitcoin continues to defend its 365-day moving average, a key historical support that also held during the 2024 yen-carry crisis and the 2025 tariff shock. Bitcoin (BTC) Traders Watch $111K‚Äì$113K Resistance Zone While momentum indicators show Bitcoin entering neutral territory, traders are now eyeing $111,000 and $113,000 as the next resistance levels. A clear break above that range could open the path toward the 138.2% Fibonacci extension target near $133,900. Market sentiment has further been buoyed by speculation that MicroStrategy founder Michael Saylor may be preparing another major Bitcoin purchase following his cryptic ‚Äú‚Çøest Continue‚Äù post. Combined with expectations of potential Fed rate cuts before 2026, these catalysts are helping reinforce Bitcoin‚Äôs recovery narrative heading into year-end. Currently, Bitcoin (BTC) trades at $106,448, up 4.3% over 24 hours, signaling that the bulls may indeed be back in control. Cover image from ChatGPT, BTCUSD chart from Tradingview

title: CNBC Just Made This XRP ETF Confirmation
body: A short video clip shared on X by observer Ripple Bull Winkle is generating waves in the crypto world. He cites a live on-air moment where CNBC seemingly allowed the cat out of the bag: ‚ÄúYou got a couple of XRP ETFs coming through .‚Äù That alone has stirred a mixture of anticipation and scrutiny among market professionals. The Signal That Echoed Bull Winkle frames the clip as a watershed: ‚ÄúCNBC, they just did it,‚Äù he states. He argues this is ‚Äúthe first mainstream confirmation that XRP ETFs are real‚Äù. The phrasing suggests a shift from speculation into tangible expectation. If true, this transition mirrors what happened with spot Bitcoin ETFs‚Äîfirst whispers, then filings, then launches. Filings, Regulatory Milestones, and Timing Behind the tone of social media lies solid groundwork. Several asset managers ‚Äì notably Bitwise Asset Management ‚Äì have amended their municipal S-1 filings to remove delay language, thus enabling automatic effectiveness once the statutory window expires. CNBC Just Confirmed #XRP ETFs pic.twitter.com/TDUYp9bdj6 ‚Äî Ripple Bull Winkle | Crypto Researcher (@RipBullWinkle) November 10, 2025 These filings point to a tight calendar in mid-November. Activity at the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) level, combined with index-provider entries and the clearing of operational hurdles, suggests readiness rather than mere optimism. Why It Matters for XRP If spot XRP ETFs launch, institutional capital and passive-investment themes could flow into the token at scale. Bull Winkle warns: ‚ÄúWhen that happens, you‚Äôre not early anymore, you are just ahead of the headlines.‚Äù The implication is that early positioning might yield outsized returns before the broader market reacts. In other words, this is not merely about the product launch‚Äîit‚Äôs about the paradigm of adoption shifting. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Risks and Caveats Ahead Despite the optimism, several variables remain. Even with filings cleared, actual first-trades depend on SEC approval, exchange listings, custodian readiness, and index inclusion. A date on the calendar‚ÄîNovember 13‚Äîis frequently cited , though Bull Winkle frames it as a marker to ‚Äúcircle‚Äù rather than an ironclad guarantee. In regulatory-heavy environments, ‚Äúexpectation‚Äù and ‚Äúeffective launch‚Äù are different variables. Reading Between the Lines The clip from CNBC, amplified by Bull Winkle, acts as social evidence. That matters because perceptions drive flows. But the more enduring driver is filings, index registrations, and structural readiness. So far, the narrative appears aligned. Market participants are merging social fuel with procedural indicators. Final Thoughts The claim that ‚Äúyou‚Äôve got a couple of XRP ETFs coming through,‚Äù as captured by Bull Winkle, has ignited the conversation and lifted sentiment. But the most meaningful confirmation will come with a ticker symbol on an exchange and volume crossing the thresholds of liquidity. Until then, this remains very much a ‚Äúpre-launch phase‚Äù‚Äîbut potentially one whose impact may begin in days. title: UNI Token Supply Revolution: Uniswap‚Äôs Bold Move to Enhance Value
body: BitcoinWorld UNI Token Supply Revolution: Uniswap‚Äôs Bold Move to Enhance Value Uniswap Labs and the Uniswap Foundation have unveiled a groundbreaking governance proposal that could dramatically reshape the UNI token supply landscape. This strategic move aims to enhance token value while streamlining operations across the ecosystem. For cryptocurrency enthusiasts and UNI token holders, this represents one of the most significant developments in decentralized finance governance this year. What Does the UNI Token Supply Proposal Actually Mean? The core of the proposal focuses on reducing the UNI token supply through strategic fee allocation. Instead of maintaining the current token distribution model, the plan redirects a portion of protocol fees toward value-enhancing mechanisms. This approach represents a fundamental shift in how Uniswap manages its token economics. The proposal includes two primary allocation methods for these fees: UNI buybacks and burns to directly reduce circulating supply Growth budget allocation to fund ecosystem development How Will the UNI Token Supply Changes Benefit Holders? Reducing the UNI token supply through strategic mechanisms creates several immediate benefits for token holders. First, the buyback and burn approach directly decreases circulating tokens, potentially increasing scarcity and value. Second, the growth budget ensures continued development and innovation within the Uniswap ecosystem. Moreover, the operational consolidation brings efficiency improvements. By transferring most Foundation projects to Uniswap Labs, the ecosystem eliminates redundancy and streamlines decision-making. This consolidation should accelerate development timelines and improve resource allocation. What Challenges Could Impact the UNI Token Supply Transition? While the proposal offers significant benefits, several challenges require careful consideration. Governance participation remains crucial ‚Äì the community must actively vote and guide implementation. Additionally, the transition period during Foundation wind-down requires meticulous planning to ensure project continuity. The fee allocation mechanism also presents technical challenges. Implementing automated buybacks and burns requires robust smart contract development and security audits. Similarly, determining the optimal split between burn mechanisms and growth funding demands careful economic analysis. Why This UNI Token Supply Move Matters for DeFi This proposal represents a maturation of decentralized finance governance models. By implementing token supply management mechanisms typically seen in traditional finance, Uniswap demonstrates DeFi‚Äôs evolving sophistication. The move could set a precedent for other protocols considering similar token economic improvements. The decision to reduce UNI token supply through protocol fees also creates a sustainable value accrual mechanism. Unlike one-time token burns, this approach establishes ongoing value enhancement tied directly to protocol usage and performance. What‚Äôs Next for the UNI Token Supply Proposal? The governance process will determine the proposal‚Äôs fate. UNI token holders must vote on the changes, with implementation following successful community approval. The timeline includes several phases: Community discussion and feedback collection Formal governance proposal submission Token holder voting period Technical implementation if approved Successful implementation could fundamentally transform UNI token economics, creating a more deflationary model while maintaining ecosystem growth funding. Frequently Asked Questions How will the UNI token supply reduction affect token price? The reduced UNI token supply through buybacks and burns could create scarcity, potentially supporting price appreciation, though market conditions remain influential. When will the UNI token supply changes take effect? Implementation depends on governance approval and technical development, likely occurring over several months following successful voting. What happens to the Uniswap Foundation during this transition? The Foundation will wind down operations after transferring ongoing projects to Uniswap Labs, ensuring continuity for ecosystem development. How can UNI token holders participate in governance? Token holders can vote through Uniswap‚Äôs governance portal using their UNI tokens to influence protocol decisions. Will the UNI token supply reduction impact protocol fees? User trading fees remain unchanged; the proposal redirects a portion of existing protocol revenue toward supply management. What safeguards ensure proper fund allocation? Transparent on-chain mechanisms and community oversight through governance provide accountability for fund distribution. Found this analysis of UNI token supply changes helpful? Share this article with fellow cryptocurrency enthusiasts on Twitter and LinkedIn to spread awareness about these significant DeFi developments. To learn more about the latest DeFi trends, explore our article on key developments shaping decentralized finance institutional adoption. This post UNI Token Supply Revolution: Uniswap‚Äôs Bold Move to Enhance Value first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Coinbase Opens Token Sale Platform for U.S. Retail Investor
body: After a long wait, Coinbase is bringing token sales back to the public, and this time, retail investors in the United States are finally included. The exchange has launched a new Coinbase Token Sales Platform, designed to give users early access to new crypto projects in a regulated, transparent environment. For the first time since 2018, U.S. traders can participate in public token launches directly through Coinbase. The move marks a major step in Coinbase‚Äôs push to make token distribution fairer, safer, and more accessible, especially to users previously excluded from such opportunities due to regulatory constraints. Monad to Debut as the First Project via Coinbase Launchpad The first token sale on the platform will be Monad ($MON), a high-performance blockchain project set to launch on November 17, 2025 via Coinbase Launchpad. Monad aims to deliver extreme scalability and efficiency in decentralized computing, and its upcoming sale is expected to draw significant interest. According to Coinbase, the new token launch format focuses on three key promises: Early access to promising new tokens Prioritization of real supporters over speculative traders Sustainable token distribution that rewards long-term holders Full inclusion of U.S. users for the first time in years The sale represents a symbolic moment, one that reconnects the largest U.S. crypto exchange with grassroots participation in token launches. Token launches just got a whole lot better. ‚Üí Early access to your favorite tokens ‚Üí Real supporters are prioritized ‚Üí Sustainable token distribution ‚Üí US users can finally join Now possible with token sales on Coinbase. Oh, one more thing: the @monad sale starts Nov 17. pic.twitter.com/ox5VRAqfiH ‚Äî Coinbase (@coinbase) November 10, 2025 Inside the Monad Sale Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs confirmed for the Monad Token Sale: Token Supply: 100 billion MON Sale Price: $0.025 per MON Tokens Available for Sale: 7.5 billion MON (7.5% of total supply) Start Date: November 17, 2025, 2:00 PM UTC End Date: November 23, 2025, 2:00 AM UTC Minimum Bid: $100 Maximum Bid: $100,000 Distribution: Tokens delivered during the TGE (Token Generation Event) Coinbase also stated that higher maximum limits may apply for Coinbase One subscribers, providing additional flexibility for premium members. The sale will be accessible globally, including the United States, a first for Coinbase-hosted token launches in years. Premarket trading for MON currently hovers around $0.048, almost double the public sale price, reflecting strong early interest. Announcing the MON public sale: the first ever token sale on Coinbase The sale starts on November 17th and will be accessible in over 80 countries, including the U.S. More details below pic.twitter.com/lOs7fv11kF ‚Äî Monad (mainnet arc) (@monad) November 10, 2025 Monad Tokenomics Breakdown Monad has also released full details of its tokenomics, emphasizing a balanced distribution model aimed at long-term network growth. Day 1 Supply: 49.4 billion MON (49.4% of total) Public Sale: 7.5 billion MON (7.5%), Fully unlocked at TGE Airdrop: 3.3 billion MON (3.3%), Fully unlocked Ecosystem Development: 38.5 billion MON (38.5%), Fully unlocked The remaining 50.6 billion MON (50.6%) will be allocated to team members, investors, and the Category Labs treasury. These tokens will be subject to a vesting schedule between 1 and 4 years, ensuring that early stakeholders stay aligned with the project‚Äôs long-term vision. This structure signals an intent to maintain sustainable growth rather than short-term hype, a principle Coinbase appears committed to through its new token sales model. Coinbase Offers A New Era for Retail Access For U.S. crypto traders, the launch represents more than just another sale, it‚Äôs a reopening of an entire market segment that‚Äôs been closed since the 2017‚Äì2018 ICO boom. Back then, regulatory uncertainty forced most platforms to restrict U.S. users from participating in token sales. Coinbase‚Äôs re-entry into this space signals renewed confidence that compliant frameworks now exist to include retail participants safely. By hosting token launches under its regulated umbrella, Coinbase is attempting to rebuild trust in public offerings, while giving users a fair shot at early-stage projects without relying on offshore exchanges. The introduction of the Coinbase Token Sales Platform could reshape how mainstream investors gain access to new crypto opportunities. Transparency: Token allocations, sale mechanics, and distribution schedules are fully disclosed, reducing the risk of opaque or manipulated launches. Compliance: Every sale will operate under Coinbase‚Äôs U.S. regulatory standards, setting a precedent for legal token distribution. Fair Participation: The platform prioritizes genuine community members over bots and speculative traders, aligning with the broader ‚Äúfair launch‚Äù ethos in crypto. For Coinbase, the launch is also a competitive play against global exchanges like Binance Launchpad and Bitget Launchpad, which have dominated the token sale landscape. The difference: Coinbase is bringing that model into regulated territory, giving American investors a seat at the table once again. A Revival of the Launchpad Model Coinbase‚Äôs move revives the launchpad model that once defined early crypto growth cycles. By curating token sales and providing infrastructure, Coinbase aims to combine investor safety with innovation access, something the industry has struggled to balance. Analysts believe this could mark the beginning of a broader shift toward compliant public sales. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not about chasing hype, it‚Äôs about rebuilding participation,‚Äù one observer noted. ‚ÄúCoinbase is positioning itself as the bridge between regulation and innovation.‚Äù If successful, the platform could become a central venue for both emerging projects and investors seeking early exposure under trusted conditions. The timing of Coinbase‚Äôs announcement is also telling. As institutional interest in digital assets grows and U.S. regulators gradually clarify their stance on token distribution, Coinbase is positioning itself at the forefront of compliant token launches. With Monad as the debut sale, the exchange is signaling a commitment to high-quality projects and transparent terms, a formula that could redefine how tokens enter the market. For investors, it means something simple but powerful: The ability to participate in crypto‚Äôs next wave, legally, securely, and onshore. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services.
